|c1,1,1
|p1 {a}  iS/e tvorj/e tvA
|p2 {b}  vAy/ava sthopAy/ava stha
|p3 {c}  dev/o vaH savit/A pr/Arpayatu /Sr/eSThatamAya k/armaNe \
|p4 {d}  /A pyAyadhvam aghniyA devabhAg/am /UrjasvatIH p/ayasvatIH praj/AvatIr anamIv/A ayakSam/As \
|p5 {e}  m/A va sten/a I/Sata m/Agh/a/Sa~Msas \
|p6 {f}  rudr/asya het/iH p/ari vo v.rNaktu
|p7 {g}  dhruv/A asm/in g/opatau syAta bahv/Is \
|p8 {h}  y/ajamAnasya pa/S/Un pAhi //

|c1,2,1
|p1 {a}  yaj~N/asya ghoS/ad asi
|p2 {b}  pr/atyuSTa~M r/akSaH pr/atyuSTA /arAtayaH
|p3 {c}  pr/ey/am agAd dhiS/aNA barh/ir /acha m/anunA k.rt/A svadh/ayA v/itaSTA / t/a /A vahanti kav/ayaH pur/astAd dev/ebhyo j/uSTam ih/a barh/ir As/ade //
|p4 {d}  dev/AnAm pariSUt/am asi
|p5 {e}  varS/av.rddham asi
|p6 {f}  d/evabarhir m/A tvAnv/a.N m/A tiry/ak
|p7 {g}  p/arva te rAdhyAsam
|p8 {h}  A chett/A te m/A riSam \
|p9 {i}  d/evabarhiH /Sat/aval/SaM v/i roha sah/asraval/SAH //

|c1,2,2
|p1     v/i vay/a~M ruhema
|p2 {k}  p.rthivy/AH samp/rcaH pAhi
|p3 {l}  susambh/rtA tvA s/am bharAmi
|p4 {m}  /adityai r/AsnAsIndrANy/ai saMn/ahanam
|p5 {n}  pUS/A te granth/iM grathnAtu s/a te m/AsthAt \
|p6 {o}  /indrasya tvA bAh/ubhyAm /ud yache b/rhasp/ater mUrdhn/A harAmi
|p7 {p}  urv \ant/arikSam /anv ihi
|p8 {q}  devaMgam/am asi //

|c1,3,1
|p1 {a}  /S/undhadhvaM d/aivyAya k/armaNe devayajy/Ayai
|p2 {b}  mAtar/i/Svano gharm\o 'si
|p3 {c}  dy/aur asi p.rthivy \asi
|p4 {d}  vi/Sv/adhAyA asi param/eNa dh/AmnA
|p5 {e}  d/r~Mhasva m/A hvAs \
|p6 {f}  v/asUnA~M pav/itram asi /Sat/adhAraM {F v/asUnAM pav/itram}{W v/asUnAm}{ASS v/asUnAM pav/itram}{BI v/asUnAM pav/itram}{GOLS v/asUnAM pav/itram} asi sah/asradhAram \
|p7 {g}  hut/a stok/o hut/o draps/as \
|p8 {h}  agn/aye b.rhat/e n/AkAya / sv/AhA dy/AvAp.rthiv/IbhyAm \
|p9 {k}  s/A vi/Sv/AyuH s/A vi/Sv/avyacAH s/A vi/Sv/akarmA
|p10 {l}  s/am p.rcyadhvam .rtAvarIr Urm/iNIr m/adhumattamA mandr/A dh/anasya sAt/aye
|p11 {m}  s/omena tv/A tanacm/IndrAya d/adhi
|p12 {n}  v/iSNo havy/a~M rakSasva //

|c1,4,1
|p1 {a}  k/armaNe vAM dev/ebhyaH /Sakeyam \
|p2 {b}  v/eSAya tvA
|p3 {c}  pr/atyuSTa~M r/akSaH pr/atyuSTA /arAtayas \
|p4 {d}  dh/Ur asi
|p5 {e}  {F dh/Urva dh/UrvantaM}{W }{ASS dh/Urva dh/UrvantaM}{BI dh/Urva dh/UrvantaM}{GOLS dh/Urva dh/UrvantaM} dh/Urva t/aM y\o 'sm/An dh/Urvati t/aM dhUrva y/aM vay/aM dh/UrvAmas
|p6 {f}  tv/aM dev/AnAM asi s/asnitamam p/apritamaM j/uSTatamaM v/ahnitamaM devah/Utamam
|p7 {g}  /ahrutam asi havirdh/Anam \
|p8 {h}  d/r~Mhasva m/A hvAs \
|p9 {i}  mitr/asya tvA c/akSuSA pr/ekSe
|p10 {k}  m/A bh/er m/A s/aM vikthA m/A tvA //

|c1,4,2
|p1     hi~MsiSam
|p2 {l}  ur/u v/AtAya
|p3 {m}  dev/asya tvA savit/uH prasav\e '/Sv/inor bAh/ubhyAm pUSN/o h/astAbhyAm agn/aye j/uSTaM n/ir vapAmy agn/IS/omAbhyAm
|p4 {n}  id/aM dev/AnAm id/am u naH sah/a
|p5 {o}  sphAty/ai tvA n/ArAtyai
|p6 {p}  s/uvar abh/i v/i khyeSaM vai/SvAnar/aM jy/otis \
|p7 {q}  d/r~MhantAM d/uryA dy/AvAp.rthivy/os \
|p8 {r}  urv \ant/arikSam /anv ihi \
|p9 {s}  /adityAs tvop/asthe sAdayAmi \
|p10 {t}  /agne havy/a~M rakSasva //

|c1,5,1
|p1 {a}  dev/o vaH savit/ot punAtv /achidreNa p/avitreNa v/asoH s/Uryasya ra/Sm/ibhis \
|p2 {b}  /Apo devIr agrepuvo agreguv/o 'gra im/aM yaj~N/aM nayat/Agre yaj~N/apatiM dhatta
|p3 {c}  yuSm/An /indro 'v.rNIta v.rtrat/Urye yUy/am /indram av.rNIDhvaM v.rtrat/Urye
|p4 {d}  pr/okSitA stha \
|p5 {e}  agn/aye vo j/uSTam pr/okSAmy agn/IS/omAbhyAm \
|p6 {f}  /S/undhadhvaM d/aivyAya k/armaNe devayajy/Ayai \
|p7 {g}  /avadhUta~M r/akS/o 'vadhUtA /arAtay/as \
|p8 {h}  adityAs tv/ag asi pr/ati tvA //

|c1,5,2
|p1     p.rthiv/I vettu \
|p2 {i}  adhiS/avaNam asi vAnaspaty/am pr/ati tv/AdityAs tv/ag vettu \
|p3 {k}  agn/es tan/Ur asi vAc/o vis/arjanam
|p4 {l}  dev/avItaye tvA g.rhNAmi \
|p5 {m}  /adrir asi vAnaspaty/aH
|p6 {n}  s/a id/aM dev/ebhyo havy/a~M su/S/ami /SamiSva \
|p7 {o}  /iSam /A vad/orjam /A vada
|p8 {p}  dyum/ad vadata
|p9 {q}  vay/a~M saMghAt/aM jeSma
|p10 {r}  varS/av.rddham asi
|p11 {s}  pr/ati tvA varS/av.rddhaM vettu
|p12 {t}  p/arApUta~M r/akSaH p/arApUtA /arAtayas \
|p13 {u}  r/akSasAm bhAg\o 'si
|p14 {v}  vAy/ur vo v/i vinaktu
|p15 {w}  dev/o vaH savit/A h/iraNyapANiH pr/ati g.rhNAtu //

|c1,6,1
|p1 {a}  /avadhUta~M r/akS/o 'vadhUtA /arAtayas \
|p2 {b}  /adityAs tv/ag asi pr/ati tvA p.rthiv/I vettu
|p3 {c}  div/a skambhan/ir asi pr/ati tv/AdityAs tv/ag vettu
|p4 {d}  dhiS/aNAsi parvaty/A pr/ati tvA div/a skambhan/ir vettu
|p5 {e}  dhiS/aNAsi pArvatey/I pr/ati tvA parvat/ir vettu
|p6 {f}  dev/asya tvA savit/uH prasav\e '/Sv/inor bAh/ubhyAm pUSN/o h/astAbhyAm /adhi vapAmi
|p7 {g}  dhAny\am asi dhinuh/i dev/An
|p8 {h}  prAN/Aya tvApAn/Aya tvA vyAn/Aya tvA
|p9 {i}  dIrgh/Am /anu pr/asitim /AyuSe dhAm \
|p10 {k}  dev/o vaH savit/A h/iraNyapANiH pr/ati g.rhNAtu //

|c1,7,1
|p1 {a}  dh/rSTir asi br/ahma yacha \
|p2 {b}  /apAgne 'gn/im Am/AdaM jahi n/iS kravy/Ada~M sedh/A devay/ajaM vaha
|p3 {c}  n/irdagdha~M r/akSo n/irdagdhA /arAtayas \
|p4 {d}  dhruv/am asi prAthiv/IM d.r~Mh/Ayur d.r~Mha praj/AM d.r~Mha sajAt/An asm/ai y/ajamAnAya p/ary Uha
|p5 {e}  dhart/am asy ant/arikSaM d.r~Mha prAN/aM d.r~MhApAN/aM d.r~Mha sajAt/An asm/ai y/ajamAnAya p/ary Uha
|p6 {f}  dhar/uNam asi d/ivaM d.r~Mha c/akSuH //

|p3 {h}  c/ita stha praj/Am asm/ai ray/iM asm/ai sajAt/An asm/ai y/ajamAnAya p/ary Uha
|p4 {i}  bh/rgUNAm /a.NgirasAM t/apasA tapyadhvam \
|p5 {k}  y/Ani gharm/e kap/AlAny upacinv/anti vedh/asaH / pUSN/as t/Any /api vrat/a indravAy/U v/i mu~NcatAm //

|c1,8,1
|p1 {a}  s/aM vapAmi
|p2 {b}  s/am /Apo adbh/ir agmata s/am /oSadhayo r/asena

|p4 {d}  adbhy/aH p/ari pr/ajAtA stha s/am adbh/iH p.rcyadhvam \

|p11 {l}  ant/arita~M r/akSo 'nt/aritA /arAtayas \

|p3 {c}  vAy/ur asi tigm/atejAH

|p1     mauk \
|p2 {r}  ar/arus te d/ivaM m/A skAn

|p6 {v}  dh/A asi svadh/A asi \
|p7 {w}  urv/I c/Asi v/asvI cAsi
|p8 {x}  pur/A krUr/asya vis/rpo virap/Sinn udAd/Aya p.rthiv/IM jIr/adAnur y/Am /airaya~N candr/amasi svadh/Abhis t/AM dh/IrAso anud/r/Sya yajante //

|c1,10,1
|p1 {a}  pr/atyuSTa~M r/akSaH pr/atyuSTA /arAtayas \
|p2 {b}  agn/er vas t/ejiSThena t/ejasA n/iS TapAmi
|p3 {c}  goSTh/am m/A n/ir m.rkSaM vAj/inaM tvA sapatnasah/a~M s/am mArjmi
|p4 {d}  v/Acam prAN/aM c/akSuH /Sr/otram praj/AM y/onim m/A n/ir m.rkSam vAj/inIM tvA sapatnasAh/I~M s/am mArjmi \
|p5 {e}  A/S/AsAnA saumanas/am praj/A~M s/aubhAgyaM tan/Um / agn/er /anuvratA bhUtv/A s/aM nahye suk.rt/Aya k/am \
|p6 {f}  supraj/asas tvA vay/a~M sup/atnIr /upa //

|p3 {h}  s/am /AyuSA s/am praj/ayA s/am agne v/arcasA p/unaH / s/am p/atnI p/atyAh/aM gache sam Atm/A tan/uvA m/ama

|p1     vapAmi

|p3 {l}  t/ejo 'si t/ejo 'nu pr/ehy agn/is te t/ejo m/A v/i nait \

|p5 {n}  dh/AmnedhAmne dev/ebhyo y/ajuSeyajuSe bhava

|p6 {f}  Urj/A p.rthiv/IM gachata
|p7 {g}  v/iSNo st/Upo 'si \
|p8 {h}  /UrNAmradasaM tvA st.rNAmi svAsasth/aM dev/ebhyas \
|p9 {i}  gandharv\o 'si vi/Sv/Avasur v/i/SvasmAd /ISato y/ajamAnasya paridh/ir iD/a IDit/as \
|p10 {k}  /indrasya bAh/ur asi //

|c1,11,2
|p1     d/akSiNo y/ajamAnasya paridh/ir iD/a IDit/as \
|p2 {l}  mitr/Av/aruNau tvottarat/aH p/ari dhattAM dhruv/eNa dh/armaNA y/ajamAnasya paridh/ir iD/a IDit/aH
|p3 {m}  s/Uryas tvA pur/astAt pAtu k/asyA/S cid abh/i/SastyAs \
|p4 {n}  vIt/ihotraM tvA kave dyum/anta~M s/am idhImahy /agne b.rh/antam adhvar/e
|p5 {o}  vi/S/o yantr/e sthas \
|p6 {p}  v/asUnA~M rudr/ANAm Adity/AnA~M s/adasi sIda
|p7 {q}  juh/Ur upabh/rd dhruv/Asi gh.rt/AcI n/AmnA priy/eNa n/AmnA priy/e s/adasi sIda \
|p8 {r}  et/A asadant suk.rt/asya lok/e
|p9 {s}  t/A viSNo pAhi
|p10 {t}  pAh/i yaj~N/am pAh/i yaj~N/apatim pAh/i m/AM yaj~Nan/iyam //

|c1,12,1
|p1 {a}  bh/uvanam asi v/i prathasva \
|p2 {b}  /agne y/aSTar id/aM n/amaH /
|p3 {c}  j/uhv /ehy agn/is tvA hvayati devayajy/Ayai \
|p4 {d}  /upabh.rd /ehi dev/as tvA savit/A hvayati devayajy/Ayai \
|p5 {e}  /agnAviSNU m/A vAm /ava kramiSam \
|p6 {f}  v/i jihAthAm m/A mA s/aM tAptam \
|p7 {g}  lok/am me lokak.rtau k.rNutam \
|p8 {h}  v/iSNo sth/Anam asi \
|p9 {i}  it/a /indro akSNod vIry\ANi
|p10 {k}  samAr/abhyordhv/o adhvar/o divisp/r/Sam
|p11 {l}  /ahruto yaj~N/o yaj~N/apates \
|p12 {m}  /indrAvAnt sv/AhA

|p14 {o}  pAh/i mAgne d/u/ScaritAd /A mA s/ucarite bhaja

|c1,13,1
|p1 {a}  v/Ajasya mA prasav/enodgrAbh/eN/od agrabhIt / /athA sap/atnA~M /indro me nigrAbh/eN/AdharA~M akaH //
|p2 {b}  udgrAbh/aM ca nigrAbh/aM ca br/ahma dev/A avIv.rdhan / /athA sap/atnAn indrAgn/I me viSUc/InAn vy\asyatAm //
|p3 {c}  v/asubhyas tvA rudr/ebhyas tvAdity/ebhyas tvA \
|p4 {d}  akt/a~M r/ihANA viy/antu v/ayaH
|p5 {e}  praj/AM y/onim m/A n/ir m.rkSam

|p7 {g}  mar/utAm p/rSataya stha
|p8 {h}  div/am //

|c1,13,2
|p1     gacha t/ato no v/rSTim /eraya \
|p2 {i}  AyuSp/A agne 'sy /Ayur me pAhi
|p3 {k}  cakSuSp/A agne 'si c/akSur me pAhi
|p4 {l}  dhruv/Asi
|p5 {m}  y/am paridh/im pary/adhatthA /agne deva paN/ibhir vIy/amANas t/aM ta et/am /anu j/oSam bharAmi n/ed eS/a tv/ad apacet/ayAtai
|p6 {n}  yaj~N/asya p/Atha /upa s/am itam \
|p7 {o}  sa~MsrAv/abhAgA stheS/A b.rh/antaH prastareSTh/A barhiS/ada/S ca //

|c1,13,3
|p1     dev/A im/AM v/Acam abh/i v/i/Sve g.rN/anta As/adyAsm/in barh/iSi mAdayadhvam
|p2 {p}  agn/er vAm /apannag.rhasya s/adasi sAdayAmi
|p3 {q}  sumn/Aya sumninI sumn/e ma dhattam \
|p4 {r}  dhur/i dhury\au pAtam
|p5 {s}  /agne 'dabdhAyo '/SItatanopAh/i mAdy/a div/aH pAh/i pr/asityai pAh/i d/uriSTyai pAh/i duradmany/ai pAh/i d/u/ScaritAt \
|p6 {t}  /aviSaM naH pit/uM k.rNu suS/adA y/oni~M sv/AhA
|p7 {u}  d/evA gAtuvido gAt/uM vittv/A gAt/um ita
|p8 {v}  m/anasas pata im/aM no deva dev/eSu yaj~N/a~M sv/AhA vAc/i sv/AhA v/Ate dhAH //

|c1,14,1
|p1 {a}  ubh/A vAm indrAgnI Ahuv/adhyA ubh/A r/AdhasaH sah/a mAday/adhyai / ubh/A dAt/ArAv iS/A~M rayIN/Am ubh/A v/Ajasya sAt/aye huve vAm //
|p2 {b}  /a/Srava~M h/i bhUrid/AvattarA vAM v/ijAmAtur ut/a vA ghA syAl/At / /athA s/omasya pr/ayatI yuv/abhyAm /indrAgnI st/omaM janayAmi n/avyam //
|p3 {c}  /indrAgnI navat/im p/uro dAs/apatnIr adhUnutam / sAk/am /ekena k/armaNA //
|p4 {d}  /S/uciM n/u st/omaM n/avajAtaM ady/endrAgnI v.rtrahaNA juS/ethAm //

|c1,14,2
|p1     ubh/A h/i vA~M suh/avA j/ohavImi t/A v/Aja~M sady/a u/Sat/e dh/eSThA //
|p2 {e}  vay/am u tvA pathas pate r/athaM n/a v/AjasAtaye / dhiy/e pUSann ayujmahi //
|p3 {f}  path/aspathaH p/aripatiM vacasy/A k/Amena k.rt/o abhy \AnaD ark/am / s/a no rAsac chur/udha/S candr/AgrA dh/iyaM dhiya~M sISadhAti pr/a pUS/A //
|p4 {g}  kS/etrasya p/atinA vay/aM hit/enava jayAmasi / g/Am /a/Svam poSayitnv /A s/a naH //

|c1,14,3
|p1     m.rDAtId/r/Se //
|p2 {h}  kS/etrasya pate m/adhumantam Urm/iM dhen/ur iva p/ayo asm/Asu dhukSva / madhu/Sc/utaM gh.rt/am iva s/upUtam .rt/asya naH p/atayo m.rDayantu //
|p3 {i}  /agne n/aya sup/athA rAy/e asm/An v/i/SvAni deva v/ayunAni vidv/An / yuyodhy \asm/aj juhurAN/am /eno bh/UyiSThAM te n/amauktiM vidhema //
|p4 {k}  /A dev/AnAm /api p/anthAm aganma y/ac chakn/avAma t/ad /anu pr/avoDhum / agn/ir vidv/Ant s/a yajAt //

|c1,14,4

|c2,1,1

|c2,13,3
|p1     d/akSiNAd /ot/a svay/At //
|p2 {i}  v/iSNor n/ukaM vIry\ANi pr/a vocaM y/aH p/ArthivAni vimam/e r/ajA~Msi y/o /askabhAyad /uttara~M sadh/asthaM vicakramAN/as tredh/orugAy/as \

|c2,14,1
|p1 {a}  k.rNuSv/a p/AjaH pr/asitiM n/a p.rthv/IM yAh/i r/Ajev/AmavA~M /ibhena / t.rSv/Im /anu pr/asitiM drUNAn/o 'stAsi v/idhya rakS/asas t/apiSThaiH //
|p2 {b}  t/ava bhram/Asa A/Suy/A patanty /anu sp.r/Sa dh.rSat/A /S/o/SucAnaH / t/apU~MSy agne juhv\A pataMg/An /asaMdito v/i s.rja v/iSvag ulk/AH //
|p3 {c}  pr/ati sp/a/So v/i s.rja t/UrNitamo bh/avA pAy/ur vi/S/o asyA /adabdhaH / y/o no dUre agh/a/Sa~MsaH //

|c2,14,2
|p1     y/o /anty /agne m/AkiS Te vy/athir /A dadharSIt //
|p2 {d}  /ud agne tiSTha pr/aty /A tanuSva ny \am/itrA~M oSatAt tigmahete / y/o no /arAti~M samidhAna cakr/e nIc/A t/aM dhakSy atas/aM n/a /S/uSkam //
|p3 {e}  Urdhv/o bhava pr/ati vidhy/Adhy asm/ad Av/iS k.rNuSva d/aivyAny agne / /ava sthir/A tanuhi yAtuj/UnAM {F jAm/im}{W jAm/iM} /ajAmim pr/a m.rNIhi /S/atrUn //
|p4 {f}  s/a te //

|c2,14,3
|p1     jAnAti sumat/iM yaviSTha y/a /Ivate br/ahmaNe gAt/um /airat / v/i/SvAny asmai sud/inAni rAy/o dyumn/Any ary/o v/i d/uro abh/i dyaut //
|p2 {g}  s/ed agne astu subh/agaH sud/Anur y/as tvA n/ityena hav/iSA y/a ukth/aiH / p/iprISati sv/a /AyuSi duroN/e v/i/Sv/ed asmai sud/inA s/Asad iST/iH //
|p3 {h}  /arcAmi te sumat/iM gh/oSy arv/Ak s/aM te vAv/AtA jaratAm //

|c2,14,4
|p1     iy/aM g/IH / sv/a/SvAs tvA sur/athA marjayemAsm/e kSatr/ANi dhArayer /anu dy/Un //
|p2 {i}  ih/a tvA bh/Ury /A cared /upa tm/an d/oSAvastar dIdiv/A~Msam /anu dy/Un / kr/IDantas tvA sum/anasaH sapemAbh/i dyumn/A tasthiv/A~Mso j/anAnAm //
|p3 {k}  y/as tvA sv/a/SvaH suhiraNy/o agna upay/Ati v/asumatA r/athena / t/asya trAt/A bhavasi t/asya s/akhA y/as ta Atithy/am AnuS/ag j/ujoSat //
|p4 {l}  mah/o rujAmi //

|c2,14,5
|p1     bandh/utA v/acobhis t/an mA pit/ur g/otamAd /anv iyAya / tv/aM no asya v/acasa/S cikiddhi h/otar yaviSTha sukrato d/amUnAH //
|p2 {m}  /asvapnajas tar/aNayaH su/S/evA /atandrAso 'v.rk/A /a/SramiSThAH / t/e pAy/avaH sadhr/iya~Nco niS/ady/Agne t/ava naH pAntv amUra //
|p3 {n}  y/e pAy/avo mAmatey/aM te agne p/a/Syanto andh/aM durit/Ad /arakSan / rar/akSa t/Ant suk/rto vi/Sv/avedA d/ipsanta /id rip/avo n/A ha //

|c2,14,6
|p1 debhuH //
|p2 {o}  tv/ayA vay/a~M sadhany\as tv/otAs t/ava pr/aNIty a/SyAma v/AjAn / ubh/A /S/a~MsA sUdaya satyatAte 'nuSThuy/A k.rNuhy ahrayANa //
|p3 {p}  ay/A te agne sam/idhA vidhema pr/ati st/oma~M /Sasy/amAnaM g.rbhAya / d/ahA/S/aso rakS/asaH pAhy \asm/An druh/o nid/o mitramaho avady/At //
|p4 {q}  rakSoh/anaM vAj/inam /A jigharmi mitr/am {F pr/atiSTham}{W pr/athiSTham} /upa yAmi /S/arma / /Si/SAno agn/iH kr/atubhiH s/amiddhaH s/a no d/ivA //

|c2,14,7
|p1 s/a riS/aH pAtu n/aktam //
|p2 {r}  v/i jy/otiSA b.rhat/A bhAty agn/ir Av/ir v/i/SvAni k.rNute mahitv/A / pr/AdevIr mAy/AH sahate dur/evAH /S/i/SIte /S/r.Nge r/akSase vin/ikSe //
|p3 {s}  ut/a svAn/Aso div/i Santv agn/es tigm/AyudhA r/akSase h/antav/A u / m/ade cid asya pr/a rujanti bh/AmA n/a varante parib/Adho /adevIH //

|c3,1,1
|p1 {a}  dev/asya tvA savit/uH prasav\e '/Sv/inor bAh/ubhyAm pUSN/o h/astAbhyAm /A dad/e bhrir asi n/Arir asi

|c3,11,1

|c3,13,1
|p1 {a}  h.rd/e tvA m/anase tvA div/e tvA s/UryAya tvA \
|p2 {b}  Urdhv/am im/am adhvar/aM k.rdhi div/i dev/eSu h/otrA yacha
|p3 {c}  s/oma rAjann /ehy /ava roha
|p4 {d}  m/A bh/er m/A s/aM vikthAs \
|p5 {e}  m/A tvA hi~MsiSam
|p6 {f}  praj/As tv/am up/Avaroha praj/As tv/Am up/Avarohantu
|p7 {g}  /S.rN/otv agn/iH sam/idhA h/avam me /S.rNv/antv /Apo dhiS/aNA/S ca dev/IH / /S.rN/ota grAvANo vid/uSo n/u // yaj~N/a~M /S.rN/otu dev/aH savit/A h/avam me //

|c3,13,2

|p1 {a}  prayAs/Aya sv/AhAyAs/Aya sv/AhA viyAs/Aya sv/AhA saMyAs/Aya sv/AhodyAs/Aya sv/AhAvayAs/Aya sv/AhA /Suc/e sv/AhA /S/okAya sv/AhA tapyatv/ai sv/AhA t/apate sv/AhA brahmahaty/Ayai sv/AhA s/arvasmai sv/AhA //

|c4,36,1
|p1 {a}  citt/a~M saMtAn/ena bhav/aM yakn/A rudr/aM t/animnA pa/Sup/ati~M sthUlah.rday/enAgn/i~M h/rdayena rudr/aM l/ohitena /Sarv/am m/atasnAbhyAm mahAdev/am ant/aHpAr/SvenauSiSThah/ana~M /Si.NgIniko/Sy\AbhyAm //

|c4,37,1
|p1 {a}  /A tiSTha v.rtrahan r/athaM yukt/A te br/ahmaNA h/arI / arv/Ac/Ina~M s/u te m/ano gr/AvA k.rNotu vagn/unA //

|c4,44,1

|c5,1,1

|c5,3,1
|p1 {a}  bh/Umir bhUmn/A dy/aur variN/Ant/arikSam mahitv/A / up/asthe te devy adite 'gn/im annAd/am ann/AdyAy/A dadhe //
|p2 {b}  /Ay/aM g/auH p/r/Snir akramId /asanan mAt/aram p/unaH / pit/araM ca pray/ant s/uvaH //

|c5,3,2

|c5,3,3

|c5,4,1
|p1     bh/Umir bhUmn/A dy/aur variN/ety AhA/S/iSaiv/ainam /A dhatte
|p2     sarp/A v/ai j/Iryanto 'manyata s/a et/aM kasarN/IraH kAdravey/o m/antram apa/Syat t/ato v/ai t/e jIrN/As tan/Ur /apAghnata

|c5,4,2
|p1     m/antram apa/Syat t/ato v/ai t/Am ann/Adyam /upAnamat \
|p2     y/at sarparAj~N/iyA .rgbh/ir g/Arhapatyam Ad/adhAty ann/Adyasy/Avaruddhyai \
|p3     /atho asy/Am ev/ainam pr/atiSThitam /A dhatte
|p4     y/at tvA kruddh/aH parov/ap/ety Ah/Apa hnuta ev/Asmai t/at
|p5     p/unas tv/od dIpayAmas/Ity Aha s/am inddha ev/ainam \
|p6     y/at te many/uparoptasy/ety Aha dev/atAbhir ev/a //

|c5,4,3
|p1     ena~M s/am bharati
|p2     v/i v/A et/asya yaj~N/a/S chidyate y\o 'gn/im udvAs/ayate b/rhasp/ativatyarc/opa tiSThate br/ahma v/ai dev/AnAm b/rhasp/atir br/ahmaNaiv/a yaj~N/a~M s/aM dadhAti
|p3     v/i chinnaM yaj~N/a~M sam im/aM dadhAtv /ity Aha saMt/atyai
|p4     v/i/Sve dev/A ih/a mAdayantAm /ity Aha saMt/atyaiv/a yaj~N/aM dev/ebhy/o 'nu di/Sati
|p5     sapt/a te agne sam/idhaH sapt/a jihv/AH //

|c5,4,4
|p1     /ity Aha sapt/asapta v/ai saptadh/Agn/eH priy/As tan/uvas t/A ev/Ava runddhe
|p2     p/unar Urj/A sah/a rayy/ety abh/itaH puroD/A/Sam /AhutI juhoti y/ajamAnam ev/orj/A ca rayy/A cobhay/ataH p/ari g.rhNAti \
|p3     Adity/A v/A asm/Al lok/Ad am/uM lok/am Ayan t\e 'm/uSmi#M lok/e vy \at.rSyan t/a im/aM lok/am p/unar abhyav/etyAgn/im Adh/Ayait/An h/omAn ajuhavus t/a Ardhnuvan t/e suvarg/aM lok/am Ayan
|p4     y/aH parAc/Inam punarAdh/eyAd agn/im Ad/adhIta s/a et/An h/omA~N juhuyAd y/Am ev/Adity/A /rddhim /Ardhnuvan t/Am ev/ardhnoti

|c5,5,1
|p1 {a}  {F upapray/anto}{W uyapray/anto} adhvar/am m/antraM vocemAgn/aye / Ar/e asm/e ca /S.rNvat/e //
|p2 {b}  asy/a pratn/Am /anu dy/uta~M /Sukr/aM duduhre /ahrayaH / p/ayaH sahasras/Am /rSim //
|p3 {c}  agn/ir mUrdh/A div/aH kak/ut p/atiH p.rthivy/A ay/am / ap/A~M r/etA~Msi jinvati //
|p4 {d}  ay/am ih/a pratham/o dhAyi dhAt/rbhir h/otA y/ajiSTho adhvar/eSv /IDyaH / y/am /apnavAno bh/rgavo viruruc/ur v/aneSu citr/aM vibh/uvaM vi/S/evi/Se //
|p5 {e}  ubh/A vAm indrAgnI Ahuv/adhyai //

|c5,5,2
|p1     ubh/A r/AdhasaH sah/a mAday/adhyai / ubh/A dAt/ArAv iS/A~M rayIN/Am ubh/A v/Ajasya sAt/aye huve vAm /
|p2 {f}  ay/aM te y/onir .rtv/iyo y/ato jAt/o /arocathAH / t/aM jAn/ann agna /A roh/AthA no vardhayA ray/im /
|p3 {g}  /agna /AyU~MSi pavasa /A suv/ojram /iSaM ca naH / Ar/e bAdhasva duch/unAm //
|p4 {h}  /agne p/avasva sv/apA asm/e v/arcaH suv/Iryam // d/adhat p/oSa~M ray/im //

|c5,5,3
|p1     m/ayi //
|p2 {i}  /agne pAvaka roc/iSA mandr/ayA deva jihv/ayA / /A dev/An vakSi y/akSi ca //
|p3 {k}  s/a naH pAvaka dIdiv/o 'gne dev/A~M ih/A vaha / /upa yaj~N/a~M hav/i/S ca naH //
|p4 {l}  agn/iH /S/ucivratatamaH /S/ucir v/ipraH /S/uciH kav/iH / /S/ucI rocata /AhutaH //
|p5 {m}  /ud agne /S/ucayas t/ava /Sukr/A bhr/Ajanta Irate / t/ava jy/otI~MSy arc/ayaH //
|p6 {n}  Ayurd/A agne 'sy /Ayur me //

|c5,5,4
|p1     dehi varcod/A agne 'si v/arco me dehi tanUp/A agne 'si tan/uvam me pAhi \
|p2 {o}  /agne y/an me tan/uvA Un/aM t/an ma /A p.rNa /
|p3 {p}  c/itrAvaso svast/i te pAr/am a/SIya \
|p4 {q}  /indhAnAs tvA /Sat/a~M h/imA dyum/antaH s/am idhImahi v/ayasvanto vayask/rtaM y/a/Sasvanto ya/Sask/rta~M suv/IrAso /adAbhyam / /agne sapatnad/ambhanaM v/arSiSThe /adhi n/Ake /
|p5 {r}  s/aM tv/am agne s/Uryasya v/arcasAgathAH s/am /rSINA~M stut/ena s/am priy/eNa dh/AmnA /
|p6 {s}  tv/am agne s/UryavarcA asi s/am m/Am /AyuSA v/arcasA praj/ayA s.rja //

|c5,6,1
|p1 {a}  s/am pa/SyAmi praj/A ah/am /iDaprajaso mAnav/IH / s/arvA bhavantu no g.rh/e //
|p2 {b}  /ambha sth/Ambho vo bhakSIya m/aha stha m/aho vo bhakSIya s/aha stha s/aho vo bhakSIy/orja sth/orjaM vo bhakSIya
|p3 {c}  r/evatI r/amadhvam asm/i#M lok\e 'sm/in goSTh\e 'sm/in kS/aye 'sm/in y/onAv ih/aiv/a stet/o m/Apa gAta bahv/Ir me bhUyAsta //

|c5,6,2

|c5,6,3

|c5,6,4

|c5,7,1

|p7     k/avAtirya.N.N iv/opa tiSTheta n/ainam praty/oSati n/a v/iSva.N praj/ayA pa/S/ubhir eti //

|c5,10,1
|p1 {a}  m/ama n/Ama pratham/aM jAtavedaH pit/A mAt/A ca dadhatur y/ad /agre / t/at tv/am bibh.rhi p/unar /A m/ad /aitos t/avAh/aM n/Ama bibharANy agne //
|p2 {b}  m/ama n/Ama t/ava ca jAtavedo v/AsasI iva viv/asAnau y/e c/arAvaH / /AyuSe tv/aM jIv/ase vay/aM yathAyath/aM v/i p/ari dadhAvahai p/unas t/e //
|p3 {c}  n/amo 'gn/ay/e 'pratividdhAya n/am/o 'nAdh.rSTAya n/amaH samr/Aje / /aSADhaH //

|c5,10,2
|p1     agn/ir b.rh/advayA vi/Svaj/it s/ahantyaH /Sr/eSTho gandharv/aH //
|p2 {d}  tv/atpitAro agne dev/As tv/AmAhutayas tv/advivAcanAH / s/am m/Am /AyuSA s/aM gaupaty/ena s/uhite mA dhAH //
|p3 {e}  ay/am agn/iH /Sr/eSThatamo 'y/am bh/agavattamo 'y/a~M sahasras/AtamaH / asm/A astu suv/Iryam //
|p4 {f}  m/ano jy/otir juSatAm /AjyaM v/ichinnaM yaj~N/a~M s/am im/aM dadhAtu / y/A iST/A uS/aso nimr/uca/S ca t/AH s/aM dadhAmi hav/iSA gh.rt/ena //
|p5 {g}  p/ayasvatIr /oSadhayaH //

|c5,10,3
|p1     p/ayasvad vIr/udhAm p/ayaH / ap/Am p/ayaso y/at p/ayas t/ena m/Am indra s/a~M s.rja //
|p2 {h}  /agne vratapate vrat/aM cariSyAmi t/ac chakeyaM t/an me rAdhyatAm /
|p3 {i}  agn/i~M h/otAram ih/a t/a~M huve dev/An yaj~N/iyAn ih/a y/An h/avAmahe // /A yantu dev/AH sumanasy/amAnA viy/antu dev/A hav/iSo me asya
|p4 {k}  k/as tvA yunakti s/a tvA yunaktu
|p5 {l}  y/Ani gharm/e kap/AlAny upacinv/anti //

|c5,10,4
|p1     vedh/asaH / pUSN/as t/Any /api vrat/a indravAy/U v/i mu~NcatAm //
|p2 {m}  /abhinno gharm/o jIr/adAnur y/ata /Attas t/ad agan p/unaH / idhm/o v/ediH paridh/aya/S /Sa s/arve yaj~N/asy/Ayur /anu s/aM caranti //
|p3 {n}  tr/ayastri~M/Sat t/antavo y/e vitatnir/e y/a im/aM yaj~N/a~M svadh/ayA d/adante t/eSAM chinn/am pr/aty et/ad dadhAmi sv/AhA gharm/o dev/A~M /apy etu //

|c5,11,1
|p1 {a}  vai/SvAnar/o na Uty/A pr/a yAtu parA v/ataH / agn/ir ukth/ena v/AhasA //
|p2 {b}  .rt/AvAnaM vai/SvAnar/am .rt/asya jy/otiSas p/atim / /ajasraM gharm/am Imahe //
|p3 {c}  vai/SvAnar/asya da~Ms/anAbhyo b.rh/ad /ariNAd /ekaH svapasy\ayA kav/iH / ubh/A pit/arA mah/ayann ajAyatAgn/ir dy/AvAp.rthiv/I bh/UriretasA //
|p4 {d}  p.rST/o div/i p.rST/o agn/iH p.rthivy/Am p.rST/o v/i/SvA /oSadhIr /A vive/Sa / vai/SvAnar/aH s/ahasA p.rST/o agn/iH s/a no d/ivA s/aH //

|c5,11,2
|p1     riS/aH pAtu n/aktam /
|p2 {e}  jAt/o y/ad agne bh/uvanA vy/akhyaH pa/S/uM n/a gop/A /iryaH p/arijmA / v/ai/SvAnara br/ahmaNe vinda gAt/uM yUy/am pAta svast/ibhiH s/adA naH //
|p3 {f}  tv/am agne /Soc/iSA /S/o/SucAna /A r/odasI ap.rNA j/AyamAnaH / tv/am dev/A~M abh/i/Saster amu~Nco v/ai/SvAnara jAtavedo mahitv/A //
|p4 {g}  asm/Akam agne magh/avatsu dhAray/AnAmi kSatr/am aj/ara~M suv/Iryam / vay/aM jayema /Sat/ina~M sahas/rNaM v/ai/SvAnara //

|c5,11,3
|p1     v/Ajam agne t/avo 't/ibhiH //
|p2 {h}  vai/SvAnar/asya sumat/au syAma r/AjA h/ikam bh/uvanAnAm abhi/Sr/IH / it/o jAt/o vi/Svam id/aM v/i caSTe vai/SvAnar/o yatate s/UryeNa //
|p3 {i}  /ava te h/eDo varuNa n/amobhir /ava yaj~N/ebhir Imahe hav/irbhiH / kS/ayann asm/abhyam asura praceto r/Ajann /enA~Msi si/SrathaH k.rt/Ani //
|p4 {k}  /ud uttam/aM varuNa p/A/Sam asm/ad /avAdham/aM v/i madhyam/a~M /SrathAya / /athA vay/am Aditya //

|c5,11,4
|p1     vrat/e t/av/AnAgaso /aditaye syAma //

|p3 {m}  /A dadhikr/AH /S/avAsA p/a~Nca k.rST/IH s/Urya iva jy/otiSAp/as tatAna / sahasras/AH /Satas/A vAjy /arvA p.rN/aktu v/adhvA s/am im/A v/acA~Msi //
|p4 {n}  agn/ir mUrdh/A

|p6 {p}  m/aruto y/ad dha vo div/aH sumnAy/anto h/avAm/ahe / /A t/U naH //

|c5,11,5
|p1     /upa gantana //
|p2 {q}  y/A vaH /Sarma /Sa/SamAn/Aya s/anti tridh/AtUni dA/S/uSe yachat/Adhi / asm/abhyaM t/Ani maruto v/i yanta ray/iM no dhatta v.rSaNaH suv/Iram
|p3 {r}  /aditir na uruSyatv /aditiH /S/arma yachatu / /aditiH pAtv /a~MhasaH //

|p5 {t}  sutr/AmANam p.rthiv/IM dy/Am aneh/asa~M su/S/armANam /aditi~M supr/aNItim / d/aivIM n/Ava~M svaritr/Am /anAgasam /asravantIm /A ruhemA svast/aye //

|c6,1,1

|p11    y/ad /anA/SvAn upav/asati
|p12    v/ajreNaiv/a sAkS/At kS/udham bhr/At.rvya~M hanti //

|c6,8,1
|p1     y/o v/ai /Sraddh/Am /anArabhya yaj~N/ena y/ajate n/AsyeST/Aya /Sr/ad dadhate \
|p2     ap/aH pr/a Nayati /Sraddh/A v/A /ApaH /Sraddh/Am ev/Ar/abhya yaj~N/ena yajata ubh/aye 'sya devamanuSy/A iST/Aya /Sr/ad dadhate t/ad Ahur /ati v/A et/A v/artraM nedanty /ati v/AcaM m/ano v/Av/ait/A n/Ati nedant/Iti
|p3     m/anasA pr/a NayatIy/aM v/ai m/anaH //

|c6,8,2
|p1     an/ayaiv/ainAH pr/a Nayaty /askannahavir bhavati y/a ev/aM v/eda
|p2     yaj~NAyudh/Ani s/am bhavati yaj~N/o v/ai yaj~NAyudh/Ani yaj~N/am ev/a t/at s/am {F bharati}{W bharat/i}{GOLS bharati}
|p3     y/ad /ekameka~M sambh/aret pit.rdevaty\Ani syur y/at sah/a s/arvANi mAnuS/ANi
|p4     dv/edve s/am bharati yAjyAnuvAky\ayor ev/a rUp/aM karoty /atho mithun/am ev/a
|p5     y/o v/ai d/a/Sa yaj~N/Ayudh/Ani v/eda mukhat\o 'sya yaj~N/aH kalpate
|p6     sphy/aH //

|c6,8,3
|p1     ca kap/AlAni cAgnihotrah/avaNI /S/UrpaM ca k.rSNAjin/aM ca /S/amyA col/UkhalaM ca m/usalaM ca d.rS/ac c/opalA cait/Ani v/ai d/a/Sa yaj~NAyudh/Ani y/a ev/aM v/eda mukhat\o 'sya yaj~N/aH kalpate

|p2     t/An /ud amimIta

|c7,1,4

|p2     s/a tv/A /iDAM /upa hvayeta y/a /iDAM upah/UyAtm/Anam /iDAyAm upahv/ayet/eti / s/A naH priy/A supr/atUrtir magh/on/Ity Ah/eDAm ev/opah/UyAtm/Anam iDAyAm /upa hvayate / vy\astam iva v/A et/ad yaj~N/asya y/ad /iDA sAm/i prA/Sn/anti //

|c7,1,5
|p1     sAm/i mArjayanta et/at pr/ati v/A /asurANAM yaj~N/o vy \achidyata

|p3     s/aMtatyai / v/i/Sve dev/A ih/a mAdayantAm /ity Aha saMt/atyaiv/a yaj~N/aM dev/ebhy/o 'nu di/Sati / y/AM v/ai //

|c7,1,6
|p1     yaj~N/e d/akSiNAM d/adAti t/Am asya pa/S/av/o 'nu s/aM krAmanti
|p2     s/a eS/a IjAn\o 'pa/S/ur bh/Avuko y/ajamAnena kh/alu v/ai t/at kAry\am /ity Ahur y/athA devatr/A datt/aM kurvIt/Atm/an pa/S/Un ram/ayet/eti / br/adhna p/invasv/ety Aha
|p3     yaj~N/o v/ai bradhn/o yaj~N/am ev/a t/an mahayaty /atho devatr/aiv/a datt/aM kuruta Atm/an pa/S/Un ramayate / d/adato me m/A kSAy/Ity Ah/AkSitim ev/opaiti / kurvat/o me m/opa dasad /ity Aha
|p4     bhUm/Anam ev/opaiti //

|c7,2,1
|p1     s/a~M/SravA ha sauvarcanas/as t/umiMjam /aupoditim uvAca
|p2     y/at sattr/iNA~M h/otAbhUH k/Am /iDAm /upAhvathA /iti

|p7     g/aur v/ai //

|c7,7,1
|p1 {a}  d/eva savitaH pr/a suva yaj~N/am pr/a suva yaj~N/apatim bh/agAya divy/o gandharv/aH ketap/UH ket/aM naH punAtu v/Acas p/atir v/Acam ady/a svadAti naH /
|p2 {b}  /indrasya v/ajro 'si v/Artraghnas tv/ayAy/aM v.rtr/aM vadhyAt /
|p3 {c}  vAj/asya n/u prasav/e mAt/aram mah/Im /aditiM n/Ama v/acasA karAmahe / y/asyAm id/aM v/i/Svam bh/uvanam Aviv/e/Sa t/asyAM no dev/aH savit/A dh/arma sAviSat /
|p4 {d}  aps/u //

|c7,7,2
|p1     ant/ar am/rtam aps/u bheSaj/am ap/Am ut/a pr/a/SastiSv /a/SvA bhavatha vAjinaH //
|p2 {e}  vAy/ur vA tvA m/anur vA tvA gandharv/AH sapt/avi~M/SatiH / t/e /agre /a/Svam Ayu~Njan t/e asmi~N jav/am /AdadhuH //
|p3 {f}  /apAM napAd A/Suheman y/a Urm/iH kak/udmAn pr/atUrtir vAjas/Atamas t/enAyaM v/Aja~M set \
|p4 {g}  v/iSNoH kr/amo 'si v/iSNoH krAnt/am asi v/iSNor v/ikrAntam asi \
|p5 {h}  a.Nk/au nya.Nk/Av abh/ito r/athaM y/au dhvAnt/aM vAtAgr/am /anu saMc/arantau / dUr/ehetir indriy/AvAn patatr/i t/e no 'gn/ayaH p/aprayaH pArayantu //

|c7,8,1
|p1 {a}  dev/asyAh/a~M savit/uH prasav/e b/rhasp/atinA vAjaj/itA v/AjaM jeSam \
|p2 {b}  dev/asyAh/a~M savit/uH prasav/e b/rhasp/atinA vAjaj/itA v/arSiSThaM n/Aka~M ruheyam
|p3 {c}  /indrAya v/AcaM vadat/endraM v/AjaM jApayat/endro v/Ajam ajayit /

|p5 {e}  /arvAsi s/aptir asi vAjy \asi
|p6 {f}  v/Ajino v/AjaM dhAvata mar/utAm prasav/e jayata v/i y/ojanA mimIdhvam /adhvana skabhnIta //

|c7,8,2
|p1     k/ASThAM gachata
|p2 {g}  v/AjevAje 'vata vAjino no dh/aneSu viprA am.rtA .rtaj~NAH / asy/a m/adhvaH pibata mAd/ayadhvaM t.rpt/A yAta path/ibhir devay/AnaiH //
|p3 {h}  t/e no /arvanto havana/Sr/uto h/avaM v/i/Sve /S.rNvantu vAj/inaH /
|p4 {i}  mit/adravaH
|p5 {i}  sahasras/A medh/asAtA saniSy/avaH / mah/o y/e r/anta~M samith/eSu jabhrir/e /S/aM no bhavantu vAj/ino hav/eSu
|p6 {k}  dev/atAtA mit/adravaH svark/AH / jambh/ayant/o 'hiM v/rka~M r/akSA~Msi s/anemy asm/ad yuyavan //

|c7,8,3
|p1     /amIvAH //
|p2 {l}  eS/a sy/a vAj/I kSipaN/iM turaNyati grIv/AyAm baddh/o apikakS/a As/ani / kr/atuM dadhikr/A /anu saMt/avItvat path/Am /a.NkA~Msy /anv Ap/anIphaNat //
|p3 {m}  ut/a smAsya dr/avatas turaNyat/aH parN/aM n/a v/er /anu vAti pragardh/inaH / /Syen/asyeva dhr/ajato a.Nkas/am p/ari dadhikr/AvNaH sah/orj/A t/aritrataH //
|p4 {n}  /A mA v/Ajasya prasav/o jagamyAd /A dy/AvAp.rthiv/I vi/Sv/a/SambhU / /A mA gantAm pit/arA //

|c7,8,4
|p1     mAt/arA c/A mA s/omo am.rtatv/Aya gamyAt //
|p2 {o}  v/Ajino vAjajito v/Aja~M sariSy/anto v/AjaM jeSy/anto b/rhasp/ater bhAg/am /ava jighrata //
|p3 {p}  v/Ajino vAjajito v/Aja~M sas.rv/A~Mso v/AjaM jigiv/A~Mso b/rhasp/ater bhAg/e n/i m.rDDhvam
|p4 {q}  iy/aM vaH s/A saty/A saMdh/AbhUd y/Am /indreNa sam/adhaddhvam
|p5 {r}  /ajIjipata vanaspataya /indraM v/AjaM v/i mucyadhvam //

|c7,9,1
|p1 {a}  kS/atrasy/olbam asi kSatr/asya y/onir asi
|p2 {b}  j/Aya /ehi s/uvo r/ohAva r/ohAva h/i s/uvar ah/aM nAv ubh/ayoH s/uvo rokSyAmi
|p3 {c}  v/Aja/S ca prasav/a/S cApij/a/S ca kr/atu/S ca s/uva/S ca mUrdh/A ca vy/a/Sniya/S cAntyAyan/a/S c/Antya/S ca bhauvan/a/S ca bh/uvana/S c/Adhipati/S ca /
|p4 {d}  /Ayur yaj~N/ena kalpatAm prAN/o yaj~N/ena kalpatAm apAn/aH //

|c7,9,2
|p1     yaj~N/ena kalpatAM vyAn/o yaj~N/ena kalpatAM c/akSur yaj~N/ena kalpatA~M /Sr/otraM yaj~N/ena kalpatAm m/ano yaj~N/ena kalpatAM v/Ag yaj~N/ena kalpatAm Atm/A yaj~N/ena kalpatAM yaj~N/o yaj~N/ena kalpatAm \
|p2 {e}  s/uvar dev/A~M aganmAm/rtA abhUma praj/ApateH praj/A abhUma
|p3 {f}  s/am ah/am praj/ayA s/am m/ayA praj/A s/am ah/a~M rAy/as p/oSeNa s/am m/ayA rAy/as p/oSas \
|p4 {g}  /annAya tvAnn/AdyAya tvA v/AjAya tvA vAjajity/Ayai tvA \
|p5 {h}  am/rtam asi p/uSTir asi praj/ananam asi //

|c7,10,1
|p1 {a}  v/Ajasyem/am prasav/aH suSuve /agre s/oma~M r/AjAnam /oSadhISv aps/u / t/A asm/abhyam m/adhumatIr bhavantu vay/a~M rASTr/e jAgriyAma pur/ohitAH //
|p2 {b}  v/Ajasyed/am prasav/a /A babhUvem/A ca v/i/SvA bh/uvanAni sarv/ataH / s/a vir/Ajam p/ary eti prajAn/an praj/am p/uSTiM vardh/ayamAno asm/e //
|p3 {c}  v/Ajasyem/Am prasav/aH /Si/Sriye d/ivam im/A ca v/i/SvA bh/uvanAni samr/AT / /aditsantaM dApayatu prajAn/an ray/im //

|c7,10,2
|p1     ca naH s/arvavIrAM n/i yachatu //

|c7,12,1
|p1 {a}  upayAm/ag.rhIto 'si n.rS/adaM tvA druS/adam bhuvanas/adam /indrAya j/uSTaM g.rhNAmy eS/a te y/onir /indrAya tvA \

|p3 {f}  ay/A viSTh/A jan/ayan k/arvarANi s/a h/i gh/rNir ur/ur v/arAya gAt/uH / s/a pr/aty /ud aid dhar/uNo m/adhvo /agra~M sv/AyAM y/at tan/uvAM tan/Um /airayata /

|c7,13,1
|p1 {a}  /anv /aha m/AsA /anv /id v/anAny /anv /oSadhIr /anu p/arvatAsaH / /anv /indra~M r/odasI vAva/SAn/e /anv /Apo Ajihata j/AyamAnam //
|p2 {b}  /anu te dAyi mah/a indriy/Aya satr/A te v/i/Svam /anu v.rtrah/atye / /anu kSatr/am /anu s/aho yajatr/endra dev/ebhir /anu te n.rS/ahye /

|p1     m/arate p/atiH //

|p3 {e}  y/o jAt/a ev/a pratham/o m/anasvAn dev/o dev/An kr/atunA pary/abhUSat / y/asya /S/uSmAd r/odasI /abhyasetAm n.rmN/asya mahn/A s/a janAsa /indraH //

|p1 pr/a yandhi //

|p3 {k}  pradAt/A vajr/I v.rSabh/as turAS/AT chuSm/I r/AjA v.rtrah/A somap/AvA / asm/in yaj~N/e barh/iSy /A niS/ady/AthA bhava y/ajamAnAya /S/aM y/oH //

|c8,1,1
|p1     /anumatyai puroD/A/Sam aST/AkapAlaM n/ir vapati dhen/ur d/akSiNA

|c8,7,1

|c8,7,2

|p6 {h}  y/ad v/aste t/ad d/akSiNA //

|p22    /a/Svo d/akSiNA //

|c8,9,1
|p1     bArhaspaty/aM car/uM n/ir vapati brahm/aNo g.rh/e /Sitip.rSTh/o d/akSiNA \
|p2     aindr/am /ekAda/SakapAla~M rAjany\asya g.rh/a .rSabh/o d/akSiNA \
|p3     Adity/aM car/um m/ahiSyai g.rh/e dhen/ur d/akSiNA
|p4     nair.rt/aM car/um pariv.rkty\ai g.rh/e k.rSN/AnAM vrIhIN/AM nakh/anirbhinnaM k.rSN/A kUT/A d/akSiNA \
|p5     Agney/am aST/AkapAla~M senAny\o g.rh/e h/iraNyaM d/akSiNA
|p6     vAruN/aM d/a/SakapAla~M sUt/asya g.rh/e mah/AniraSTo d/akSiNA
|p7     mArut/a~M sapt/akapAlaM grAmaNy\o g.rh/e p/r/Snir d/akSiNA

|c8,9,2
|p1     kSatt/ur g.rh/a upadhvast/o d/akSiNA \

|p4 {q}  s/omApUSaNA j/ananA rayIN/AM j/ananA div/o j/ananA p.rthivy/AH / jAt/au v/i/Svasya bh/uvanasya gop/au dev/A ak.rNvann am/rtasya n/Abhim //

|bTS2
|c1,1,1
|p1     vAyavy\a~M /Svet/am /A labheta bh/UtikAmas \
|p2     vAy/ur v/ai kS/epiSThA dev/atA
|p3     vAy/um ev/a sv/ena bhAgadh/eyen/opadhAvati
|p4     s/a ev/ainam bh/UtiM gamayati
|p5     bh/avaty ev/a \

|p1     bhavati

|p5     et/asmin v/ai t/at sah/asram /adhy atiSThat

|c1,11,1
|p1 {a}  /indraM vo vi/Sv/atas p/ari \
|p2 {b}  /indraM n/aras \
|p3 {c}  m/aruto y/ad dha vo div/as \
|p4 {d}  y/A vaH /S/arma
|p5 {e}  bh/areSv /indra~M suh/ava~M havAmahe~Mhom/uca~M suk/rtaM d/aivyaM j/anam / agn/im mitr/aM v/aruNa~M sAt/aye bh/agaM dy/AvAp.rthiv/I mar/utaH svast/aye //
|p6 {f}  mam/attu naH p/arijmA vasarh/A mam/attu v/Ato ap/AM v/rSaNvAn / /Si/SIt/am indrAparvatA yuv/aM nas t/an no v/i/Sve varivasyantu dev/AH
|p7 {g}  priy/A vo n/Ama //

|c1,11,2
|p1     huve tur/ANAm / /A y/at t.rp/an maruto vAva/SAn/AH //
|p2 {h}  /Sriy/ase k/am bhAn/ubhiH s/am mimikSire t/e ra/Sm/ibhis t/a /rkvabhiH sukhAd/ayaH / t/e v/A/SImanta iSm/iNo /abhIravo vidr/e priy/asya m/Arutasya dh/AmnaH //
|p3 {i}  agn/iH pratham/o v/asubhir no avyAt s/omo rudr/ebhir abh/i rakSatu tm/anA / /indro mar/udbhir .rtudh/A k.rNotv Adity/air no v/aruNaH s/a~M /Si/SAtu //
|p4 {k}  s/aM no dev/o v/asubhir agn/iH s/am //

|c1,11,3

|c2,5,4
|p1     ev/a tejasy \annAd/a indriyAv/I pa/Sum/An bhavati \
|p2     /ava v/A eS/a suvarg/Al lok/Ac chidyate y/o dar/SapUrNamAsayAj/I s/ann amAvAsy\AM vA paurNamAs/IM vAtipAd/ayati suvarg/Aya h/i lok/Aya dar/SapUrNamAs/Av ijy/ete
|p3     vai/SvAnar/aM dv/Ada/SakapAlaM n/ir vaped amAvAsy\AM vA paurNamAs/IM vAtip/Adya
|p4     saMvatsar/o v/A agn/ir vai/SvAnar/aH saMvatsar/am ev/a prINAty /atho saMvatsar/am ev/AsmA /upa dadhAti suvarg/asya lok/asya s/amaSTyai //

|c2,5,5
|p1     /atho dev/atA ev/AnvAr/abhya suvarg/aM lok/am eti
|p2     vIrah/A v/A eS/a dev/AnAM y\o 'gn/im udvAs/ayate n/a v/A et/asya brAhmaN/A .rtAy/avaH pur/Annam akSan \
|p3     Agney/am aST/AkapAlaM n/ir vapet \
|p4     vai/SvAnar/aM dv/Ada/SakapAlam agn/im udvAsayiSy/an
|p5     y/ad aST/AkapAlo bh/avaty aST/AkSarA gAyatr/I gAyatr\o 'gn/ir y/AvAn ev/Agn/is t/asmA Atithy/aM karoti \
|p6     /atho y/athA j/anaM yat\e 'vas/aM kar/oti tAd/rk //

|c2,5,6
|p1     ev/a t/at \
|p2     dv/Ada/SakapAlo vai/SvAnar/o bhavati

|p4     Ady\am asy/Annam bhavati

|c2,10,1
|p1     as/Av Adity/o n/a vy \arocata t/asmai dev/AH pr/Aya/Scittim aichan t/asmA et/a~M somAraudr/aM car/uM n/ir avapan t/enaiv/Asmin r/ucam adadhus \

|c2,10,3
|p1     bheSaj/am ev/Asmai karoti
|p2     y/adi bibhIy/Ad du/Sc/armA bhaviSyAm/Iti somApauSN/aM car/uM n/ir vapet saumy/o v/ai dev/atayA p/uruSaH pauSN/AH pa/S/avaH sv/ayaiv/Asmai dev/atayA pa/S/ubhis tv/acaM karoti n/a du/Sc/armA bhavati
|p3     somAraudr/aM car/uM n/ir vapet praj/AkAmaH s/omo v/ai retodh/A agn/iH praj/AnAm prajanayit/A s/oma ev/Asmai r/eto d/adhAtya gan/iH praj/Am pr/a janayati vind/ate //

|c2,10,4
|p1     praj/Am \
|p2     somAraudr/aM car/uM n/ir vaped abhic/arant saumy/o v/ai dev/atayA p/uruSa eS/a rudr/o y/ad agn/iH sv/AyA ev/ainaM dev/atAyai niSkr/Iya rudr/Ay/Api dadhAti t/Ajag /Artim /Archati
|p3     somAraudr/aM car/uM n/ir vapej jy/ogAmayAvI s/omaM v/A et/asya r/aso gachaty agn/i~M /S/arIraM y/asya jy/og Am/ayati s/omAd ev/Asya r/asaM niSkrIN/Aty agn/eH /S/arIram ut/a y/adi //

|c2,10,5
|p1     it/Asur bh/avati j/Ivaty ev/a somArudr/ayor v/A et/aM grasit/a~M h/otA n/iS khidati s/a I/Svar/a /Artim /Artor anaDv/An h/otrA d/eyo v/ahnir v/A anaDv/An v/ahnir h/otA v/ahninaiv/a v/ahnim Atm/Ana~M sp.rNoti
|p2     somAraudr/aM car/uM n/ir vaped y/aH kAm/ayeta sv/e 'smA Ay/atane bhr/At.rvyaM janayeyam /iti v/edim parig/rhyArdh/am uddhany/Ad ardh/aM n/Ardh/am barh/iSa st.rNIy/Ad ardh/aM n/Ardh/am idhm/asyAbhyAdadhy/Ad ardh/aM n/a sv/a ev/AsmA Ay/atane bhr/At.rvyaM janayati //

|c2,11,1
|p1     aindr/am /ekAda/SakapAlaM n/ir vapen mArut/a~M sapt/akapAlaM gr/AmakAmas \

|c3,3,1
|p1     dev/A v/ai sattr/am Asat/arddhiparimitaM y/a/SaskAmas
|p2     t/eSA~M s/oma~M r/AjAnaM y/a/Sa Archat
|p3     s/a gir/im /ud ait
|p4     t/am agn/ir /an/Ud ait
|p5     t/Av agn/I/S/omau s/am abhavatAm \

|c3,11,5
|p1     gh.rt/aM n/iS pibaty /Ayur v/ai gh.rt/am am/rta~M h/iraNyam am/rtAd ev/Ayur n/iS pibati
|p2     /Sat/amAnam bhavati /Sat/AyuH p/uruSaH /Sat/endriya /AyuSy ev/endriy/e pr/ati tiSThati \
|p3     /atho kh/alu y/AvatIH s/amA eSy/an m/anyeta t/AvanmAna~M syAt s/am.rddhyai \
|p4     im/am agna /AyuSe v/arcase k.rdh/Ity Ah/Ayur ev/Asmin v/arco dadhAti / v/i/Sve devA j/aradaSTir y/ath/Asad /ity Aha
|p5     j/aradaSTim ev/ainaM karoti \
|p6     agn/ir /AyuSmAn /iti h/astaM g.rhNAti \
|p7     et/e v/ai dev/A /AyuSmantas t/a ev/Asminn /Ayur dadhati s/arvam /Ayur eti //

|c3,12,1
|p1     praj/Apatir v/aruNAy/A/Svam anayat
|p2     s/a sv/AM devv/atAm Archat
|p3     s/a p/ary adIryata
|p4     s/a et/aM vAruN/aM c/atuSkapAlam apa/Syat
|p5     t/aM n/ir avapat
|p6     t/ato v/ai s/a varuNapA/S/Ad amucyata
|p7     v/aruNo v/A et/aM g.rhNAti y/o '/Svam pratig.rhN/Ati
|p8     y/Avato '/SvAn pratig.rhNIy/At t/Avato vAruN/A~N c/atuSkapAlAn n/ir vapet \
|p9     v/aruNam ev/a sv/ena bhAgadh/eyen/opa dhAvati
|p10    s/a ev/ainaM varuNapA/S/An mu~Ncati //

|c3,12,2
|p1     c/atuSkapAlA bhavanti
|p2     c/atuSpAd dhy /a/SvaH
|p3     s/am.rddhyai \
|p4     /ekam /atiriktaM n/ir vaped y/am ev/a pratig.rh/I bh/avati y/aM vA n/Adhy/eti
|p5     t/asmAd ev/a varuNapA/S/An mucyate
|p6     y/ady /aparam pratigrAh/I sy/At saury/am /ekakapAlam /anu n/ir vapet \
|p7     am/um ev/Adity/am ucc/Ar/aM kurute \
|p8     ap\o 'vabh.rth/am /avaiti \
|p9     aps/u v/ai v/aruNaH
|p10    sAkS/Ad ev/a v/aruNam /ava yajate \
|p11    aponaptr/IyaM car/um p/unar /etya n/ir vapet \
|p12    aps/uyonir v/A /a/SvaH
|p13    sv/Am ev/ainaM y/oniM gamayati
|p14    s/a ena~M /SAnt/a /upa tiSThate //

|c3,13,1
|p1     y/A vAm indrAvaruNA yatavy\A tan/Us t/ayem/am /a~Mhaso mu~Ncatam \
|p2     y/A vAm indrAvaruNA sahasy\A rakSasy\A tejasy\A tan/Us t/ayem/am /a~Mhaso mu~Ncatam \
|p3     y/o vAm indrAvaruNAv agn/au sr/Amas t/aM vAm et/en/Ava yaje
|p4     y/o vAm indrAvaruNA dvip/Atsu pa/S/uSu c/atuSpAtsu goSTh/e g.rh/eSv apsv /oSadhISu v/anasp/atiSu sr/Amas t/aM vAm et/en/Ava yaje \
|p5     /indro v/A et/asya //

|c3,13,2
|p1     indriy/eN/apa krAmati v/aruNa enaM varuNapA/S/ena g.rhNAti y/aH pApm/anA g.rhIt/o bh/avati
|p2     y/aH pApm/anA g.rhIt/aH sy/At t/asmA et/Am aindrAvaruN/Im payasy\AM n/ir vaped /indra ev/Asminn indriy/aM dadhAti v/aruNa enaM varuNapA/S/An mu~Ncati
|p3     payasy\A bhavati p/ayo h/i v/A et/asmAd apakr/Amaty /athaiS/a pApm/anA g.rhIt/o y/at payasy\A bh/avati p/aya ev/Asmin t/ayA dadhAti
|p4     payasy\AyAm //

|c3,14,1

|c4,6,2
|p1     mithun/am madhyat/o dadhAti p/uSTyai praj/ananAya

|p12    p/uSyati praj/ayA pa/S/ubhis \
|p13    /atho y/ad et/A /AhutIr juh/oti pr/atiSThityai //

|c4,7,1
|p1 {a}  mArut/am asi mar/utAm /ojo 'p/AM dh/ArAm bhinddhi
|p2 {b}  ram/ayata marutaH /Syen/am Ay/inam m/anojavasaM v/rSaNa~M suv.rkt/im / y/ena /S/ardha ugr/am /avas.rSTam /eti t/ad a/SvinA p/ari dhatta~M svast/i //
|p3 {c}  purovAt/o v/arSa~N jinv/ar Av/rt sv/AhA vAt/Avad v/arSann ugr/ar Av/rt sv/AhA stan/ayan v/arSan bhIm/ar Av/rt sv/AhAna/Sany \avasph/Urjan didy/ud v/arSan tveS/ar Av/rt sv/AhAtirAtr/aM v/arSan pUrt/ir Av/rt //

|c4,7,2
|p1     sv/AhA bah/u hAy/am av.rSAd /iti /Srut/ar Av/rt sv/AhAt/apati v/arSan vir/AD Av/rt sv/AhAvasph/Urjan didy/ud v/arSan bhUt/ar Av/rt sv/AhA
|p2 {d}  m/AndA v/A/SAH /S/undhyUr /ajirAH / jy/otiSmatIs t/amasvarIr /undatIH s/uphenAH / m/itrabh.rtaH kS/atrabh.rtaH s/urASTrA ih/a mAvata
|p3 {e}  v/rSNo /a/Svasya saMd/Anam asi v/rSTyai tv/opa nahyAmi //

|c4,8,1
|p1 {a}  d/evA vasavyA /agne soma sUrya / d/evAH /SarmaNyA m/itrAvaruNAryaman / d/evAH sapItay/o 'pAM napAd A/Suheman / udn/o datto 'dadh/im bhintta div/aH parj/anyAd ant/arikSAt p.rthivy/As t/ato no v/rSTyAvata
|p2 {b}  d/ivA cit t/amaH k.rNvanti parj/anyenodavAh/ena / p.rthiv/IM y/ad vyund/anti //
|p3 {c}  /A y/aM n/araH sud/Anavo dadA/S/uSe div/aH k/o/Sam /acucyavuH / v/i parj/anyAH s.rjanti r/odasI /anu dh/anvanA yanti //

|c4,8,2
|p1     v.rST/ayaH //
|p2 {d}  /ud IrayathA marutaH samudrat/o yUy/aM v.rST/iM varSayathA purISiNaH / n/a vo dasrA /upa dasyanti dhen/avaH /Subh/aM yAt/Am /anu r/athA av.rtsata //
|p3 {e}  s.rj/A v.rST/iM div/a /Adbh/iH samudr/am p.rNa / abj/A asi prathamaj/A b/alam asi samudr/iyam //
|p4 {f}  /un nambhaya p.rthiv/Im bhinddh/Id/aM divy/aM n/abhaH / udn/o divy/asya no deh/I/SAno v/i s.rjA d/rtim //
|p5 {g}  y/e dev/A div/ibhAgA y\e 'nt/arikSabhAgA y/e p.rthiv/ibhAgAH / t/a im/aM yaj~N/am avantu t/a id/aM kS/etram /A vi/Santu t/a id/aM kS/etram /anu v/i vi/Santu //

|p1 {a}  n/avonavo bhavati j/AyamAn/o 'hnAM ket/ur uS/asAm ety /agre / bhAg/aM dev/ebhyo v/i dadhAty Ay/an pr/a candr/amAs tirati dIrgh/am /AyuH //

|c4,14,5
|p1 ca //
|p2 {q}  v/i/Sve dev/A .rtAv/rdha .rt/ubhir havana/Sr/utaH / j/uSantAM y/ujyam p/ayaH //
|p3 {r}  v/i/Sve devAH /S.rNut/em/a~M h/avam me y/e ant/arikSe y/a /upa dy/avi STh/a / y/e agnijihv/A ut/a vA y/ajatrA As/adyAsm/in barh/iSi mAdayadhvam //

|c5,1,1
|p1     vi/Sv/arUpo v/ai tvASTr/aH pur/ohito dev/AnAm AsIt svasr/Iy/o 'surANAm \
|p2     t/asya tr/INi /SIrS/ANy Asant somap/Ana~M surAp/Anam ann/Adanam \
|p3     s/a praty/akSaM dev/ebhyo bhAg/am avadat par/o'kSam /asurebhyaH s/arvasmai v/ai praty/akSam bhAg/aM vadanti y/asmA ev/a par/o'kSaM v/adanti t/asya bhAg/a udit/as
|p4     t/asmAd /indro 'bibhed
|p5     Id/r.N v/ai rASTr/aM v/i pary/Avartayat/Iti
|p6     t/asya v/ajram Ad/Aya /SIrS/ANy achinad y/at somap/Anam //

|c5,1,2
|p1     /AsIt s/a kap/i~Njalo 'bhavat y/at surAp/Ana~M s/a kalav/i.Nko y/ad ann/Adana~M s/a tittir/is / t/asyA~Njal/inA bramahaty/Am /upAg.rhNAt t/A~M saMvatsar/aM abibhas t/am bhUt/Any abhy \akro/San
|p2     br/ahmahann /iti / s/a p.rthiv/Im /upAsIdad
|p3     asy/ai brahmahaty/Ayai t/rtIyam pr/ati g.rhAN/eti
|p4     s/AbravId
|p5     v/araM v.rNai khAt/At parAbhaviSy/antI manye t/ato m/A par/A bhUvam /iti
|p6     pur/A te //

|c5,1,3
|p1     saMvatsar/Ad /api rohAd /ity abravIt t/asmAt pur/A saMvatsar/At p.rthivy/ai khAt/am /api rohati v/Arev.rta~M hy \asyai
|p2     t/rtIyam brahmahaty/Ayai pr/aty ag.rhNAt t/at sv/ak.rtam /iriNam abhavat t/asmAd /AhitAgniH /Sraddh/AdevaH sv/ak.rta /iriNe n/Ava syed brahmahaty/Ayai hy \eS/a v/arNaH / s/a v/anasp/atIn /upAsIdad
|p3     asy/ai brahmahaty/Ayai t/rtIyam pr/ati g.rhNIt/eti

|p3     t/rtIyam brahmahaty/Ayai pr/aty ag.rhNant s/a niryAs\o 'bhavat t/asmAn niryAs/asya n/A/Sy\am brahmahaty/Ayai hy \eS/a v/arN/o 'tho kh/alu y/a ev/a l/ohito y/o vAvr/a/ScanAn niry/eSati t/asya n/A/Sy\am //

|c5,6,1
|p1     eS/a v/ai devarath/o y/ad dar/SapUrNamAs/au
|p2     y/o dar/SapUrNamAs/Av iSTv/A s/omena y/ajate r/athaspaSTa ev/Avas/Ane v/are dev/AnAm /ava syati \
|p3     et/Ani v/A /a.NgAp/arU~MSi saMvatsar/asya y/ad dar/SapUrNamAs/au
|p4     y/a ev/aM vidv/An dar/SapUrNamAs/au y/ajat/e '.NgAp/arU~MSy ev/a saMvatsar/asya pr/ati dadhAti \
|p5     et/e v/ai saMvatsar/asya c/akSuSI y/ad dar/SapUrNamAs/au
|p6     y/a ev/aM vidv/An dar/SapUrNamAs/au y/ajate t/AbhyAm ev/a suvarg/aM lok/am /anu pa/Syati //

|c5,6,2
|p1     eS/A v/ai dev/AnAM v/ikrAntir y/ad dar/SapUrNamAs/au
|p2     y/a ev/aM vidv/An dar/SapUrNamAs/au y/ajate dev/AnAm ev/a v/ikrAntim /anu v/i kramate \
|p3     eS/a v/ai devay/AnaH p/anthA y/ad dar/SapUrNamAs/au
|p4     y/a ev/aM vidv/An dar/SapUrNamAs/au y/ajate y/a ev/a devay/AnaH p/anthAs t/a~M sam/Arohati \
|p5     et/au v/ai dev/AnA~M h/arI y/ad dar/SapUrNamAs/au
|p6     y/a ev/aM vidv/An dar/SapUrNamAs/au y/ajate y/Av ev/a dev/AnA~M h/arI t/AbhyAm //

|c5,6,3
|p1     ev/aibhyo havy/aM vahati \
|p2     et/ad v/ai dev/AnAm Asy\aM y/ad dar/SapUrNamAs/au
|p3     y/a ev/aM vidv/An dar/SapUrNamAs/au y/ajate sAkS/Ad ev/a dev/AnAm Asy\e juhoti \
|p4     eS/a v/ai havirdhAn/I y/o dar/SapUrNamAsayAj/I
|p5     sAy/amprAtar agnihotr/aM juhoti y/ajate dar/SapUrNamAs/Av /aharahar havirdhAn/inA~M sut/as \
|p6     y/a ev/aM vidv/An dar/SapUrNamAs/au y/ajate havirdhAny \asm/Iti s/arvam ev/Asya barhiSy\aM datt/am bhavati
|p7     dev/A v/A /ahaH //

|c5,6,4
|p1     yaj~N/iyaM n/Avindan t/e dar/SapUrNamAs/Av apunan

|p6     s/omasya v/ai r/Aj~No 'rdham/Asasya r/AtrayaH p/atnaya Asan
|p7     t/AsAm amAvAsy\AM ca paurNamAs/IM ca n/opait //

|c5,6,5

|c5,11,3

|c6,3,6
|p1     gopIth/Aya
|p2     y/adi n/a/Syed A/Svin/aM dvikapAl/aM n/ir vaped dyAvAp.rthivy\Am /ekakapAlam a/Sv/inau v/ai dev/AnAm bhiS/ajau t/AbhyAm ev/Asmai bheSaj/aM karoti
|p3     dyAvAp.rthivy\a /ekakapAlo bhavaty an/ayor v/A et/an na/Syati y/an n/a/Syaty an/ayor ev/ainad vindati pr/atiSThityai //

|c6,4,1

|p2     /atho kh/alv Ahur
|p3     brAhmaN/A v/ai ch/andA~Ms/Iti
|p4     t/An ev/a t/ad yajati
|p5     dev/AnAM v/A iST/A dev/atA Asann /athAgn/ir n/od ajvalat t/aM dev/A /AhutIbhir anUyAj/eSv /anv avindan
|p6     y/ad anUyAj/An y/ajati \
|p7     agn/im ev/a t/at s/am inddhe \
|p8     et/adur v/ai n/AmAsur/a AsIt
|p9     s/a et/arhi yaj~N/asyA/S/iSam av.r.Nkta
|p10    y/ad brUy/Ad et/at //

|c6,9,5
|p1     u dyAvAp.rthivI bhadr/am abhUd /ity et/adum ev/Asur/aM yaj~N/asyA/S/iSaM gamayed

|p5     /omanvatI te 'sm/in yaj~N/e yajamAna dy/AvAp.rthiv/I //

|c1,3,2
|p1     praj/Am pa/S/Un y/ajamAnasya /S/amayitos \
|p2     y/arhi pa/S/um /AprItam /uda~NcaM n/ayanti t/arhi t/asya pa/Su/Sr/apaNa~M haret t/enaiv/ainam bhAg/inaM karoti
|p3     y/ajamAno v/A Ahavan/Iyas \
|p4     y/ajamAnaM v/A et/ad v/i karSante y/ad Ahavan/IyAt pa/Su/Sr/apaNa~M h/aranti
|p5     s/a vaiv/a sy/An nirmanthy\aM vA kuryAd y/ajamAnasya sAtmatv/Aya
|p6     y/adi pa/S/or avad/AnaM n/a/Syed /Ajyasya pratyAkhy/Ayam /ava dyet
|p7     s/aiv/a t/ataH pr/Aya/Scittis \
|p8     y/e pa/S/uM vimathnIr/an y/as t/An kAm/ayeta \
|p9     /Artim /Archeyur /iti kuv/id a.Ng/eti n/amov.rktivatyarc/AgnIdhre juhuyAt \
|p10    n/amov.rktim ev/aiSAM v.r.Nkte tAjag /Artim /Archanti //

|c1,4,1
|p1 {a}  praj/Apater j/AyamAnAH praj/A jAt/A/S ca y/A im/AH / t/asmai pr/ati pr/a vedaya cikitv/A~M /anu manyatAm //
|p2 {b}  im/am pa/S/um pa/Supate te ady/a badhn/Amy agne suk.rt/asya m/adhye / /anu manyasva suy/ajA yajAma j/uSTaM dev/AnAm id/am astu havy/am //
|p3 {c}  prajAn/antaH pr/ati g.rhNanti p/Urve prAN/am /a.NgebhyaH p/ary Ac/arantam / suvarg/aM yAhi path/ibhir devay/Anair /oSadhISu pr/ati tiSThA /S/arIraiH //
|p4 {d}  y/eSAm /I/Se //

|c1,4,2
|p1     pa/Sup/atiH pa/SUn/AM c/atuSpadAm ut/a ca dvip/adAm / n/iSkrIto 'y/aM yaj~N/iyam bhAg/am etu rAy/as p/oSA y/ajamAnasya santu //
|p2 {e}  y/e badhy/amAnam /anu badhy/amAnA abhy/aikSanta m/anasA c/akSuSA ca / agn/is t/A~M /agre pr/a mumoktu dev/aH praj/ApatiH praj/ayA saMvidAn/aH //
|p3 {f}  y/a AraNy/AH pa/S/avo vi/Sv/arUpA v/irUpAH s/anto bahudh/aikarUpAH / vAy/us t/A~M /agre pr/a mumoktu dev/aH praj/ApatiH praj/ayA saMvidAn/aH //
|p4 {g}  pramu~Nc/amAnAH //

|c1,4,3
|p1     bh/uvanasya r/eto gAt/uM dhatta y/ajamAnAya devAH / up/Ak.rta~M /Sa/SamAn/aM y/ad /asthAj jIv/aM dev/AnAm /apy etu p/AthAH //

|p3 {i}  y/at pa/S/ur mAy/um /ak.rt/oro vA padbh/ir Ahat/e / agn/ir mA t/asmAd /enaso v/i/SvAn mu~Ncatv /a~MhasaH //
|p4 {k}  /S/amitAra up/etana yaj~N/am //

|c1,4,4

|c1,11,8

|p2 {ee}  gh.rt/ena dy/AvAp.rthiv/I m/adhunA s/am ukSata p/ayasvatIH k.rNut/Apa /oSadhIH / /UrjaM ca t/atra sumat/iM ca pinvatha y/atrA naro marutaH si~Nc/athA m/adhu //
|p3 {ff}  /ud u ty/am \
|p4 {gg}  citr/am //
|p5 {hh}  aurvabh.rguv/ac ch/ucim apnavAnav/ad /A huve / agn/i~M samudr/avAsasam //
|p6 {ii}  /A sav/a~M savit/ur yathA bh/agasyeva bhuj/i~M huve / agn/i~M samudr/avAsasam //
|p7 {kk}  huv/e v/AtasvanaM kav/im parj/anyakrandya~M s/ahaH / agn/i~M samudr/avAsasam //

|c2,1,1
|p1     y/o v/ai p/avamAnAnAm anvAroh/An vidv/An y/ajat/e 'nu p/avamAnAn /A rohati n/a p/avamAnebhy/o 'va chidyate

|c2,8,1
|p1 {a}  /Syen/Aya p/atvane sv/AhA v/aT svay/amabhigUrtAya n/amo viSTambh/Aya dh/armaNe sv/AhA v/aT svay/amabhigUrtAya n/amo paridh/aye janapr/athanAya sv/AhA v/aT svay/amabhigUrtAya n/ama Urj/e h/otrANA~M sv/AhA v/aT svay/amabhigUrtAya n/amaH p/ayase h/otrANA~M sv/AhA v/aT svay/amabhigUrtAya n/amaH praj/Apataye m/anave sv/AhA v/aT svay/amabhigUrtAya n/ama .rt/am .rtapAH suvarvAT sv/AhA v/aT svay/amabhigUrtAya n/amas

|c2,8,2
|p1     AhuH praj/A n/irbhaktA anutapy/amAnA madhavy\au stok/Av /apa t/au rarAdha s/aM nas t/AbhyA~M s.rjatu vi/Sv/akarmA
|p2 {d}  ghor/A /rSayo n/amo astv ebhyaH / c/akSuSa eSAm m/anasa/S ca saMdh/au b/rhasp/ataye m/ahi S/ad dyum/an n/amaH / n/amo vi/Sv/akarmaNe s/a u pAtv asm/An
|p3 {e}  anany/Ant somap/An m/anyamAnaH / prAN/asya vidv/Ant samar/e n/a dh/Ira /ena/S cak.rv/An m/ahi baddh/a eSAm / t/aM vi/Svakarman //

|c2,8,3
|p1     pr/a mu~NcA svast/aye
|p2 {f}  y/e bhakS/ayanto n/a v/asUny An.rh/uH / y/An agn/ayo 'nv/atapyanta dh/iSNiyA iy/aM t/eSAm avay/A d/uriSTyai sv\iSTiM nas t/AM k.rNotu vi/Sv/akarmA
|p3 {g}  n/amaH pit/rbhyo abh/i y/e no /akhyan yaj~Nak/rto yaj~N/akAmAH sudev/A /akAmA vo d/akSiNAM n/a nInima m/A nas t/asmAd /enasaH pApayiSTa
|p4 {h}  y/Avanto v/ai sadasy\as t\e s/arve dakSiNy\as t/ebhyo y/o d/akSiNAM n/a //

|c2,8,4
|p1     n/ayed /aibhyo v.r/Scyeta y/ad vai/SvakarmaN/Ani juh/oti sadasy\An ev/a t/at prINAti \
|p2 {i}  asm/e devAso v/apuSe cikitsata y/am A/S/irA d/ampatI vAm/am a/Snut/aH / p/umAn putr/o jAyate vind/ate v/asv /atha v/i/Sve arap/A edhate g.rh/aH //
|p3 {k}  A/SIrdAy/A d/ampatI vAm/am a/SnutAm /ariSTo r/AyaH sacatA~M s/amoksA / y/a /Asicat s/aMdugdhaM kumbhy/A sah/eST/ena y/Amann /amatiM jahAtu s/aH //
|p4 {l}  sarpirgrIv/I //

|c2,8,5
|p1     p/Ivary asya jAy/A p/IvAnaH putr/A /ak.r/SAso asya / sah/a jAnir y/aH sumakhasy/amAna /indrAyA/S/ira~M sah/a kumbhy/AdAt //
|p2 {m}  A/S/Ir ma /Urjam ut/a suprajAstv/am /iSaM dadhAtu dr/aviNa~M s/avarcasam / saMj/ayan kS/etrANi s/ahasAh/am indra k.rNvAn/o any/A~M /adharAnt sap/atnAn //
|p3 {n}  bhUt/am asi bhUt/e ma dhA m/ukham asi m/ukham bhUyAsam \
|p4 {o}  dy/AvAp.rthiv/IbhyAM tvA p/ari g.rhNAmi
|p5 {p}  v/i/Sve tvA dev/A vai/SvAnarAH //

|c2,8,6
|p1     pr/a cyAvayantu
|p2 {q}  div/i dev/An d.r~MhAnt/arikSe v/ayA~Msi p.rthivy/Am p/ArthivAn
|p3 {r}  dhruv/aM dhruv/eNa hav/iS/Ava s/omaM nayAmasi / y/athA naH s/arvam /ij j/agad ayakSm/a~M sum/anA /asat //
|p4 {s}  y/athA na /indra /id v/i/SaH k/evalIH s/arvAH s/amanasaH k/arat / y/athA naH s/arvA /id d/i/So 'sm/AkaM k/evalIr /asan //

|c2,9,1
|p1     y/ad v/ai h/otAdhvary/um abhyAhv/ayate v/ajram enam abh/i pr/a vartayati \
|p2     /uktha/SA /ity Aha prAtaHsavan/am pratig/Irya tr/INy et/Any akS/arANi trip/adA gAyatr/I gAyatr/am prAtaHsavan/aM gAyatriy/aiv/a prAtaHsavan/e v/ajram ant/ar dhatte \
|p3     ukth/aM vAc/Ity Aha m/AdhyaMdina~M s/avanam pratig/Irya catv/Ary et/Any akS/arANi c/atuSpadA triST/up tr/aiSTubham m/AdhyaMdina~M s/avanaM triST/ubhaiv/a m/AdhyaMdine s/avane v/ajram ant/ar dhatte //

|c2,9,2
|p1     ukth/aM vAc/IndrAy/ety Aha t.rtIyasavan/am pratig/Irya sapt/ait/Any akS/arANi sapt/apadA /S/akvarI /SAkvar/o v/ajro v/ajreNaiv/a t.rtIyasavan/e v/ajram ant/ar dhatte
|p2     brahmavAd/ino vadanti
|p3     s/a tv/A adhvary/uH syAd y/o yathAsavan/am pratigar/e ch/andA~Msi sampAd/ayet t/ejaH prAtaHsavan/a Atm/an d/adhItendriy/am m/AdhyaMdine s/avane pa/S/U~Ms t.rtIyasavan/a iti \
|p4     /uktha/SA /ity Aha prAtaHsavan/am pratig/Irya tr/INy et/Any akS/arANi //

|c2,9,3
|p1     trip/adA gAyatr/I gAyatr/am prAtaHsavan/am prAtaHsavan/a ev/a pratigar/e ch/andA~Msi s/am pAdayati \
|p2     /atho t/ejo v/ai gAyatr/I t/ejaH prAtaHsavan/aM t/eja ev/a prAtaHsavan/a Atm/an dhatte \
|p3     ukth/aM vAc/Ity Aha m/AdhyaMdina~M savan/am pratig/Irya catv/Ary et/Any akS/arANi c/atuSpadA triST/up tr/aiSTubham m/AdhyaMdina~M s/avanam m/AdhyaMdina ev/a s/avane pratigar/e ch/andA~Msi s/am prAdayati \
|p4     /atho indriy/aM v/ai triST/ug indriy/am m/AdhyaMdina~M s/avanam //

|c2,9,4
|p1     indriy/am ev/a m/AdhyaMdine s/avana Atm/an dhatte \

|p4     y/ad v/ai h/otAdhvary/um abhyAhv/ayata Avy\am asmin dadhAti t/ad y/an n/a //

|c2,9,5
|p1     apah/anIta pur/Asya saMvatsar/Ad g.rh/a /A vevIran \

|p3     y/athA v/A /AyatAm prat/IkSata ev/am adhvary/uH pratigar/am pr/atIkSate

|c2,9,6

|c2,10,1
|p1 {a}  upayAm/ag.rhIto 'si vAkSas/ad asi vAkp/AbhyAM tvA kratup/AbhyAm asy/a yaj~N/asya dhruv/asy/AdhyakSAbhyAM g.rhNAmi \
|p2 {b}  upayAm/ag.rhIto 'sy .rtas/ad asi cakSuSp/AbhyAM tvA kratup/AbhyAm asy/a yaj~N/asya dhruv/asy/AdhyakSAbhyAM g.rhNAmi \

|c2,11,1

|p1     bhava y/ajamAnAya /S/aM y/oH //

|p4 {i}  ut/a mAt/A mahiS/am /anv avenad am/I tvA jahati putra dev/AH / /athAbravId v.rtr/am /indro haniSy/ant s/akhe viSNo vitar/aM v/i kramasva //

|c3,1,1
|p1 {a}  /agne tejasvin tejasv/I tv/aM dev/eSu bhUyAs t/ejasvantam m/Am /AyuSmantaM v/arcasvantam manuSy\eSu kuru dIkS/Ayai ca tvA t/apasa/S ca t/ejase juhomi

|c3,5,1
|p1 {a}  vAy/ur asi prAN/o n/Ama savit/ur /Adhipatye 'pAn/am me dAs \
|p2 {b}  c/akSur asi /Sr/otraM n/Ama daHt/ur /Adhipatya /Ayur me dAs \
|p3 {c}  rUp/am asi v/arNo n/Ama b/rhasp/ater /Adhipatye praj/Am me dAs \

|p7 {g}  .rt/asya //

|c3,5,2
|p1     tvA v/ibhUmane \
|p2 {h}  .rt/asya tvA v/idharmaNe \
|p3 {i}  .rt/asya tvA saty/Aya \
|p4 {k}  .rt/asya tvA jy/otiSe
|p5     praj/Apatir vir/Ajam apa/Syat t/ayA bhUt/aM ca bh/avyaM cAs.rjata t/Am /rSibhyas tir\o 'dadhAt t/AM jam/adagnis t/apasApa/Syat t/ayA v/ai s/a p/r/SnIn k/AmAn as.rjata t/at p/r/SnInAm p.r/Snitv/am \
|p6     y/at p/r/Snayo g.rhy/ante p/r/SnIn ev/a t/aiH k/AmAn y/ajamAn/o 'va runddhe
|p7     vAy/ur asi prAN/aH //

|c3,5,3
|p1     n/Am/ety Aha prANApAn/Av ev/Ava runddhe
|p2     c/akSur asi /Sr/otraM n/Amety Ah/Ayur ev/Ava runddhe
|p3     rUp/am asi v/arNo n/Am/ety Aha praj/Am ev/Ava runddhe \
|p4     .rt/am asi saty/aM n/Am/ety Aha kSatr/am ev/Ava runddhe
|p5     bhUt/am asi bh/avyaM n/Am/ety Aha pa/S/avo v/A ap/Am /oSadhInAM g/arbhaH pa/S/Un ev/a //

|c3,5,4
|p1     /ava runddhe \
|p2     et/Avad v/ai p/uruSam par/itas t/ad ev/Ava runddhe \
|p3     .rt/asya tvA vy\omana /ity Ahey/aM v/A .rt/asya vy\omem/Am ev/Abh/i jayati \
|p4     .rt/asya tvA v/ibhUmana /ity AhAnt/arikSam v/A .rt/asya v/ibhUmAnt/arikSam ev/Abh/i jayati \
|p5     .rt/asya tvA v/idharmaNa /ity Aha dy/aur v/A .rt/asya v/idharma d/ivam ev/Abh/i jayati \
|p6     .rt/asya //

|c3,5,5
|p1     tvA saty/Ay/ety Aha d/i/So v/A .rt/asya saty/aM d/i/Sa ev/Abh/i jayati \
|p2     .rt/asya tvA jy/otiSa /ity Aha suvarg/o v/ai lok/a .rt/asya jy/otiH suvarg/am ev/a lok/am abh/i jayati \
|p3     et/Avanto v/ai devalok/As t/An ev/Abh/i jayati
|p4     d/a/Sa s/am padyante d/a/SAkSarA vir/AD /annaM vir/AD vir/Ajy ev/Ann/Adye pr/ati tiSThati //

|c3,6,1
|p1     dev/A v/ai y/ad yaj~N/ena n/Av/Arundhata t/at p/arair /avArundhata
|p2     t/at p/arANAm paratv/am \

|c3,6,2

|c4,3,2

|c4,3,3
|p1     bhAgadh/eyen/opa dhAvati
|p2     s/a ev/ainam bh/UtiM gamayati
|p3     dyAvAp.rthivy\Am /A labheta k.rS/amANaH pratiSTh/AkAmas \
|p4     div/a ev/Asmai parj/anyo varSati vy \asy/Am /oSadhayo rohanti s/amardhukam asya sasy/am bhavati \
|p5     agnISom/IyAm /A labheta y/aH kAm/ayeta \
|p6     /annavAn annAd/aH syAm /iti \
|p7     agn/inaiv/Annam /ava runddhe s/omenAnn/Adyam
|p8     /annavAn ev/AnnAd/o bhavati
|p9     sArasvat/Im /A labheta y/aH //

|c4,3,4
|p1     I/Svar/o vAc/o v/aditoH s/an v/AcaM n/a v/adet \
|p2     v/Ag v/ai s/arasvatI

|c4,10,5

|p3     y/A te agne yaj~N/iyA tan/Us t/ayehy /A roh/ety Atm/ant sam/Arohayate
|p4     y/ajamAno v/A agn/er y/oniH sv/AyAm ev/ainaM y/onyA~M sam/Arohayate //

|c4,11,1
|p1 {a}  tv/am agne b.rh/ad v/ayo d/adhAsi deva dA/S/uSe / kav/ir g.rh/apatir y/uvA //
|p2 {b}  havyav/AD agn/ir aj/araH pit/A no vibh/ur vibh/AvA sud/r/SIko asm/e / sugArhapaty/AH s/am /iSo didIhy asmadr/iyak s/am mimIhi /Sr/avA~Msi //
|p3 {c}  tv/aM ca soma no v/a/So jIv/AtuM n/a marAmahe / priy/astotro v/anasp/atiH //
|p4 {d}  brahm/A dev/AnAm padav/IH kavIn/Am /rSir v/iprANAm mahiS/o m.rg/ANAm / /Syen/o g/rdhrANA~M sv/adhitir v/anAnA~M s/omaH //

|c4,11,2
|p1     pav/itram /aty eti r/ebhan //
|p2 {e}  /A vi/Sv/adeva~M s/atpati~M sUkt/air ady/A v.rNImahe / saty/asava~M savit/Aram //
|p3 {f}  /A saty/ena r/ajasA v/artamAno nive/S/ayann am/rtam m/artyaM ca / hirNy/ayena savit/A r/athenA dev/o yAti bh/uvanA vip/a/Syan //
|p4 {g}  y/athA no /aditiH k/arat p/a/Sve n/rbhyo y/athA g/ave / y/athA tok/Aya rudr/iyam //
|p5 {h}  m/A nas tok/e t/anaye m/A na /AyuSi m/A no g/oSu m/A //

|c4,11,3
|p1     no /a/SveSu rIriSaH / vIr/An m/A no rudra bhAmit/o vadhIr hav/iSmanto n/amasA vidhema te //
|p2 {i}  udapr/uto n/a v/ayo r/akSamANA v/Avadato abhr/iyasyeva gh/oSAH / giribhr/ajo n/orm/ayo m/adanto b/rhasp/atim abhy \ark/A anAvan //
|p3 {k}  ha~Ms/air iva s/akhibhir v/Avadadbhir a/Smanm/ayAni n/ahanA vy/asyan / b/rhasp/atir abhik/anikradad g/A ut/a pr/Astaud /uc ca vidv/An agAyat //
|p4 {l}  /endra sAnas/i~M ray/im //

|c4,11,4
|p1     saj/itvAna~M sadAs/aham / v/arSiSTham Ut/aye bhara //
|p2 {m}  pr/a sasAhiSe puruhUta /S/atrU~N jy/eSThas te /S/uSma ih/a rAt/ir astu / /indrA bhava d/akSiNenA v/asUni p/atiH s/indhUnAm asi rev/atInAm //
|p3 {n}  tv/a~M sut/asya pIt/aye sady/o v.rddh/o ajAyathAH / /indra jy/aiSThyAya sukrato //
|p4 {o}  bhuv/as tv/am indra br/ahmaNA mah/An bh/uvo v/i/SveSu s/avaneSu yaj~N/iyaH / bh/uvo n/R~M/S cyautn/o v/i/Svasmin bh/are jy/eSTha/S ca m/antraH //

|c4,11,5
|p1 vi/SvacarSaNe //
|p2 {p}  mitr/asya carSaNIdh/rtaH /Sr/avo dev/asya sAnas/im / saty/aM citr/a/Sravastamam //
|p3 {q}  mitr/o j/anAn yAtayati prajAn/an mitr/o dAdhAra p.rthiv/Im ut/a dy/Am / mitr/aH k.rST/Ir /animiSAbh/i caSTe saty/Aya havy/aM gh.rt/avad vidhema //
|p4 {r}  pr/a s/a mitra m/arto astu pr/ayasvAn y/as ta Aditya /S/ikSati vrat/ena / n/a hanyate n/a jIyate tv/oto n/ainam /a~Mho a/Snoty /antito n/a dUr/At //
|p5 {s}  y/at //

|c4,11,6
|p1     cid dh/i te v/i/So yathA pr/a deva varuNa vrat/am / mimIm/asi dy/avidyavi //
|p2 {t}  y/at k/iM ced/aM varuNa d/aivye j/ane 'bhidroh/am manuSy\A/S c/arAmasi / /acittI y/at t/ava dh/armA yuyopim/a m/A nas t/asmAd /enaso deva rIriSaH //
|p3 {u}  kitav/Aso y/ad ririp/ur n/a dIv/i y/ad vA ghA saty/am ut/a y/an n/a vidm/a / s/arvA t/A v/i Sya /Sithir/eva dev/AthA te syAma varuNa priy/AsaH //

|c5,1,1
|p1 {a}  pUrN/A pa/Sc/Ad ut/a pUrN/A pur/astAd /un madhyat/aH paurNamAs/I jigAya / t/asyAM dev/A /adhi saMv/asanta uttam/e n/Aka ih/a mAdayantAm //
|p2 {b}  y/at te dev/A /adadhur bhAgadh/eyam /amAvAsye saMv/asanto mahitv/A / s/A no yaj~N/am pip.rhi vi/SvavAre ray/iM no dhehi subhage suv/Iram //
|p3 {c}  niv/e/SanI saMg/amanI v/asUnAM v/i/SvA rUp/ANi v/asUny Ave/S/ayantI / sahasrapoS/a~M subh/agA r/arANA s/A na /A gan v/arcasA //{2}  saMvidAn/A //

|c5,1,2

|c5,8,1
|p1 {a}  upayAm/ag.rhIto 'si praj/Apataye tvA jy/otiSmate jy/otiSmantaM g.rhNAmi d/akSAya dakSav/rdhe rAt/aM dev/ebhyo 'gnijihv/ebhyas tvartAy/ubhya /indrajyeSThebhyo v/aruNarAjabhyo v/AtApibhyaH parj/anyAtmabhyo div/e tvAnt/arikSAya tvA p.rthivy/ai tvA \

|c5,9,1
|p1     y/AM v/A adhvary/u/S ca y/ajamAna/S ca dev/atAm antarit/as t/asyA /A v.r/Scyete

|c5,9,2
|p1     asi praj/Apataye tvA jy/otiSmate jy/otiSmantaM g.rhNAm/Ity Aha
|p2     jy/otir ev/aina~M samAn/AnAM karoti \
|p3     agnijihv/ebhyas tvartAy/ubhya /ity Aha \
|p4     et/AvatIr v/ai dev/atAs
|p5     t/Abhya ev/aina~M s/arvAbhyo g.rhNAti \
|p6     /apendra dviSat/o m/ana /ity Aha
|p7     bhr/At.rvyApanuttyai
|p8     prAN/Aya tvApAn/Aya tv/ety Aha
|p9     prAN/An ev/a y/ajamAne dadhAti
|p10    t/asmai tvA praj/Apataye vibhUd/Avne jy/otiSmate jy/otiSmantaM juhomi //

|c5,9,3
|p1     /ity Aha
|p2     praj/ApatiH s/arvA dev/atAH
|p3     s/arvAbhya ev/ainaM dev/atAbhyo juhoti \
|p4     Ajyagrah/aM g.rhNIyAt t/ejaskAmasya
|p5     t/ejo v/A /Ajyam \
|p6     tejasvy \ev/a bhavati
|p7     somagrah/aM g.rhNIyAd brahmavarcas/akAmasya
|p8     brahmavarcas/aM v/ai s/omas \
|p9     brahmavarc/asy \ev/a bhavati
|p10    dadhigrah/aM g.rhNIyAt pa/S/ukAmasya \
|p11    /Urg v/ai d/adhi \
|p12    /Urk pa/S/avas \
|p13    Urj/aiv/AsmA /Urjam pa/S/Un /ava runddhe //

|c5,10,1
|p1 {a}  tv/e kr/atum /api v.r~Njanti v/i/Sve dv/ir y/ad et/e tr/ir bh/avanty /UmAH / svAd/oH sv/AdIyaH svAd/unA s.rjA s/am /ata U S/u m/adhu m/adhunAbh/i yodhi //
|p2 {b}  upayAm/ag.rhIto 'si praj/Apataye tvA j/uSTaM g.rhNAmy eS/a te y/oniH praj/Apataye tvA /
|p3     prANagrah/An g.rhNAty et/Avad v/A asti y/Avad et/e gr/ahA st/omA/S ch/andA~Msi p.rSTh/Ani d/i/So yAvad ev/Asti t/at //

|c5,10,2
|p1     /ava runddhe
|p2     jyeSTh/A v/A et/An brAhmaN/AH pur/A vidv/Am akran t/asmAt t/eSA~M s/arvA d/i/So 'bh/ijitA abhUvan y/asyait/e g.rhy/ante jy/aiSThyam ev/a gachaty abh/i d/i/So jayati
|p3     p/a~Nca g.rhyante p/a~Nca d/i/SaH s/arvAsv ev/a dikSv \dhnuvanti
|p4     n/avanava g.rhyante n/ava v/ai p/uruSe prAN/AH prAN/An ev/a y/ajamAneSu dadhati
|p5     prAyaN/Iye codayan/Iye ca g.rhyante prAN/A v/ai prANagrah/AH //

|c5,10,3
|p1     prAN/air ev/a pray/anti prAN/air /ud yanti
|p2     da/Sam/e 'han g.rhyante prAN/A v/ai prANagrah/AH prAN/ebhyaH kh/alu v/A et/at praj/A yanti y/ad vAmadevy/aM y/one/S cy/avate da/Sam/e 'han vAmadevy/aM y/one/S cyavate y/ad da/Sam/e 'han g.rhy/ante prAN/ebhya ev/a t/at praj/A n/a yanti //

|c5,11,1
|p1 {a}  pr/a dev/aM devy/A dhiy/A bh/aratA jAt/avedasam / havy/A no vakSad AnuS/ak //
|p2 {b}  ay/am u Sy/a pr/a devay/ur hot/A yaj~N/Aya nIyate / r/atho n/a y/or abh/Iv.rto gh/rNIvAn cetati tm/anA //
|p3 {c}  ay/am agn/ir uruSyaty am/rtAd iva j/anmanaH / s/ahasa/S cit s/ahIyAn dev/o jIv/Atave k.rt/aH //
|p4 {d}  /iDAyAs tvA pad/e vay/aM n/AbhA p.rthivy/A /adhi / j/Atavedo n/i dhImahy /agne havy/Aya v/oDhave //

|c5,11,2
|p1 {e}  /agne v/i/SvebhiH svanIka dev/air /UrNAvantam pratham/aH sIda y/onim / kulAy/inaM gh.rt/avanta~M savitr/e yaj~N/aM naya y/ajamAnAya sAdh/u //
|p2 {f}  s/Ida hotaH sv/a u lok/e cikitv/Ant sAd/ayA yaj~N/a~M suk.rt/asya y/onau / devAv/Ir dev/An hav/iSA yajAsy /agne b.rh/ad y/ajamAne v/ayo dhAH //
|p3 {g}  n/i h/otA hot.rS/adane v/idAnas tveS/o dIdiv/A~M asadat sud/akSaH / /adabdhavratapramatir v/asiSThaH sahasrambhar/aH /S/ucijihvo agn/iH //
|p4 {h}  tv/aM dUt/as tv/am //

|c5,11,3
|p1     u naH parasp/As tv/aM v/asya /A v.rSabha praNet/A / /agne tok/asya nas t/ane tan/UnAm /aprayuchan d/Idyad bodhi gop/AH //
|p2 {i}  abh/i tvA deva savitar /I/SAnaM v/AryANAm / s/adAvan bhAg/am Imahe //
|p3 {k}  mah/I dy/auH p.rthiv/I ca na im/aM yaj~N/am mimikSatAm / pip.rt/AM no bh/arImabhiH //
|p4 {l}  tv/Am agne p/uSkarAd /adhy /atharvA n/ir amanthata / mUrdhn/o v/i/Svasya vAgh/ataH //
|p5 {m}  t/am u //

|c5,11,4
|p1     tvA dadhy/a.N.N /rSiH putr/a Idhe /atharvaNaH / v.rtrah/aNam puraMdar/am //
|p2 {n}  t/am u tvA pAthy/o v/rSA s/am Idhe dasyuh/antamam dhanaMjay/a~M r/aNeraNe //
|p3 {o}  ut/a bruvantu jant/ava /ud agn/ir v.rtrah/Ajani / dhanaMjay/o r/aNeraNe //
|p4 {p}  /A y/a~M h/aste n/a khAd/ina~M /S/i/SuM jAt/aM n/a b/ibhrati / vi/S/Am agn/i~M svadhvar/am //
|p5 {q}  pr/a dev/aM dev/avItaye bh/aratA vasuv/ittamam / /A sv/e y/onau n/i SIdatu //
|p6 {r}  /A //

|c5,11,5
|p1     jAt/aM jAt/avedasi priy/a~M /Si/SIt/Atithim / syon/a /A g.rh/apatim //
|p2 {s}  agn/inAgn/iH s/am idhyate kav/ir g.rh/apatir y/uvA / havyav/AD juhv\AsyaH //
|p3 {t}  tv/a~M hy \agne agn/inA v/ipro v/ipreNa s/ant sat/A / s/akaH s/akhyA samidhy/ase //
|p4 {u}  t/am marjayanta sukr/atum puroy/AvAnam Aj/iSu / sv/eSu kS/ayeSu vAj/inam //
|p5 {v}  yaj~N/ena yaj~N/am ayajanta dev/As t/Ani dh/armANi pratham/Any Asan / t/e ha n/Akam mahim/AnaH sacante y/atra p/Urve sAdhy/AH s/anti dev/AH //

|bTS4
|c1,1,1
|p1 {a}  yu~NjAn/aH pratham/am m/anas tatv/Aya savit/A dh/iyaH / agn/iM jy/otir nic/Ayya p.rthivy/A /adhy /Abharat //
|p2 {b}  yuktv/Aya m/anasA dev/Ant s/uvar yat/o dhiy/A d/ivam / b.rh/aj jy/otiH kariSyat/aH savit/A pr/a suvati t/An //
|p3 {c}  yukt/ena m/anasA vay/aM dev/asya savit/uH sav/e / suvarg/eyAya /S/aktyai //
|p4 {d}  yu~Nj/ate m/ana ut/a yu~Njate dh/iyo v/iprA v/iprasya b.rhat/o vipa/Sc/itaH / v/i h/otrA dadhe vayuNAv/id /eka /it //

|c1,1,2
|p1     mah/I dev/asya savit/uH p/ariSTutiH //
|p2 {e}  yuj/e vAm br/ahma pUrvy/aM n/amobhir v/i /Sl/okA yanti pathy\eva s/UrAH / /S.rNv/anti v/i/Sve am/rtasya putr/A /A y/e dh/AmAni divy/Ani tasth/uH //
|p3 {f}  y/asya pray/ANam /av any/a /id yay/ur dev/A dev/asya mahim/Anam /arcataH / y/aH p/ArthivAni vimam/e s/a /eta/So r/ajA~Msi dev/aH savit/A mahitvan/A //
|p4 {g}  d/eva savitaH pr/a suva yaj~N/am pr/a suva //

|c1,1,3
|p1     yaj~N/apatim bh/agAya divy/o gandharv/aH ketap/UH k/etaM naH punAtu vAc/as p/atir v/Acam ady/a svadAti naH //
|p2 {h}  im/aM no deva savitar yaj~N/am pr/a suva devAy/uva~M sakhiv/ida~M satrAj/itaM dhanaj/ita~M suvarj/itam //
|p3 {i}  .rc/A st/oma~M s/am ardhaya gAyatr/eNa rathaMtar/am / b.rh/ad gAyatr/avartani //
|p4 {k}  dev/asya tvA savit/uH prasav\e '/Sv/inor bAh/ubhyAm pUSN/o h/astAbhyAm gAyatr/eNa ch/andas/A dade '.Ngirasv/at \
|p5 {l}  /abhrir asi n/AriH //

|c1,1,4
|p1     asi p.rthivy/AH sadh/asthAd agn/im purISy\am a.Ngirasv/ad /A bhara traiSTubh/ena tvA ch/andas/A dade '.Ngirasv/at \
|p2 {m}  b/abhrir asi n/Arir asi tv/ayA vay/a~M sadh/astha /Agn/i~M /Sakema kh/anitum purISy\aM j/Agatena tvA ch/andas/A dade '.Ngirasv/at \
|p3 {n}  h/asta Adh/Aya savit/A b/ibhrad /abhri~M hiraNy/ayIm / t/ayA jy/otir /ajasram /id agn/iM khAtv/I na /A bhar/AnuSTubhena tvA ch/andas/A dade '.Ngirasv/at //

|c1,2,1
|p1 {a}  im/Am ag.rbhNan ra/San/Am .rt/asya p/Urva /AyuSi vid/atheSu kavy/A / t/ayA dev/AH sut/am /A babhUvur .rt/asya s/Amant sar/am Ar/apantI //
|p2 {b}  pr/atUrtaM {F vAjinn}{W v/ajinn}{ASS vAjinn}{BI vAjinn}{GOLS -} /A drava v/ariSThAm /anu saMv/atam / div/i te j/anma param/am ant/arikSe n/AbhiH p.rthivy/Am /adhi y/oniH //
|p3 {c}  yu~Nj/AthA~M r/AsabhaM yuv/am asm/in y/Ame v.rSaNvasU / agn/im bh/arantam asmay/um //
|p4 {d}  y/ogeyoge tav/astaraM v/Aje-vAje havAmahe / s/akhAya /indram Ut/aye //
|p5 {e}  prat/Urvan //

|c1,2,2
|p1     /ehy avakr/Amann /a/SastI rudr/asya g/ANapatyAn mayobh/Ur /ehi / urv \ant/arikSam /anv ihi svast/igavyUtir /abhayAni k.rNv/an //
|p2 {f}  pUSN/A say/ujA sah/a p.rthivy/AH sadh/asthAd agn/im puriSy\am a.Ngirasv/ad /achehi \
|p3 {g}  agn/im purISy\am a.Ngirasv/ad /achemas \
|p4 {h}  agn/im purISy\am a.Ngirasv/ad bhariSyAmas \
|p5 {i}  agn/im purISy\am a.Ngirasv/ad bharAmaH /
|p6 {k}  /anv agn/ir uS/asAm /agram akhyad /anv /ahAni pratham/o jAt/avedAH / /anu s/Uryasya //

|c1,2,3
|p1     purutr/A ca ra/Sm/In /anu dy/AvAp.rthiv/I /A tatAna //
|p2 {l}  Ag/atya vAjy /adhvanaH s/arvA m/rdho v/i dhUnute / agn/i~M sadh/asthe mahat/i c/akSuSA n/i cikISate //
|p3 {m}  Akr/amya vAjin p.rthiv/Im agn/im icha ruc/A tv/am / bh/UyA v.rtv/Aya no brUhi y/ataH kh/anAma t/aM vay/am //
|p4 {n}  dy/aus te p.rSTh/am p.rthiv/I sadh/astham Atm/Ant/arikSa~M samudr/as te y/oniH / vikhy/Aya c/akSuSA tv/am abh/i tiSTha //

|c1,2,4
|p1     p.rtanyat/aH //
|p2 {o}  /ut krAma mahat/e s/aubhagAyAsm/Ad Asth/AnAd draviNod/A vAjin / vay/a~M syAma sumat/au p.rthivy/A agn/iM khaniSy/anta up/asthe asyAH //
|p3 {p}  /ud akramId draviNod/A vAjy /arv/AkaH s/a lok/a~M s/uk.rtam p.rthivy/AH / t/ataH khanema supr/atIkam agn/i~M s/uvo r/uhANA /adhi n/Aka uttam/e //
|p4 {q}  {F ap/o}{W ap/o}{ASS ap/o}{BI ap\o}{GOLS -} dev/Ir /upa s.rja m/adhumatIr ayakSm/Aya praj/AbhyaH / t/AsA~M sth/AnAd /uj jihatAm /oSadhayaH supippal/AH //
|p5 {r}  j/igharmi //

|c1,2,5
|p1     agn/im m/anasA gh.rt/ena pratikSy/antam bh/uvanAni v/i/SvA / p.rth/uM tira/Sc/A v/ayasA b.rh/antaM vy/aciSTham /anna~M rabhas/aM v/idAnam //
|p2 {s}  /A tvA jigharmi v/acasA gh.rt/enArakS/asA m/anasA t/aj juSasva / m/arya/SrI sp.rhay/advarNo agn/ir n/Abhim/r/Se tan/uvA j/arh.rSANaH //
|p3 {t}  p/ari v/AjapatiH kav/ir agn/ir h/avyAny akramIt / d/adhad r/atnAni dA/S/uSe //
|p4 {u}  p/ari tvAgne p/uraM vay/aM v/ipra~M sahasya dhImahi / dh.rS/advarNaM div/edive bhett/Aram bha.Ngur/AvataH //
|p5 {v}  tv/am agne dy/ubhis tv/am A/Su/SukS/aNis tv/am adbhy/as tv/am /a/Smanasa p/ari / tv/aM v/anebhyas tv/am /oSadhIbhyas tv/aM n.rN/AM n.rpate jAyase /S/uciH //

|c1,3,1
|p1 {a}  dev/asya tvA savit/uH prasav\e '/Sv/inor bAh/ubhyAm pUSN/o h/astAbhyAm p.rthivy/AH sadh/asthe 'gn/im purISy\am a.Ngirasv/at khanAmi //
|p2 {b}  jy/otiSmantaM tvAgne supr/atIkam /ajasreNa bhAn/unA d/IdyAnam / /Siv/am praj/Abhy/o 'hi~Msantam p.rthivy/AH sadh/asthe 'gn/im purISy\am a.Ngirasv/at khanAmi //
|p3 {c}  ap/Am p.rSTh/am asi sapr/athA urv \agn/im bhariSy/ad /aparAvapiSTham / v/ardhamAnam mah/a /A ca p/uSkaraM div/o m/AtrayA variN/A prathasva //
|p4 {d}  /S/arma ca sthaH //

|c1,3,2
|p1     v/arma ca stho /achidre bahul/e ubh/e / vy/acasvatI s/aM vasAthAm bhart/am agn/im purISy\am //
|p2 {e}  s/aM vasAthA~M suvarv/idA sam/IcI /urasA tm/anA / agn/im ant/ar bhariSy/antI jy/otiSmantam /ajasram /it //
|p3 {f}  purISy\o 'si vi/Sv/abharAH / /atharvA tvA pratham/o n/ir amanthad agne
|p4 {g}  tv/Am agne p/uSkarAd /adhy /atharvA n/ir amanthata / mUrdhn/o v/i/Svasya vAgh/ataH //
|p5 {h}  t/am u tvA dadhy/a.N.N /rSiH putr/a Idhe //

|c1,3,3
|p1     /atharvaNaH / v.rtrah/aNam puraM dar/am //
|p2 {i}  t/am u tvA pAthy/o v/rSA s/am Idhe dasyuh/antamam / dhanaMjay/a~M r/aNeraNe //
|p3 {k}  s/Ida hotaH sv/a u lok/e cikitv/Ant sAd/ayA yaj~N/a~M suk.rt/asya y/onau / devAv/Ir dev/An hav/iSA yajAsy /agne b.rh/ad y/ajamAne v/ayo dhAH //
|p4 {l}  n/i h/otA hot.rS/adane v/idAnas tveS/o dIdiv/A~M asadat sud/akSaH / /adabdhavratapramatir v/asiSThaH sahasrambhar/aH /S/ucijihvo agn/iH //
|p5 {m}  s/a~M sIdasva mah/A~M asi /S/ocasva //

|c1,3,4
|p1     devav/ItamaH / v/i dhUm/am agne aruS/am miyedhya s.rj/a pra/Sasta dar/Sat/am //
|p2 {n}  j/aniSvA h/i j/enyo /agre /ahnAm hit/o hit/eSv aruS/o v/aneSu / d/amedame sapt/a r/atnA d/adhAno 'gn/ir h/otA n/i SasAdA y/ajIyAn //

|c1,4,1
|p1 {a}  s/aM te vAy/ur mAtari/SvA dadhAtUttAn/Ayai h/rdayaM y/ad v/iliSTam / dev/AnAM y/a/S c/arati prAN/athena t/asmai ca devi v/aSaD astu t/ubhyam //
|p2 {b}  s/ujAto jy/otiSA sah/a /S/arma v/arUtham /AsadaH s/uvaH / v/Aso agne vi/Sv/arUpa~M s/aM vyayasva vibhAvaso //
|p3 {c}  /ud u tiSTha svadhvar/AvA no devy/A k.rp/A / d.r/S/e ca bhAs/A b.rhat/A su/Sukv/anir /Agne yAhi su/Sast/ibhiH //

|c1,4,2
|p1 {d}  Urdhv/a U S/u Na Ut/aye t/iSThA dev/o n/a savit/A / Urdhv/o v/Ajasya s/anitA y/ad a~Nj/ibhir vAgh/adbhir vihv/ayAmahe //
|p2 {e}  s/a jAt/o g/arbho asi r/odasyor /agne c/Arur v/ibh.rta /oSadhISu / citr/aH /S/i/SuH p/ari t/amA~Msy akt/aH pr/a mAt/rbhyo /adhi k/anikradad gAH //
|p3 {f}  sthir/o bhava vIDv\a.Nga A/S/ur bhava vAjy \arvan / p.rth/ur bhava suS/adas tv/am agn/eH purISav/AhanaH //
|p4 {g}  /Siv/o bhava //

|c1,4,3
|p1     praj/Abhyo m/AnuSIbhyas tv/am a.NgiraH / m/A dy/AvAp.rthiv/I abh/i /SU/Suco m/Ant/arikSam m/A v/anasp/atIn //
|p2 {h}  pr/aitu vAj/I k/anikradan n/Anadad r/AsabhaH p/atvA / bh/arann agn/im purISy\am m/A pAdy /AyuSaH pur/A //
|p3 {i}  r/Asabho vAM k/anikradat s/uyukto v.rSaNA r/athe / s/a vAm agn/im purISy\am A/S/ur dUt/o vahAd it/aH //
|p4 {k}  v/rSAgn/iM v/rSaNam bh/arann ap/AM g/arbha~M samudr/iyam / /agna /A yAhi //

|c1,4,4
|p1     vIt/aya .rt/a~M saty/am //
|p2 {l}  /oSadhayaH pr/ati g.rhNItAgn/im et/a~M /Siv/am Ay/antam abhy /atra yuSm/An / vy/asyan v/i/SvA /amatIr /arAtIr niS/Idan no /apa durmat/i~M hanat //
|p3 {m}  /oSadhayaH pr/ati modadhvam enam p/uSpAvatIH supippal/AH / ay/aM vo g/arbha .rtv/iyaH pratn/a~M sadh/astham /Asadat //

|c1,5,1
|p1 {a}  v/i p/AjasA p.rth/unA /S/o/SucAno b/Adhasva dviS/o rakS/aso /amIvAH / su/S/armaNo b.rhat/aH /S/armaNi syAm agn/er ah/a~M suh/avasya pr/aNItau //
|p2 {b}  /Apo h/i STh/A mayobh/uvas t/A na Urj/e dadhAtana / mah/e r/aNAya c/akSase //
|p3 {c}  y/o vaH /Siv/atamo r/asas t/asya bhAjayate 'h/a naH / u/Sat/Ir iva mAt/araH //
|p4 {d}  t/asmA /araM gamAma vo y/asya kS/ayAya j/invatha / /Apo jan/ayathA ca naH //
|p5 {e}  mitr/aH //

|c1,5,2
|p1     sa~Ms/rjya p.rthiv/Im bh/UmiM ca jy/otiSA sah/a / s/ujAtaM jAt/avedasam agn/iM vai/SvAnar/aM vibh/um //
|p2 {f}  ayakSm/Aya tvA s/a~M s.rjAmi praj/AbhyaH / v/i/Sve tvA dev/A vai/SvAnar/AH s/a~M s.rjantv /AnuSTubhena ch/andasA.Ngirasv/at //
|p3 {g}  rudr/AH sambh/rtya p.rthiv/Im b.rh/aj jy/otiH s/am Idhire / t/eSAm bhAn/ur /ajasra /ic chukr/o dev/eSu rocate //
|p4 {h}  s/a~Ms.rSTAM v/asubhI rudr/air dh/IraiH karmaNy\Am m/rdam / h/astAbhyAm m.rdv/IM k.rtv/A sinIvAl/I karotu //

|c1,5,3
|p1     t/Am //
|p2 {i}  sinIval/I sukapard/A sukrIr/A svaupa/S/A / s/A t/ubhyam adite maha /okh/AM dadhAtu h/astayoH //
|p3 {k}  ukh/AM karotu /S/aktyA bAh/ubhyAm /aditir dhiy/A / mAt/A putr/aM y/athop/asthe s/Agn/im bibhartu g/arbha /A //
|p4 {l}  makh/asya /S/iro 'si
|p5 {m}  yaj~N/asya pad/e sthaH /
|p6 {n}  v/asavas tvA k.rNvantu gAyatr/eNa ch/andasA.Ngirasv/at p.rthivy \asi rudr/As tvA k.rNvantu tr/aiSTubhena ch/andasA.Ngirasv/ad ant/arikSam asi //

|c1,5,4
|p1     Adity/As tvA k.rNvantu j/Agatena ch/andasA.Ngirasv/ad dy/aur asi v/i/Sve tvA dev/A vai/SvAnar/AH k.rNvantv /AnuSTubhena ch/andasA.Ngirasv/ad d/i/So 'si dhruv/Asi dhAr/ayA m/ayi praj/A~M rAy/as p/oSaM gaupaty/a~M sur/Irya~M sajAt/An y/ajamAnAya \
|p2 {o}  /adityai r/AsnAsi \
|p3 {p}  /aditis te b/ilaM g.rhNAtu p/A.Nktena ch/andasA.Ngirasv/at /
|p4 {q}  k.rtv/Aya s/A mah/Im ukh/Am m.rnm/ayIM y/onim agn/aye / t/Am putr/ebhyaH s/am pr/Ayachad /aditiH /Srap/ayAn /iti //

|c1,6,1
|p1 {a}  v/asavas tvA dhUpayantu gAyatr/eNa ch/andasA.Ngirasv/ad rudr/As tvA dhUpayantu tr/aiSTubhena ch/andasA.Ngirasv/ad Adity/As tvA dhUpayantu j/Agatena ch/andasA.Ngirasv/ad v/i/Sve tvA dev/A vai/SvAnar/A dhUpayantv /AnuSTubhena ch/andasA.Ngirasv/ad /indras tvA dhUpayatv a.Ngirasv/ad v/iSNus tvA dhUpayatv a.Ngirasv/ad v/aruNas tvA dhUpayatv a.Ngirasv/at \
|p2 {b}  /aditis tvA dev/I vi/Sv/adevyAvatI p.rthivy/AH sadh/asthe '.Ngirasv/at khanatv avaTa
|p3 {c}  dev/AnAM tvA p/atnIH //

|c1,6,2
|p1     dev/Ir vi/Sv/adevyAvatIH p.rthivy/AH sadh/asthe '.Ngirasv/ad dadhatUkhe
|p2 {d}  dhiS/aNAs tvA dev/Ir vi/Sv/adevyAvatIH p.rthivy/AH sadh/asthe '.Ngirasv/ad abh/IndhatAm ukhe gn/As tvA dev/Ir vi/Sv/adevyAvatIH p.rthivy/AH sadh/asthe '.Ngirasv/ac chrapayantUkhe v/arUtrayo j/anayas tvA dev/Ir vi/Sv/adevyAvatIH p.rthivy/AH sadh/asthe '.Ngirasv/at pacantUkhe /
|p3 {e}  m/itrait/Am ukh/Am pacaiS/A m/A bhedi /
|p4 {f}  et/AM te p/ari dadAmy /abhittyai
|p5 {g}  abh/Im/Am //

|c1,6,3
|p1     mahin/A d/ivam mitr/o babhUva sapr/athAH / ut/a /Sr/avasA p.rthiv/Im //
|p2 {h}  m/itrasya carSaNIdh/rtaH /Sr/avo dev/asya sAnas/im / dyumn/aM citr/a/Sravastamam //
|p3 {i}  dev/as tvA savit/od vapatu supAN/iH sva.Ngur/iH / subAh/ur ut/a /S/aktyA //
|p4 {k}  /apadyamAnA p.rthivy /A/SA d/i/Sa /A p.rNa / /ut tiSTha b.rhat/I bhavordhv/A tiSTha dhruv/A tv/am //
|p5 {l}  v/asavas tv/A ch.rndantu gAyatr/eNa ch/andasA.Ngirasv/ad rudr/As tv/A ch.rndantu tr/aiSTubhena ch/andasA.Ngirasv/ad Adity/As tvA ch.rndantu j/Agatena ch/andasA.Ngirasv/ad vi/Sve tvA dev/A vai/SvAnar/A /A ch.rndantv /AnuSTubhena ch/andasA.Ngirasv/at //

|c1,7,1
|p1 {a}  s/amAs tvAgna .rt/avo vardhayantu saMvatsar/A /rSayo y/Ani saty/A / s/aM divy/ena dIdihi rocan/ena v/i/SvA /A bhAhi prad/i/SaH p.rthivy/AH //
|p2 {b}  s/aM cedhy/asvAgne pr/a ca bodhayainam /uc ca tiSTha mahat/e s/aubhagAya / m/A ca .rSad upasatt/A te agne brahm/ANas te ya/S/asaH santu m/Any/e //
|p3 {c}  tv/Am agne v.rNate brAhmaN/A im/e /Siv/o agne //

|c1,7,2
|p1     saMv/araNe bhavA naH / sapatnah/A no abhimAtij/ic ca sv/e g/aye jAg.rhy /aprayuchan //
|p2 {d}  ih/aiv/Agne /adhi dhArayA ray/im m/A tvA n/i kran pUrvac/ito nikAr/iNaH / kSatr/am agne suy/amam astu t/ubhyam upasatt/A vardhatAM te /aniST.rtaH //
|p3 {e}  kSatr/eNAgne sv/AyuH s/a~M rabhasva mitr/eNAgne mitradh/eye yatasva / sajAt/AnAm madhyamasth/A edhi rAj~N/Am agne vihavy\o dIdihIh/a //
|p4 {f}  /ati //

|c1,7,3
|p1     n/ibo /ati sr/idh/o 'ty /acittim /aty /arAtim agne / vi/SvA hy \agne durit/A s/ahasv/AthAsm/abhya~M sah/avIrA~M ray/iM dAH //
|p2 {g}  anAdh.rSy/o jAt/avedA /aniST.rto vir/AD agne kSatrabh/rd dIdihIh/a / v/i/SvA /A/SAH pramu~Nc/an m/AnuSIr bhiy/aH /Siv/Abhir ady/a p/ari pAhi no v.rdh/e //
|p3 {h}  b/rhaspate savitar bodh/ayaina~M s/a~M/SitaM cit saMtar/A~M s/a~M /Si/SAdhi / vardh/ayainam mahat/e s/aubhagAya //

|c1,7,4
|p1     v/i/Sva enam /anu madantu dev/AH //
|p2 {i}  amutrabh/UyAd /adha y/ad yam/asya b/rhaspate abh/i/Saster /amu~NcaH / pr/aty auhatAm a/Sv/inA m.rty/um asmAd dev/AnAm agne bhiS/ajA /S/acIbhiH //
|p3 {k}  /ud vay/aM t/amasas p/ari p/a/Syanto jy/otir /uttaram / dev/aM devatr/A sUryam /aganma jy/otir uttam/am //

|c1,8,1
|p1 {a}  UrdhvA asya sam/idho bhavanty Urdhv/A /Sukr/A /Soc/I~MSy agn/eH / dyum/attamA supr/atIkasya sUn/oH //
|p2 {b}  t/anUn/apAd /asuro vi/Sv/avedA dev/o dev/eSu dev/aH / path/a /Anakti m/adhvA gh.rt/ena //

|p4 {d}  /achAy/am eti /S/avasA gh.rt/eneDAn/o v/ahnir n/amasA / agn/i~M sr/uco adhvar/eSu pray/atsu //
|p5 {e}  s/a yakSad asya mahim/Anam agn/eH s/aH //

|c1,8,2
|p1     I mandr/Asu pray/asaH / v/asu/S c/etiSTho vasudh/Atama/S ca //

|c1,8,3
|p1     bh/AratI mah/I g.rNAn/A //
|p2 {k}  t/an nas tur/Ipam /adbhutam purukS/u tv/aSTA suv/Iram / rAy/as p/oSaM v/i Syatu n/Abhim asm/e //

|p4 {m}  /agne sv/AhA k.rNuhi jAtaveda /indrAya havy/am / v/i/Sve dev/A hav/ir id/aM juSantAm //
|p5 {n}  hiraNyagarbh/aH s/am avartat/Agre bhUt/asya jAt/aH p/atir /eka AsIt / s/a dAdhAra p.rthiv/IM dy/Am //

|c1,8,4
|p1     ut/em/AM k/asmai dev/Aya hav/iSA vidhema //

|p3 {p}  y/a Atmad/A balad/A y/asya v/i/Sva up/Asate pra/SiSaM y/asya dev/AH / y/asya chAy/Am/rtaM y/asya m.rty/uH k/asmai dev/Aya hav/iSA vidhema //
|p4 {q}  y/asyeme him/a vanto mahitv/A y/asya samudr/a~M ras/ayA sah/a //

|c1,8,5
|p1     Ah/uH / y/asyem/AH prad/i/So y/asya bAh/U k/asmai dev/Aya bav/iSA vidhema //

|p3 {s}  y/ena dy/aur ugr/A p.rthiv/I ca d.rDh/e y/ena s/uva st/abhitaM y/ena n/AkaH / y/o ant/arikSe r/ajaso vim/AnaH k/asmai dev/Aya hav/iSA vidhema //
|p4 {t}  /Apo ha y/an mahat/Ir v/i/Svam //

|c1,9,1
|p1 {a}  /AkUtim agn/im pray/uja~M sv/AhA m/ano medh/Am agn/im pray/uja~M sv/AhA citt/aM v/ij~NAtam agn/im pray/uja~M sv/AhA vAc/o v/idh.rtim agn/im pray/uja~M sv/AhA praj/Apataye m/anave sv/AhAgn/aye vai/SvAnar/Aya sv/AhA
|p2 {b}  v/i/Sve dev/asya net/ur m/arto v.rNIta sakhy/aM v/i/Sve rAy/a iSudhyasi dyumn/aM v.rNIta puSy/ase sv/AhA

|c1,9,2
|p1     agn/i/S ced/aM kariSyathaH //
|p2 {d}  d/r~Mhasva devi p.rthivi svast/aya Asur/I mAy/A svadh/ayA k.rt/Asi / j/uSTaM dev/AnAM id/am astu havy/am /ariSTA tv/am /ud ihi yaj~N/e asm/in //
|p3 {e}  m/itrait/Am ukh/AM tapaiS/A m/A bhedi /

|c1,9,3
|p1     tara / y/atrAh/am /asmi t/A~M ava //

|p3 {k}  s/Ida tv/am mAt/ur asy/A up/asthe v/i/SvAny agne vay/unAni vidv/An / m/ainAm arc/iSA m/A t/apasAbh/i /SU/Suco 'nt/ar asyA~M /Sukr/ajyotir v/i bhAhi //
|p4 {l}  ant/ar agne ruc/A tv/am ukh/Ayai s/adane sv/e / t/asyAs tv/a~M h/arasA t/apa.N j/AtavedaH /Siv/o bhava //
|p5 {m}  /Siv/o bhUtv/A mahy/am agn/e 'tho sIda /Siv/as tv/am / /Siv/AH k.rtv/A d/i/SaH s/arvAH sv/AM y/onim ih/AsadaH //

|c1,10,1
|p1 {a}  y/ad agne y/Ani k/Ani c/A te d/ArUNi dadhm/asi / t/ad astu t/ubhyam /id gh.rt/aM t/aj juSasva yaviSThya //
|p2 {b}  y/ad /atty upaj/ihvikA y/ad vamr/o atis/arpati / s/arvaM t/ad astu te gh.rt/aM t/aj juSasva yaviSThya //
|p3 {c}  r/Atri~MrAtrim /aprayAvam bh/aratn/o '/SvAyeva t/iSThate ghAs/am asmai / rAy/as p/oSeNa s/am iS/A m/adant/o 'gne m/A te pr/ative/SA riSAma //
|p4 {d}  n/AbhA //

|c1,10,2
|p1     p.rthivy/AH samidhAn/am agn/i~M rAy/as p/oSAya b.rhat/e havAmahe / irammad/am b.rh/adukthaM y/ajatraM j/etAram agn/im p/rtanAsu sAsah/im //
|p2 {e}  y/AH s/enA abh/ItvarIr AvyAdh/inIr /ugaNA ut/a / y/e sten/A y/e ca t/askarAs t/A~Ms te agn/e 'pi dadhAmy Asy\e //
|p3 {f}  d/a~MSTrAbhyAm mal/imlU~N j/ambhyais t/askarA~M ut/a / h/anUbhyA~M st/enAn bhagavas t/A~Ms tv/aM khAda s/ukhAditAn //
|p4 {g}  y/e j/aneSu mal/imlava sten/Asas t/askarA v/ane / y/e //

|c1,10,3
