|p2 {h}  y/o asm/abhyam arAtIy/Ad y/a/S ca no dv/eSate j/anaH / n/indAd y/o asm/An d/ipsAc ca s/arvaM t/am masmas/A kuru //
|p3 {i}  s/a~M/Sitam me br/ahma s/a~M/SitaM vIry\am b/alam / s/a~M/Sitam kSatr/aM jiSN/u y/asyAh/am /asmi pur/ohitaH //
|p4 {k}  /ud eSAm bAh/U atiram /ud v/arca /ud U b/alam / kSiN/omi br/ahmaNAm/itrAn /un nayAmi //

|c1,10,4
|p1     sv/A~M ah/am /
|p2 {l}  d.r/SAn/o rukm/a urvy/A vy \adyaud durm/arSam /AyuH /Sriy/e rucAn/aH / agn/ir am/rto abhavad v/ayobhir y/ad enaM dy/aur /ajanayat sur/etAH //
|p3 {m}  v/i/SvA rUp/ANi pr/ati mu~Ncate kav/iH pr/AsAvId bhadr/aM dvip/ade c/atuSpade / v/i n/Akam akhyat savit/A v/areNy/o 'nu pray/ANam uS/aso v/i rAjati //
|p4 {n}  n/aktoS/AsA s/amanasA v/irUpe dhAp/ayete /S/i/Sum /eka~M samIc/I / dy/AvA kS/AmA rukm/aH //

|c1,10,5
|p1     ant/ar v/i bhAti dev/A agn/iM dhArayan draviNod/AH //
|p2 {o}  suparN\o 'si gar/utmAn triv/rt te /Siro gAyatr/aM c/akSu st/oma Atm/A s/Ama te tan/Ur vAmadevy/am b.rhadrathantar/e p/akSau yaj~NAyaj~N/iyam p/uchaM ch/andA~Msy /a.NgAni dh/iSNiyAH /S/aphA y/ajU~MSi n/Ama /
|p3 {p}  suparN\o 'si gar/utmAn d/ivaM gacha s/uvaH pata //

|c1,11,1
|p1 {a}  /agne y/aM yaj~N/am adhvar/aM vi/Sv/ataH paribh/Ur /asi / s/a /id dev/eSu gachati //
|p2 {b}  s/oma y/As te mayobh/uva Ut/ayaH s/anti dA/S/uSe / t/Abhir no 'vit/A bhava //
|p3 {c}  agn/ir mUrdh/A
|p4 {d}  bh/uvaH /
|p5 {e}  tv/aM naH soma
|p6 {f}  y/A te dh/AmAni /
|p7 {g}  t/at savit/ur v/areNyam bh/argo dev/asya dhImahi / dh/iyo y/o naH pracod/ayAt //
|p8 {h}  /acittI y/ac cak.rm/A d/aivye j/ane d/Inair d/akSaiH pr/abhUtI pUruSatv/atA //

|c1,11,2
|p1     dev/eSu ca savitar m/AnuSeSu ca tv/aM no /atra suvatAd /anAgasaH //
|p2 {i}  codayitr/I sUn/rtAnAM c/etantI sumatIn/Am / yaj~N/aM dadhe s/arasvatI //
|p3 {k}  p/AvIravI kany\A citr/AyuH s/arasvatI vIr/apatnI dh/iyaM dhAt / gn/Abhir /achidra~M /SaraN/a~M saj/oSA durAdh/arSaM g.rNat/e /S/arma ya~Msat //
|p4 {l}  pUS/A g/A /anv etu naH pUS/A rakSatv /arvataH / pUS/A v/Aja~M sanotu naH //
|p5 {m}  /Sukr/aM te any/ad yajat/aM te any/at //

|c1,11,3
|p1     v/iSurUpe /ahanI dy/aur ivAsi / v/i/SvA h/i mAy/A /avasi svadhAvo bhadr/A te pUSann ih/a rAt/ir astu //
|p2 {n}  t\e 'vardhanta sv/atavaso mahitvan/A n/AkaM tasth/ur ur/u cakrire s/adaH / v/iSNur y/ad dh/Avad v/rSaNam madacy/utaM v/ayo n/a sIdann /adhi barh/iSi priy/e /
|p3 {o}  pr/a citr/am ark/aM g.rNat/e tur/Aya m/ArutAya sv/atavase bharadhvam / y/e s/ahA~Msi s/ahasA s/ahante //

|c1,11,4
|p1     r/ejate agne p.rthiv/I makh/ebhyaH //
|p2 {p}  v/i/Sve dev/As \
|p3 {q}  v/i/Sve dev/AH /
|p4 {r}  dy/AvA naH p.rthiv/I im/a~M sidhr/am ady/a divisp/r/Sam / yaj~N/aM dev/eSu yachatAm //
|p5 {s}  pr/a pUrvaj/e pit/arA n/avyasIbhir gIrbh/iH k.rNudhva~M s/adane .rt/asya / /A no dyAvAp.rthivI d/aivyena j/anena yAtam mah/i vAM v/arUtham //
|p6 {t}  agn/i~M st/omena bodhaya samidhAn/o /amartyam / havy/A dev/eSu no dadhat //
|p7 {u}  s/a havyav/AD /amartya u/S/ig dUt/a/S c/anohitaH / agn/ir dhiy/A s/am .rNvati //
|p8 {v}  /S/aM no bhavantu
|p9 {w}  v/AjevAje //

|c2,1,1
|p1 {a}  v/iSNoH kr/amo 'sy abhimAtih/A gAyatr/aM ch/anda /A roha p.rthiv/Im /anu v/i kramasva n/irbhaktaH s/a y/aM dviSm/o v/iSNoH kr/amo 'sy abhi/Sastih/A tr/aiSTubhaM ch/anda /A rohAnt/arikSam /anu v/i kramasva n/irbhaktaH s/a y/aM dviSm/o v/iSNoH kr/amo 'sy arAtIyat/o hant/A j/AgataM ch/anda /A roha d/ivam /anu v/i kramasva n/irbhaktaH s/a y/aM dviSm/o v/iSNoH //

|c2,1,2
|p1     kr/amo 'si /SatrUyat/o hant/AnuSTubhaM ch/anda /A roha d/i/S/o 'nu v/i kramasva n/irbhaktaH s/a y/aM dviSm/aH /
|p2 {b}  /akrandad agn/i stan/ayann iva dy/auH kS/AmA r/erihad vIr/udhaH sama~Nj/an / sady/o jaj~NAn/o v/i h/Im iddh/o /akhyad /A r/odasI bhAn/unA bhAty ant/aH //
|p3 {c}  /agne 'bhyAvartinn abh/i na /A vartasv/AyuSA v/arcasA sany/A medh/ayA praj/ayA dh/anena //
|p4 {d}  /agne //

|c2,1,3
|p1     a.NgiraH /Sat/aM te santv Av/rtaH sah/asraM ta upAv/rtaH / t/AsAm p/oSasya p/oSeNa p/unar no naST/am /A k.rdhi p/unar no ray/im /Ak.rdhi //
|p2 {e}  p/unar Urj/A n/i vartasva p/unar agna iS/AyuSA / p/unar naH pAhi vi/Sv/ataH //
|p3 {f}  sah/a rayy/A n/i vartasv/Agne p/invasva dhAr/ayA / vi/Sv/apsniyA vi/Sv/atas p/ari //
|p4 {g}  /ud uttam/aM varuNa p/A/Sam asm/ad /avAdham/am //

|c2,1,4
|p1     v/i madhyam/a~M /SrathAya / /athA vay/am Aditya vrat/e t/av/AnAgaso /aditaye syAma //
|p2 {h}  /A tvAhArSam ant/ar abhUr dhruv/as tiSTh/AvicAcaliH / v/i/Sas tvA s/arvA vA~Nchantv asm/in rASTr/am /adhi /Sraya //
|p3 {i}  /agre b.rh/ann uS/asAm Urdhv/o asthAn nirjagmiv/An t/amaso jy/otiS/AgAt / agn/ir bhAn/unA r/u/SatA sv/a.Nga /A jAt/o vi/SvA s/admAny aprAH //
|p4 {k}  s/Ida tv/am mAt/ur asy/AH //

|c2,1,5
|p1     up/asthe v/i/SvAny agne vay/unAni vidv/An / m/ainAm arc/iSA m/A t/apasAbh/i /SU/Suco 'nt/ar asyA~M /Sukr/ajyotir v/i bhAhi //
|p2 {l}  ant/ar agne ruc/A tv/am ukh/Ayai s/adane sv/e / t/asyAs tv/a~M h/arasA t/apa~N j/AtavedaH /Siv/o bhava //
|p3 {m}  /Siv/o bhUtv/A m/ahyam agn/e 'tho sIda /Siv/as tv/am / /Siv/AH k.rtv/A d/i/SaH s/arvAH sv/AM y/onim ih/AsadaH //
|p4 {n}  ha~Ms/aH /SuciS/ad v/asur antarikSas/ad dh/otA vediS/ad /atithir duroNas/at / n.rS/ad varas/ad vyomas/ad abj/A goj/A .rtaj/A adrij/A .rt/am b.rh/at //

|c2,2,1
|p1 {a}  div/as p/ari pratham/aM jaj~Ne agn/ir asm/ad dvit/Iyam p/ari jAt/avedAH / t.rt/Iyam aps/u n.rm/aNA /ajasram /indhAna enaM jarate svAdh/IH //
|p2 {b}  vidm/A te agne tredh/A tray/ANi vidm/A te s/adma v/ibh.rtam purutr/A / vidm/A te n/Ama param/aM g/uhA y/ad vidm/A t/am /utsaM y/ata Ajag/antha //
|p3 {c}  samudr/e tvA n.rm/aNA apsv \ant/ar n.rc/akSA Idhe div/o agna /Udhan / t.rt/Iye tvA //

|c2,2,2
|p1     r/ajasi tasthiv/A~Msam .rt/asya y/onau mahiS/A ahinvan //
|p2 {d}  /akrandad agn/i stan/ayann iva dy/auH kS/AmA r/erihad vIr/udhaH sama~Nj/an / sady/o jaj~NAn/o v/i h/Im iddh/o /akhyad /A r/odasI bhAn/unA bhAty ant/aH //
|p3 {e}  u/S/ik pAvak/o arat/iH sumedh/A m/arteSv agn/ir am/rto nidhAyi / /iyarti dhUm/am aruS/am bh/aribhrad /uc chukr/eNa /Soc/iSA dy/Am /inakSat //
|p4 {f}  v/i/Svasya ket/ur bh/uvanasya g/arbha /A //

|c2,2,3
|p1     r/odasI ap.rNAj j/AyamAnaH / vID/uM cid /adrim abhinat parAy/a~N j/anA y/ad agn/im /ayajanta p/a~Nca //
|p2 {g}  /SrIN/Am udAr/o dhar/uNo rayIN/Am mahIS/ANAm pr/ArpaNaH s/omagopAH / v/asoH sUn/uH s/ahaso aps/u r/AjA v/i bhAty /agra uS/asAm idhAn/aH //
|p3 {h}  y/as te ady/a k.rN/avad bhadra/Soce 'pUp/aM deva gh.rt/avantam agne / pr/a t/aM naya pratar/AM v/asyo /achAbh/i dyumn/aM dev/abhaktaM yaviSTha //
|p4 {i}  /A //

|c2,2,4
|p1     t/am bhaja sau/SravaseSv agna ukth/auktha /A bhaja /Sasy/amAne / priy/aH s/Urye priy/o agn/A bhavAty /uj jAt/ena bhin/adad uj j/anitvaiH //
|p2 {k}  tv/Am agne y/ajamAnA /anu dy/Un v/i/SvA v/asUni dadhire v/AryANi / tv/ayA sah/a dr/aviNam ich/amAnA vraj/aM g/omantam u/S/ijo v/i vavruH //
|p3 {l}  d.r/SAn/o rukm/a urvy/A vy \adyaud durm/arSam /AyuH /Sriy/e rucAn/aH / agn/ir am/rto abhavad v/ayobhir y/ad enaM dy/aur /ajanayat sur/etAH //

|c2,3,1
|p1 {a}  /annapat/e 'nnasya no dehy anamIv/asya /SuSm/iNaH / pr/a pradAt/AraM tAriSa /UrjaM no dhehi dvip/ade c/atuSpade //
|p2 {b}  /ud u tvA v/i/Sve dev/A /agne bh/arantu c/ittibhiH / s/a no bhava /Siv/atamaH supr/atIko vibh/AvasuH //
|p3 {c}  pr/ed agne jy/otiSmAn yAhi /Siv/ebhir arc/ibhis tv/am / b.rh/adbhir bhAn/ubhir bh/Asan m/A hi~MsIs tan/uvA praj/AH //
|p4 {d}  sam/idhAgn/iM duvasyata gh.rt/air bodhayat/Atithim / /A //

|c2,3,2
|p1     asmin havy/A juhotana //
|p2 {e}  pr/aprAy/am agn/ir bharat/asya /S.rNve v/i y/at s/Uryo n/a r/ocate b.rh/ad bh/AH / abh/i y/aH pUr/um p/rtanAsu tasth/au dId/Aya d/aivyo /atithiH /Siv/o naH //
|p3 {f}  /Apo devIH pr/ati g.rhNIta bh/asmait/at syon/e k.rNudhva~M surabh/Av u lok/e / t/asmai namantAM j/anayaH sup/atnIr mAt/eva putr/am bibh.rt/A sv \enam //
|p4 {g}  apsv \agne s/adhiS T/ava //

|c2,3,3
|p1     s/auSadhIr /anu rudhyase / g/arbhe s/a~N jAyase p/unaH //
|p2 {h}  g/arbho asy /oSadhInAM g/arbho v/anasp/atInAM / g/arbho v/i/Svasya bhUt/asy/Agne g/arbho ap/Am asi //
|p3 {i}  pras/adya bh/asmanA y/onim ap/a/S ca p.rthiv/Im agne / sa~Ms/rjya mAt/rbhis tv/aM jy/otiSmAn p/unar /AsadaH //
|p4 {k}  p/unar As/adya s/adanam ap/a/S ca p.rthiv/Im agne / /S/eSe mAt/ur y/athop/asthe 'nt/ar asy/A~M /Siv/atamaH //
|p5 {l}  p/unar Urj/A //

|c2,3,4
|p1     n/i vartasva p/unar agna iS/AyuSA / p/unar naH pAhi vi/Sv/ataH //
|p2 {m}  sah/a rayy/A n/i vartasv/Agne pinvasva dh/ArayA / vi/Sv/apsniyA vi/Sv/atas p/ari //
|p3 {n}  p/unas tvAdity/A rudr/A v/asavaH s/am indhatAm p/unar brahm/ANo vasunItha yaj~N/aiH / gh.rt/ena tv/aM tan/uvo vardhayasva saty/AH santu y/ajamAnasya k/AmAH //
|p4 {o}  b/odhA no asya v/acaso yaviSTha m/a~MhiSThasya pr/abh.rtasya svadhAvaH / p/Iyati tvo /anu tvo g.rNAti vand/Arus te tan/uvaM vande agne //
|p5 {p}  s/a bodhi sUr/ir magh/avA vasud/AvA v/asupatiH / yuyodhy \asm/ad dv/eSA~Msi //

|c2,4,1
|p1 {a}  /apeta v/Ita v/i ca sarpat/Ato y/e 'tra sth/a purAN/A y/e ca n/UtanAH / /adAd id/aM yam\o 'vas/Anam p.rthivy/A /akrann im/am pit/aro lok/am asmai //
|p2 {b}  agn/er bh/asmAsy agn/eH p/urISam asi
|p3 {c}  saMj~N/Anam asi kAmadh/araNam m/ayi te kAmadh/araNam bhUyAt
|p4 {d}  s/aM y/A vaH priy/As tan/uvaH s/am priy/A h/rdayAni vaH / Atm/A vo astu //

|c2,4,2
|p1     s/ampriyaH s/ampriyAs tan/uvo m/ama //
|p2 {e}  ay/a~M s/o agn/ir y/asmint s/omam /indraH sut/aM dadh/e jaTh/are vAva/SAn/aH / sahasr/iyaM v/Ajam /atyaM n/a s/apti~M sasav/Ant s/ant stUyase jAtavedaH //
|p3 {f}  /agne div/o /arNam /achA jigAsy /achA dev/A~M UciSe dh/iSNiyA y/e / y/AH par/astAd rocan/e s/Uryasya y/A/S cAv/astAd upat/iSThanta /ApaH //
|p4 {g}  /agne y/at te div/i v/arcaH p.rthivy/AM y/ad /oSadhISu //

|c2,4,3
|p1     aps/u vA yajatra / y/enAnt/arikSam urv \Atat/antha tveS/aH s/a bhAn/ur arNav/o n.rc/akSAH //
|p2 {h}  purISy\Aso agn/ayaH prAvaN/ebhiH sajoSasaH / juS/antA~M havy/am /Ahutam anamIv/A /iSo mah/IH //
|p3 {i}  /iDAm agne purud/a~Msa~M san/iM g/oH /Sa/Svattam/a~M h/avamAnAya sAdha / sy/An naH sun/us t/anayo vij/Av/Agne s/A te sumat/ir bhUtv asm/e //
|p4 {k}  ay/aM te y/onir .rtv/iyo y/ato jAt/o /arocathAH / t/aM jAn/an //

|c2,4,4
|p1     agna /A roh/AthA no vardhayA ray/im //
|p2 {l}  c/id asi t/ayA dev/atayA.Ngirav/ad dhruv/A sIda
|p3 {m}  paric/id asi t/ayA dev/atayA.Ngirasv/ad dhruv/A sIda
|p4 {n}  lok/am p.rNa chidr/am p.rN/Atho sIda /Siv/A tv/am / indrAgn/I tvA b/rhasp/atir asm/in y/onAv asISadan //
|p5 {o}  t/A asya s/UdadohasaH s/oma~M /SrINanti p/r/SnayaH / j/anman dev/AnAM v/i/Sas triSv /A rocan/e divaH //

|c2,5,1
|p1 {a}  s/am ita~M s/aM kalpethA~M s/ampriyau rociSN/U sumanasy/amAnau / /iSam /Urjam abh/i saMv/asAnau /SaM vAm m/anA~Msi s/aM vrat/A s/am u citt/Any /Akaram //
|p2 {b}  /agne purISyAdhip/A bhavA tv/aM naH / /iSam /UrjaM y/ajamAnAya dhehi //
|p3 {c}  purISy\as tv/am agne rayim/An puSTim/A~M asi / /Siv/AH k.rtv/A d/i/SaH s/arvAH sv/AM y/onim ih/AsadaH //
|p4 {d}  bh/avataM naH s/amanasau s/amokasau //

|c2,5,2
|p1     arep/asau / m/A yaj~N/a~M hi~MsiSTam m/A yaj~N/apatiM jAtavedasau /Siv/au bhavatam ady/a naH //
|p2 {e}  mAt/eva putr/am p.rthiv/I purISy\am agn/i~M sv/e y/onAv abhAr ukh/A / t/AM v/i/Svair dev/air .rt/ubhiH saMvidAn/aH praj/Apatir vi/Sv/akarmA v/i mu~Ncatu //
|p3 {f}  y/ad asya pAr/e r/ajasaH /Sukr/aM jy/otir /ajAyata / t/an naH parSad /ati dv/i/S/o 'gne vai/SvAnara sv/AhA //
|p4 {g}  n/amaH s/u te nir.rte vi/SvarUpe //

|c2,5,3
|p1     ayasm/ayaM v/i c.rtA bandh/am et/am / yam/ena tv/aM yamy\A saMvidAn/ottam/aM n/Akam /adhi rohayem/am //
|p2 {h}  y/at te dev/I n/ir.rtir Abab/andha d/Ama grIv/Asv avicarty/am / id/aM te t/ad v/i SyAmy /AyuSo n/a m/adhyAd /athA jIv/aH pit/um addhi pr/amuktaH //
|p3 {i}  y/asyAs te asy/AH krUr/a As/a~N juh/omy eS/Am bandh/AnAm avas/arjanAya / bh/Umir /iti tvA j/anA vid/ur n/ir.rtiH //

|c2,5,4
|p1     /iti tvAh/am p/ari veda vi/Sv/ataH //
|p2 {k}  /asunvantam /ayajamAnam icha sten/asyety/AM t/askarasy/Anv eSi / any/am asm/ad icha S/a ta ity/A n/amo devi nir.rte t/ubhyam astu //
|p3 {l}  dev/Im ah/aM n/ir.rtiM v/andamAnaH pit/eva putr/aM dasaye v/acobhiH / v/i/Svasya y/A j/AyamAnasya v/eda /S/iraH/SiraH pr/ati sUr/I v/i caSTe //
|p4 {m}  niv/e/SanaH saMg/amano v/asUnAM v/i/SvA rUp/Abh/i caSTe //

|c2,5,5
|p1     /S/acIbhiH / dev/a iva savit/A saty/adharm/endro n/a tasthau samar/e pathIn/Am //
|p2 {n}  s/aM varatr/A dadhAtana n/ir AhAv/An k.rNotana / si~Nc/AmahA avaT/am udr/iNaM vay/aM v/i/Sv/Ah/Adastam /akSitam //
|p3 {o}  n/iSk.rtAhAvam avaT/a~M suvaratr/a~M suSecan/am / udr/iNa~M si~Nce /akSitam //
|p4 {p}  s/IrA yu~Njanti kav/ayo yug/A v/i tanvate p/rthak / dh/IrA dev/eSu sumnay/A
|p5 {q}  yun/akta s/IrA v/i yug/A tanota k.rt/e y/onau vapateh/a //

|c2,5,6
|p1     b/Ijam / gir/A ca /SruST/iH s/abharA /asan no n/edIya /it s.rNy\A pakv/am /Ayat //
|p2 {r}  l/A.Ngalam p/avIrava~M su/S/eva~M sumat/itsaru / /ud /it k.rSati g/Am /avim prapharvay\aM ca p/IvarIm / prasth/Avad rathav/Ahanam //
|p3 {s}  /Sun/aM naH ph/AlA v/i tudantu bh/Umi~M /Sun/aM kIn/A/SA abh/i yantu vAh/An / /Sun/am parj/anyo m/adhunA p/ayobhiH /S/unAsIrA /Sun/am asm/Asu dhattam //
|p4 {t}  k/AmaM kAmadughe dhukSva mitr/Aya v/aruNAya ca / /indrAyAgn/aye pUSN/a /oSadhIbhyaH praj/AbhyaH //
|p5 {u}  gh.rt/ena s/ItA m/adhunA s/amaktA v/i/Svair dev/air /anumatA mar/udbhiH / /UrjasvatI p/ayasA p/invamAnAsm/Ant sIte p/ayasAbhy/Avav.rtsva //

|c2,6,1
|p1 {a}  y/A jAt/A /oSadhayo dev/ebhyas triyug/am pur/A / m/andAmi babhr/UNAm ah/a~M /Sat/aM dh/AmAni sapt/a ca //
|p2 {b}  /Sat/aM vo amba dh/AmAni sah/asram ut/a vo r/uhaH / /athA /Satakratvo yUy/am im/am me agad/aM k.rta //
|p3 {c}  p/uSpAvatIH pras/UvatIH phal/inIr aphal/A ut/a / /a/SvA iva saj/itvarIr vIr/udhaH pArayiSN/avaH //
|p4 {d}  /oSadhIr /iti mAtaras t/ad vo devIr /upa bruve / r/apA~Msi vighnat/Ir ita r/apaH //

|c2,6,2
|p1     cAt/ayamAnAH //
|p2 {e}  a/Svatth/e vo niS/adanam parN/e vo vasat/iH k.rt/A / gobh/Aja /it k/ilAsatha y/at san/avatha p/UruSam //
|p3 {f}  y/ad ah/aM vAj/ayann im/A /oSadhIr h/asta Adadh/e / Atm/A y/akSmasya na/Syati pur/A jIvag/rbho yathA //
|p4 {g}  y/ad /oSadhayaH saMg/achante r/AjAnaH s/amitAv iva / v/ipraH s/a ucyate bhiS/ag rakSoh/AmIvac/AtanaH //
|p5 {h}  n/iSk.rtir n/Ama vo mAt/AthA yUy/a~M stha s/aMk.rtIH / sar/AH patatr/iNIH //

|c2,6,3
|p1     sthana y/ad Am/ayati n/iS k.rta //
|p2 {i}  any/A vo any/Am avatv any/Any/asyA /upAvata / t/AH s/arvA /oSadhayaH saMvidAn/A id/am me pr/AvatA v/acaH //
|p3 {k}  /uc ch/uSmA /oSadhInAM g/Avo goSTh/Ad iverate / dh/ana~M saniSy/antInAm Atm/AnaM t/ava pUruSa //
|p4 {l}  /ati v/i/SvAH pariSTh/A sten/a iva vraj/am akramuH / /oSadhayaH pr/Acucyavur y/at k/iM ca tan/uvA~M r/apaH //
|p5 {m}  y/AH //

|c2,6,4
|p1     ta Atasth/ur Atm/AnaM y/A Avivi/S/uH p/aruHparuH / t/As te y/akSmaM v/i bAdhantAm ugr/o madhyama/S/Ir iva //
|p2 {n}  sAk/aM yakSma pr/a pata /Syen/ena kikidIv/inA / sAk/aM v/Atasya dhr/AjyA sAk/aM na/Sya nih/AkayA //
|p3 {o}  a/SvAvat/I~M somavat/Im Urj/ayantIm /udojasam / /A vitsi s/arvA /oSadhIr asm/A ariST/atAtaye //
|p4 {p}  y/AH phal/inIr y/A aphal/A apuSp/A y/A/S ca puSp/iNIH / b/rhasp/atiprasUtAs t/A no mu~Ncantv /a~MhasaH //
|p5 {q}  y/AH //

|c2,6,5
|p1     /oSadhayaH s/omarAj~NIH pr/aviSTAH p.rthiv/Im /anu / t/AsAM tv/am asy uttam/A pr/a No jIv/Atave suva //
|p2 {r}  avap/atantIr avadan div/a /oSadhayaH p/ari / y/aM jIv/am a/Sn/avAmahai n/a s/a riSyAti p/UruSaH //
|p3 {s}  y/A/S ced/am upa/S.rNv/anti y/A/S ca dUr/am p/arAgatAH / ih/a saMg/atya t/AH s/arvA asmai s/aM datta bheSaj/am //
|p4 {t}  m/A vo riSat khanit/A y/asmai cAh/aM kh/anAmi vaH / dvip/ac c/atuSpad asm/Aka~M s/arvam astv anAtur/am //
|p5 {u}  /oSadhayaH s/aM vadante s/omena sah/a r/Aj~NA / y/asmai kar/oti brAhmaN/as t/a~M rAjan pArayAmasi //

|c2,7,1
|p1 {a}  m/A no hi~MsIj janit/A y/aH p.rthivy/A y/o vA d/iva~M saty/adharmA jaj/Ana / y/a/S c/Ap/a/S candr/A b.rhat/Ir jaj/Ana k/asmai dev/Aya hav/iSA vidhema //
|p2 {b}  abhy/Avartasva p.rthivi yaj~N/ena p/ayasA sah/a / vap/AM te agn/ir iSit/o 'va sarpatu //
|p3 {c}  /agne y/at te /Sukr/aM y/ac candr/aM y/at pUt/aM y/ad yaj~N/iyam / t/ad dev/ebhyo bharAmasi //
|p4 {d}  /iSam /Urjam ah/am it/a /A //

|c2,7,2
|p1     dada .rt/asya dh/Amno am/rtasya y/oneH / /A no g/oSu vi/Satv /auSadhISu j/ahAmi sed/im /anirAm /amIvAm //
|p2 {e}  /agne t/ava /Sr/avo v/ayo m/ahi bhrAjanty arc/ayo vibhAvaso / b/rhadbhAno /S/avasA v/Ajam ukthy\aM d/adhAsi dAs/uSe kave //
|p3 {f}  irajy/ann agne prathayasva jant/ubhir asm/e r/Ayo amartya / s/a dar/Sat/asya v/apuSo v/i rAjasi p.rN/akSi sAnas/i~M ray/im //
|p4 {g}  /Urjo napAj jAtavedaH su/Sast/ibhir m/andasva //

|c2,7,3
|p1     dhIt/ibhir hit/aH / tv/e /iSaH s/aM dadhur bh/Uriretasa/S citr/otayo vAm/ajAtAH //
|p2 {h}  pAvak/avarcAH /Sukr/avarcA /anUnavarcA /ud iyarSi bhAn/unA / putr/aH pit/arA vic/arann /upAvasy ubh/e p.rNakSi r/odasI //
|p3 {i}  .rt/AvAnam mahiS/aM vi/Sv/acarSaNim agn/i~M sumn/Aya dadhire pur/o j/anAH / /Sr/utkarNa~M sapr/athastamam tvA gir/A d/aivyam m/AnuSA yug/A //
|p4 {k}  niSkart/Aram adhvar/asya pr/acetasaM kS/ayanta~M r/Adhase mah/e / rAt/im bh/rgUNAm u/S/ijaM kav/ikratum p.rN/akSi sAnas/im //

|c2,7,4
|p1     ray/im //
|p2 {l}  c/ita stha paric/ita Urdhvac/itaH /SrayadhvaM t/ayA dev/atayA.Ngirasv/ad dhruv/AH sIdata //
|p3 {m}  /A pyAyasva s/am etu te vi/Sv/ataH soma v/rSNiyam / bh/avA v/Ajasya saMgath/e //
|p4 {n}  s/aM te p/ayA~Msi s/am u yantu v/AjAH s/aM v/rSNiyAny abhimAtiS/AhaH / Apy/AyamAno am/rtAya soma div/i /Sr/avAnsy uttam/Ani dhiSva //

|c2,8,1
|p1 {a}  abhy \asthAd v/i/SvAH p/rtanA /arAtIs t/ad agn/ir Aha t/ad u s/oma Aha / b/rhasp/atiH savit/A t/an ma Aha puS/A mAdhAt suk.rt/asya lok/e //
|p2 {b}  y/ad /akrandaH pratham/aM j/AyamAna udy/ant samudr/Ad ut/a vA p/urISAt / /Syen/asya pakS/A hariN/asya bAh/U /upastutaM j/anima t/at te arvan //
|p3 {c}  ap/Am p.rSTh/am asi y/onir agn/eH samudr/am abh/itaH p/invamAnam / v/ardhamAnam mah/aH //

|c2,8,2
|p1     /A ca p/uSkaraM div/o m/AtrayA varN/A prathasva //
|p2 {d}  br/ahma jaj~NAn/am pratham/am pur/astAd v/i sImat/aH sur/uco ven/a AvaH / s/a budhn/iyA upam/A asya viSTh/AH sat/a/S ca y/onim /asata/S ca v/ivaH //
|p3 {e}  hiraNyagarbh/aH s/am avartat/Agre bhUt/asya jAt/aH p/atir /eka AsIt / s/a dAdhAra p.rthiv/IM dy/Am ut/em/AM k/asmai dev/Aya hav/iSA vidhema //
|p4 {f}  draps/a/S caskanda p.rthiv/Im /anu //

|c2,8,3
|p1     dy/Am im/aM ca y/onim /anu y/a/S ca p/UrvaH / t.rt/IyaM y/onim /anu saMc/arantaM draps/aM juhomy /anu sapt/a h/otrAH //
|p2 {g}  n/amo astu sarp/ebhyo y/e k/e ca p.rthiv/Im /anu / y/e ant/arikSe y/e div/i t/ebhyaH sarp/ebhyo n/amaH //
|p3 {h}  y\e 'd/o rocan/e div/o y/e vA s/Uryasya ra/Sm/iSu / y/eSAm aps/u s/adaH k.rt/aM t/ebhyaH sarp/ebhyo n/amaH //
|p4 {i}  y/A /iSavo yAtudh/AnAnAM y/e vA v/anasp/atI~Mr /anu / y/e vAvaT/eSu /S/erate t/ebhyaH sarp/ebhyo n/amaH //

|c2,9,1
|p1 {a}  dhruv/Asi dhar/uN/Ast.rtA vi/Sv/akarmaNA s/ukritA / m/A tvA samudr/a /ud vadhIn m/A suparN/o 'vyathamAnA p.rthiv/IM d.r~Mha //
|p2 {b}  praj/Apatis tvA sAdayatu p.rthivy/AH p.rSTh/e vy/acasvatIm pr/athasvatIm pr/atho 'si p.rthivy \asi bh/Ur asi bh/Umir asy /aditir asi vi/Sv/adhAyA v/i/Svasya bh/uvanasya dhartr/I p.rthiv/IM yacha p.rthiv/IM d.r~Mha p.rthiv/Im m/A hi~MsIr v/i/Svasmai prAN/Aya vyAn/AyodAn/Aya pratiSTh/Ayai //

|c2,9,2
|p1 car/itrAyAgn/is tvAbh/i pAtu mahy/A svasty/A chard/iSA /S/aMtamena t/ayA dev/atayA.Ngirasv/ad dhruv/A sIda
|p2 {c}  k/ANDAtkANDAt prar/ohantI p/aruSaHparuSaH p/ari / ev/A no dUrve pr/a tanu sah/asreNa /Sat/ena ca //
|p3 {d}  y/A /Sat/ena pratan/oSi sah/asreNa vir/ohasi t/asyAs te devISTake vidh/ema hav/iSA vay/am //
|p4 {e}  /aSADhAsi s/ahamAnA s/ahasv/ArAtIH s/ahasvArAtIyat/aH
|p5 {f}  s/ahasva p/rtanAH s/ahasva p.rtanyat/aH sah/asravIryA //

|c2,9,3
|p1     asi s/A mA jinva //
|p2 {g}  m/adhu v/AtA .rtAyat/e m/adhu kSaranti s/indhavaH / m/AdhvIr naH santv /oSadhIH //
|p3 {h}  m/adhu n/aktam ut/oS/asi m/adhumat p/Arthiva~M r/ajaH / m/adhu dy/aur astu naH pit/A //
|p4 {i}  m/adhumAn no v/anasp/atir m/adhumA~M astu s/UryaH / m/AdhvIr g/Avo bhavantu naH //
|p5 {k}  mah/I dy/auH p.rthiv/I ca na im/aM yaj~N/am mimikSatAm / pip.rt/AM no bh/arImabhiH //
|p6 {l}  t/ad v/iSNoH param/am //

|c2,9,4
|p1     pad/a~M s/adA pa/Syanti sUr/ayaH / div/Iva c/akSur /Atatam //
|p2 {m}  dhruv/Asi p.rthivi s/ahasva p.rtanyat/aH / syUt/A dev/ebhir am/rten/AgAH //
|p3 {n}  y/As te agne s/Urye r/uca udyat/o d/ivam Atanv/anti ra/Sm/ibhiH / t/AbhiH s/arvAbhI ruc/e j/anAya nas k.rdhi //
|p4 {o}  y/A vo devAH s/Urye r/uco g/oSv /a/SveSu y/A r/ucaH / /indrAgnI t/AbhiH s/arvAbhI r/ucaM no dhatta b.rhaspate
|p5 {p}  vir/AT //

|c2,9,5
|p1     jy/otir adhArayat samr/AD jy/otir adhArayat svar/AD jy/otir adhArayat
|p2 {q}  /agne yukSv/A h/i y/e t/avA/SvAso deva sAdh/avaH / /araM v/ahanty A/S/avaH //
|p3 {r}  yukSv/A h/i devah/UtamA~M /a/SvA~M agne rath/Ir iva / n/i h/otA pUrvy/aH sadaH //
|p4 {s}  draps/a/S caskanda p.rthiv/Im /anu dy/Am im/aM ca y/onim /anu y/a/S ca p/UrvaH / t.rt/IyaM y/onim /anu saMc/arantaM draps/aM juhomy /anu sapt/a //

|p1 h/otrAH //
|p2 {t}  /abhUd id/aM v/i/Svasya bh/uvanasya v/Ajinam agn/er vai/SvAnar/asya ca / agn/ir jy/otiSA jy/otiSmAn rukm/o v/arcasA v/arcasvAn //

|c2,10,1
|p1 {a}  Adity/aM g/arbham p/ayasA sama~Nj/ant sah/asrasya pratim/AM vi/Sv/arUpam / p/ari v.r.Ngdhi h/arasA m/Abh/i m.rkSaH /Sat/AyuSaM k.rNuhi cIy/amAnaH //
|p2 {b}  im/am m/A hi~MsIr dvip/Adam pa/SUn/A~M s/ahasrAkSa m/edha /A cIy/amAnaH / m/ayum AraNy/am /anu te di/SAmi t/ena cinvAn/as tan/uvo n/i SIda //

|c2,10,2
|p1     param/e vy\oman //
|p2 {d}  im/am m/A hi~MsIr /eka/Sapham pa/SUn/AM kanikrad/aM vAj/inaM v/AjineSu / gaur/am AraNy/am /anu te di/SAmi t/ena cinvAn/as tan/uvo n/i SIda //
|p3 {e}  /ajasram /indum aruS/am bhuraNy/um agn/im IDe pUrv/acittau n/amobhiH / s/a p/arvabhir .rtu/S/aH k/alpamAno g/Am m/A hi~MsIr /aditiM vir/Ajam //
|p4 {f}  im/a~M samudr/a~M /Sat/adhAram /utsaM vyacy/amAnam bh/uvanasya m/adhye / gh.rt/aM d/uhAnAm /aditiM j/anAy/Agne m/A //

|c2,10,3
|p1     hi~MsIH param/e vy\oman / gavay/am AraNy/am /anu te di/SAmi t/ena cinvAn/as tan/uvo n/i SIda //

|c2,10,4
|p1     te di/SAmi t/ena cinvAn/as tan/uvo n/i SIda //

|p3 {k}  aj/A hy \agn/er /ajaniSTa g/arbhAt s/A v/A apa/Syaj janit/Aram /agre / t/ayA r/oham Ayann /upa m/edhyAsaH t/ayA dev/A dev/atAm /agra Ayan / /Sarabh/am AraNy/am Anu te di/SAmi t/ena cinvAn/as tan/uvo n/i SIda //

|p3 {c}  pr/a carSaN/ibhyaH p.rtanA h/aveSu pr/a p.rthivy/A riricAthe div/a/S ca / pr/a s/indhubhyaH pr/a gir/ibhyo mahitv/A pr/endrAgnI vi/SvA bh/uvan/Aty any/A //

|c3,9,1
|p1 {a}  agn/er bhAg\o 'si dIkS/AyA /Adhipatyam br/ahma sp.rt/aM t.rv/rt st/omas \
|p2 {b}  /indrasya bhAg\o 'si v/iSNor /AdhipatyaM kSatr/a~M sp.rt/am pa~Ncada/S/a st/omas \
|p3 {c}  n.rc/akSasAm bhAg\o 'si dhAt/ur /AdhipatyaM jan/itra~M sp.rt/a~M saptada/S/a st/omas \
|p4 {d}  mitr/asya bhAg\o 'si v/aruNasy/AdhipatyaM div/o v.rST/ir v/AtA sp.rt/A ekavi~M/S/a stom/as \
|p5 {e}  /adityai bhAg\o 'si pUSN/a /Adhipatyam /oja sp.rt/aM triNav/a st/omas \
|p6 {f}  v/asUnAm bhAg\o 'si //

|c3,9,2
|p1     rudr/ANAm /AdhipatyaM c/atuSpAt sp.rt/aM caturvi~M/S/a st/omas \
|p2 {g}  Adity/AnAm bhAg\o 'si mar/utAm /AdhipatyaM g/arbhA sp.rt/AH pa~Ncavi~M/S/a st/omas \
|p3 {h}  dev/asya savit/ur bhAg\o 'si b/rhasp/ater d/Ahipatya~M sam/IcIr d/i/Sa sp.rt/A/S catuSTom/a st/omas \

|c3,10,1
|p1     /ekayAstuvata praj/A adhIyanta praj/Apatir /adhipatir AsIt

|c3,11,1
|p1 {a}  iy/am ev/a s/A y/A pratham/A vy/auchad ant/ar asy/AM carati pr/aviSTA / vadh/Ur jajAna navag/aj j/anitrI tr/aya enAm mahim/AnaH sacante //

|c4,2,1
|p1 {a}  r/Aj~Ny asi pr/AcI dig v/asavas te dev/A /adhipatayo 'gn/ir hetIn/Am pratidhart/A triv/rt tvA st/omaH p.rthivy/A~M /Srayatv /Ajyam ukth/am /avyathayat stabhnAtu rathaMtar/a~M s/Ama pr/atiSThityai

|c4,2,2
|p1     Adity/As te dev/A /adhipatayaH s/omo hetIn/Am pratidhart/A saptada/S/as tvA st/omaH p.rthivy/A~M /Srayatu marutvat/Iyam ukth/am /avyathayat stabhnAtu vairUp/a~M s/Ama pr/atiSThityai

|c4,2,3

|p2 {f}  ant/arikSAy/arSayas tvA prathamaj/A dev/eSu div/o m/AtrayA variN/A prathantu vidhart/A cAy/am /adhpati/S ca t/e tvA s/arve saMvidAn/A n/Akasya p.rSTh/e suvarg/e lok/e y/ajamAnaM ca sAdayantu //

|c4,3,1
|p1 {a}  ay/am pur/o h/arike/SaH s/Uryara/Smis t/asya rathag.rts/a/S ca r/athaujA/S ca senAnigrAmaNy\au pu~Njikasthal/A ca k.rtasthal/A cApsar/asau yAtudh/AnA het/I r/akSA~Msi pr/ahetis \

|c4,3,2
|p1     anuml/ocantI cApsar/asau sarp/A het/ir vyAghr/AH pr/ahetis \

|p3 {e}  ay/am up/ary arv/Agvasus t/asya t/ArkSya/S c/AriSTanemi/S ca senAnigrAmaNy\Av urv/a/SI ca pUrv/acitti/S cApsar/asau vidy/ud dhet/ir avasph/Urjan pr/ahetis
|p4 {f}  t/ebhyo n/amas t/e no m.rDayantu t/e y/aM //

|c4,3,3
|p1     dviSm/o y/a/S ca no dv/eSTi t/aM vo j/ambhe dadhAmi \
|p2 {g}  Ay/os tvA s/adane sAdayAmy /avata/S chAy/AyAM n/amaH samudr/Aya n/amaH samudr/asya c/akSase
|p3 {h}  parameSTh/I tvA sAdayatu div/aH p.rSTh/e vy/acasvatIm pr/athasvatIM vibh/UmatIm prabh/UmatIm paribh/UmatIM d/ivaM yacha d/ivaM d.r~Mha d/ivam m/A hi~MsIr v/i/Svasmai prAN/AyApAn/Aya vyAn/AyodAn/Aya pratiSTh/Ayai car/itrAya s/Uryas tvAbh/i pAtu mahy/A svasty/A chard/iSA /S/aMtamena t/ayA dev/atayA.Ngirasv/ad dhruv/A sIda
|p4 {i}  pr/othad /a/Svo n/a y/avase aviSy/an yad/A mah/aH saMv/araNAd vy/asthA / /Ad asy v/Ato /anu vAti /Soc/ir /adha sma te vr/ajanaM k.rSN/am asti //

|c4,4,1
|p1 {a}  agn/ir mUrdh/A div/aH kak/ut pat/iH p.rthivy/A ay/am / ap/A~M r/etA~Msi jinvati //
|p2 {b}  tv/Am agne p/uSkarAd /adhy /atharvA n/ir amanthata / mUrdhn/o v/i/Svasya vAgh/ataH //
|p3 {c}  ay/am agn/iH sahasr/iNo v/Ajasya /Sat/inas p/atiH / mUrdh/A kav/I rayIN/Am //
|p4 {d}  bh/uvo yaj~N/asya r/ajasa/S ca net/A y/atrA niy/udbhiH s/acase /Siv/AbhiH / div/i mUrdh/AnaM dadhiSe suvarS/AM jihv/Am agne cak.rSe havyav/Aham //
|p5 {e}  /abodhy agn/iH sam/idhA j/anAnAm //

|c4,4,2
|p1     pr/ati dhen/um ivAyat/Im uS/Asam / yahv/A iva pr/a vay/Am ujj/ihAnAH pr/a bhAn/avaH sisrate n/Akam ach/a //
|p2 {f}  /avocAma kav/aye m/edhyAya v/aco vand/Aru v.rSabh/Aya v/rSNe / g/aviSThiro n/amasA st/omam agn/au div/Iva rukm/am urvy/a~Ncam a/Sret //
|p3 {g}  j/anasya gop/A ajaniSTa j/Ag.rvir agn/iH sud/akSaH suvit/Aya n/avyase / gh.rt/apratIko b.rhat/A divisp/r/SA dyum/ad v/i bhAti bharat/ebhyaH /S/uciH //
|p4 {h}  tv/Am agne /a.NgirasaH //

|c4,4,3
|p1     g/uhA hit/am /anv avinda~N chi/SriyAN/aM v/anevane / s/a jAyase mathy/amAnaH s/aho mah/at tv/Am AhuH s/ahasas putr/am a.NgiraH //
|p2 {i}  yaj~N/asya ket/um pratham/am put/ohitam agn/iM n/aras triSadhasth/e s/am indhate / /indreNa dev/aiH sar/atha~M s/a barh/iSi s/Idan n/i h/otA yaj/athAya sukr/atuH //
|p3 {k}  tv/AM citra/Sravastama h/avante vikS/u jant/avaH / /Soc/iSke/Sam purupriy/Agne havy/Aya v/oDhave //
|p4 {l}  s/akhAyaH s/aM vaH samy/a~Ncam /iSam //

|c4,4,4
|p1     st/omaM cAgn/aye / v/arSiSThAya kSitIn/Am Urj/o n/aptre s/ahasvate //
|p2 {m}  s/a~Msam /id yuvase v.rSann /agne v/i/SvAny ary/a /A / iD/as pad/e s/am idhyase s/a no v/asUny /A bhara //
|p3 {n}  en/A vo agn/iM n/amasorj/o n/apAtam /A huve / priy/aM c/etiSTham arat/i~M svadhvar/aM v/i/Svasya dUt/am am/rtam //
|p4 {o}  s/a yojate aruS/o vi/Sv/abhojasA s/a dudravat sv\AhutaH / subr/ahmA yaj~N/aH su/S/amI //

|c4,4,5
|p1     v/asUnAM dev/a~M r/Adho j/anAnAm //
|p2 {p}  /ud asya /Soc/ir asthAd Aj/uhvAnasya mIDh/uSaH / /ud dhum/Aso aruS/Aso divisp/r/SaH s/am agn/im indhate n/araH //
|p3 {q}  /agne v/Ajasya g/omata /I/SAnaH sahaso yaho / asm/e dhehi jAtavedo m/ahi /Sr/avaH //
|p4 {r}  s/a idhAn/o v/asuS kav/ir agn/ir ID/enyo gir/A / rev/ad asm/abhyam purvaNIka dIdihi //
|p5 {s}  kSap/o rAjann ut/a tm/an/Agne v/astor ut/oS/asaH / s/a tigmajambha //

|c4,4,6
|p1     rakS/aso daha pr/ati //
|p2 {t}  /A te agna idhImahi dyum/antaM dev/Aj/aram / y/ad dha sy/A te p/anIyasI sam/id dId/ayati dy/av/ISa~M stot/rbhya /A bhara //
|p3 {u}  /A te agna .rc/A hav/iH /Sukr/asya jyotiSas tape / s/u/Scandra d/asma v/i/Spate h/avyavAT t/ubhya~M hUyata /iSa~M stot/rbhya /A bhara //
|p4 {v}  ubh/e su/Scandra sarp/iSo d/arvI /SrINISa As/ani / ut/o na /ut pupUryAH //

|c4,4,7
|p1     ukth/eSu /Savasas pata /iSa~M stot/rbhya /A bhara //

|p3 {x}  /adhA hy \agne kr/ator bhadr/asya d/akSasya sAdh/oH / rath/Ir .rt/asya b.rhat/o babh/Utha //

|c4,4,8
|p1     s/uvar n/a jy/otiH / /agne vi/SvebhiH sum/anA /anIkaiH //

|p3 {o}  viSTambh/o div/o dhar/uNaH p.rthivy/A asy/e/SAnA j/agato v/iSNupatnI / vi/Sv/avyacA iS/ayantI s/ubhUtiH /Siv/A no astv /aditir up/asthe //

|c5,1,1
|p1 {a}  n/amas te rudra many/ava ut/o ta /iSave n/amaH / n/amas te astu dh/anvane bAh/ubhyAm ut/a te n/amaH //
|p2 {b}  y/A ta /iSuH /Siv/atamA /Siv/am babh/Uva te dh/anuH / /Siv/A /Saravy\A y/A t/ava t/ayA no rudra m.rDaya //
|p3 {c}  y/A te rudra /Siv/A tan/Ur /aghor/ApApakA/SinI / t/ayA nas tan/uvA /S/aMtamayA g/iri/SantAbh/i cAka/SIhi //
|p4 {d}  y/Am /iSuM giri/Santa h/aste //

|c5,1,2
|p1     b/ibharSy /astave / /Siv/AM giritra t/AM kuru m/A hi~MsIH p/uruSaM j/agat //
|p2 {e}  /Siv/ena v/acasA tvA g/iri/S/AchA vadAmasi / y/athA naH s/arvam /ij j/agad ayakSm/a~M sum/anA /asat //
|p3 {f}  /adhy avocad adhivakt/A pratham/o d/aivyo bhiS/ak / ah/I~M/S ca s/arvA~N jambh/ayant s/arvA/S ca yAtu dhAny\aH //
|p4 {g}  as/au y/as tAmr/o aruN/a ut/a babhr/uH suma.Ng/alaH / y/e cem/A~M rudr/A abh/ito dikS/u //

|c5,1,3
|p1     /Srit/AH sahasra/S/o 'vaiSA~M h/eDa Imahe //
|p2 {h}  as/au y/o 'vas/arpati n/IlagrIvo v/ilohitaH / ut/ainaM gop/A ad.r/Sann /ad.r/Sann udahAry\aH / ut/ainaM v/i/SvA bhUt/Ani s/a d.rST/o m.rDayAti naH //
|p3 {i}  n/amo astu n/IlagrIvAya sahasrAkS/Aya mID/uSe / /atho y/e asya s/atvAno 'h/aM t/ebhyo 'karaM n/amaH //
|p4 {k}  pr/a mu~Nca dh/anvanas tv/am ubh/ayor /Artniyor jy/Am / y/A/S ca te h/asta /iSavaH //

|c5,1,4
|p1     p/arA t/A bhagavo vapa //
|p2 {l}  avat/atya dh/anus tv/a~M s/ahasrAkSa /S/ateSudhe / ni/S/Irya /Saly/AnAm m/ukhA /Siv/o naH sum/anA bhava //
|p3 {m}  v/ijyaM dh/anuH kapard/ino v/i/Salyo b/ANavA~M ut/a / /ane/Sann asy/eSava Abh/ur asya niSa.Ng/athiH //
|p4 {n}  y/A te het/ir mIDhuSTama h/aste babh/Uva te dh/anuH / t/ayAsm/An vi/Sv/atas tv/am ayakSam/ayA p/ari bhuja //
|p5 {o}  n/amas te astv /AyudhAy/AnAtatAya dh.rSN/ave / ubh/AbhyAm ut/a te n/amo bAh/ubhyAM t/ava dh/anvane //
|p6 {p}  p/ari te dh/anvano het/ir asm/An v.rNaktu vi/Sv/ataH / /atho y/a iSudh/is t/avAr/e asm/an n/i dhehi t/am //

|c5,2,1
|p1 {a}  n/amo h/iraNyabAhave senAny\e di/S/AM ca p/ataye n/amas \
|p2 {b}  n/amo v.rkS/ebhyo h/arike/SebhyaH pa/SUn/Am p/ataye n/amas \
|p3 {c}  n/amaH sasp/i~NjarAya tv/iSImate pathIn/Am p/ataye n/amas \
|p4 {d}  n/amo babhlu/S/Aya vivyAdh/in/e 'nnAnAm p/ataye n/amas \
|p5 {e}  n/amo h/arike/SAyopavIt/ine puST/AnAm p/ataye n/amas \
|p6 {f}  n/amo bhav/asya hety/ai j/agatAm p/ataye n/amas \
|p7 {g}  n/amo rudr/AyAtatAvine kS/etrANAm p/ataye n/amas \
|p8 {h}  n/amaH sUt/Ay/AhantyAya v/anAnAm p/ataye n/amas \
|p9 {i}  n/amaH //

|c5,2,2

|c5,11,1

|p3 {lmn}  n/amo rudr/ebhyo y/e p.rthivy/AM y\e 'nt/arikSe y/e div/i y/eSAm /annaM v/Ato varS/am /iSavas t/ebhyo d/a/Sa pr/AcIr d/a/Sa dakSiN/A d/a/Sa prAt/IcIr d/a/S/odIcIr d/a/Sordhv/As t/ebhyo n/amas t/e no m.rDayantu t/e y/aM dviSm/o y/a/S ca no dv/eSTi t/aM vo j/ambhe dadhAmi //

|c6,1,1
|p1 {a}  /a/Smann /Urjam p/arvate /Si/SriyAN/AM v/Ate parj/anye v/aruNasya /S/uSme / adbhy/a /oSadhIbhyo v/anasp/atibhy/o 'dhi s/ambh.rtAM t/AM na /iSam /UrjaM dhatta marutaH sa~MrarAN/AH //

|p3 {p}  y/e dev/A dev/eSv /adhi devatv/am /Ayan y/e brahmaNaH puraet/Aro asy/a / y/ebhyo n/art/e p/avate dh/Ama k/iM can/a n/a t/e div/o n/a p.rthivy/A /adhi sn/uSu //

|c6,1,5
|p1     apAnad/A vyAnad/A/S cakSurd/A varcod/A varivod/AH / any/aM te asm/at tapantu het/ayaH pAvak/o asm/abhya~M /Siv/o bhava //
|p2 {r}  agn/is tigm/ena /Soc/iSA y/a~Msad v/i/SvaM ny \atr/iNam / agn/ir no va~Msate ray/im //
|p3 {s}  {F s/ain/AnIkena}{W s/ain/AnIkena}{ASS s/aiS/AnIkena}{BI s/ain/AnIkena}{GLOS -} suvid/atro asm/e y/aSTA dev/A~M /AyajiSThaH svast/i / /adabdho gop/A ut/a naH parasp/A /agne dyum/ad ut/a rev/ad didIhi //

|c6,2,1
|p1 {a}  y/a im/A v/i/SvA bh/uvanAni j/uhvad /rSir h/otA niSas/AdA pit/A naH / s/a A/S/iSA dr/aviNam ich/amAnaH paramach/ado v/ara /A vive/Sa //
|p2 {b}  vi/Sv/akarmA m/anasA y/ad v/ihAyA dhAt/A vidhAt/A param/ot/a saMd/rk / t/eSAm iST/Ani s/am iS/A madanti y/atra saptarS/In par/a /ekam Ah/uH //
|p3 {c}  y/o naH pit/A janit/A y/o vidhAt/A y/o naH sat/o abhy /A s/aj jaj/Ana //

|c6,2,2
|p1     y/o dev/AnAM nAmadh/A /eka ev/a t/a~M sampra/Sn/am bh/uvanA yanty any/A //
|p2 {d}  t/a /Ayajanta dr/aviNa~M s/am asmA /rSayaH p/Urve jarit/Aro n/a bhUn/A / as/UrtA s/UrtA r/ajaso vim/Ane y/e bhUt/Ani sam/ak.rNvann im/Ani //
|p3 {e}  n/a t/aM vidAtha y/a id/aM jaj/AnAny/ad yuSm/Akam /antaram bhavAti / nIhAr/eNa pr/Av.rtA j/alpyA c/Asut/rpa uktha/S/Asa/S caranti //
|p4 {f}  par/o div/A par/a en/A //

|c6,2,3
|p1     p.rthivy/A par/o dev/ebhir /asurair g/uhA y/at / k/a~M svid g/arbhaM pratham/aM dadhra /Apo y/atra dev/AH sam/agachanta v/i/Sve //
|p2 {g}  t/am /id g/arbham pratham/aM dadhra /Apo y/atra dev/AH sam/agachanta v/i/Sve / aj/asya n/AbhAv /adhy /ekam /arpitam y/asminn id/aM v/i/Svam bh/uvanam /adhi /Srit/am //
|p3 {h}  vi/Sv/akarmA hy /ajaniSTa dev/a /Ad /id gandharv/o abhavad dvit/IyaH / t.rt/IyaH pit/A janit/auSadhInAm //

|c6,2,4
|p1     ap/AM g/arbhaM vy \adadhAt purutr/A //
|p2 {i}  c/akSuSaH pit/A m/anasA h/i dh/Iro gh.rt/am ene ajanan n/aMnamAne / yad/ed /antA /adad.r~Mhanta p/Urva /Ad /id dy/AvAp.rthiv/I aprathetAm //
|p3 {k}  vi/Sv/ata/ScakSur ut/a vi/Sv/atomukho vi/Sv/atohasta ut/a vi/Sv/ataspAt / s/am bAh/ubhyAM n/amati s/am p/atatrair dy/AvAp.rthiv/I jan/ayan dev/a /ekaH //
|p4 {l}  k/i~M svid AsId adhiSTh/Anam Ar/ambhaNaM katam/at svit k/im AsIt / y/adI bh/UmiM jan/ayan //

|c6,2,5
|p1     vi/Sv/akarmA v/i dy/Am /aurNon mahin/A vi/Sv/acakSAH //
|p2 {m}  k/i~M svid v/anaM k/a u s/a v.rkS/a AsId y/ato dy/AvAp.rthiv/I niSTatakS/uH / m/anISiNo m/anasA p.rch/at/ed u t/ad y/ad adhy/atiSThad bh/uvanAni dhAr/ayan //
|p3 {n}  y/A te dh/AmAni param/ANi y/Avam/A y/A madhyam/A vi/Svakarmann ut/em/A / /S/ikSA s/akhibhyo hav/iSi svadhAvaH svay/aM yajasva tan/uvaM juSAN/aH //
|p4 {o}  vAc/as p/atiM vi/Sv/akarmANam Ut/aye //

|c6,2,6
|p1     manoy/ujaM v/Aje ady/A huvema / s/a no n/ediSThA h/avanAni joSate vi/Sv/a/SambhUr /avase sAdh/ukarmA //
|p2 {p}  v/i/Svakarman hav/iSA vAv.rdhAn/aH svay/aM yajasva tan/uvaM juSAN/aH / m/uhyantv any/e abh/itaH sap/atnA ih/Asm/Akam magh/avA sUr/ir astu //
|p3 {q}  v/i/Svakarman hav/iSA v/ardhanena trAt/Aram /indram ak.rNor avadhy/am / t/asmai v/i/SaH s/am anamanta pUrv/Ir ay/am ugr/o vihavy\o y/ath/Asat //
|p4 {r}  samudr/Aya vay/unAya s/indhUnAm p/ataye n/amaH / nad/InA~M s/arvAsAm pitr/e juhut/A vi/Sv/akarmaNe v/i/Sv/Ah/Amartya~M hav/iH //

|c6,3,1
|p1 {a}  /ud enam uttar/AM nay/Agne gh.rtenAhuta / rAy/as p/oSeNa s/a~M s.rja praj/ayA ca dh/anena ca //
|p2 {b}  /indrem/am pratar/AM k.rdhi sajAt/AnAm asad va/S/I / s/am enaM v/arcasA s.rja dev/ebhyo bhAgadh/A asat //
|p3 {c}  y/asya kurm/o hav/ir g.rh/e t/am agne vardhayA tv/am / t/asmai dev/A /adhi bravann ay/aM ca br/ahmaNas p/atiH //
|p4 {d}  /ud u tvA v/i/Sve dev/AH //

|c6,3,2
|p1     /agne bh/arantu c/ittibhiH / s/a no bhava /Siv/atamaH supr/atIko vibh/AvasuH //
|p2 {e}  p/a~Nca d/i/So d/aivIr yaj~N/am avantu dev/Ir /ap/AmatiM durmat/im b/AdhamAnAH / rAy/as p/oSe yaj~N/apatim Abh/ajantIH //
|p3 {f}  rAy/as p/oSe /adhi yaj~N/o asthAt s/amiddhe agn/Av /adhi mAmahAn/aH / ukth/apattra /IDyo g.rbhIt/as tapt/aM gharm/am parig/rhyAyajanta //
|p4 {g}  Urj/A y/ad yaj~N/am /a/Samanta dev/A d/aivyAya dhartr/e j/oSTre / deva/Sr/IH /Sr/ImaNAH /Sat/apayAH //

|c6,3,3
|p1     parig/rhya dev/A yaj~N/am Ayan //
|p2 {h}  s/Uryara/Smir h/arike/SaH pur/astAt savit/A jy/otir /ud ayA~M /ajasram / t/asya pUS/A prasav/aM yAti dev/aH samp/a/Syan v/i/SvA bh/uvanAni gop/AH //
|p3 {i}  dev/A dev/ebhyo adhvary/anto asthur vIt/a~M /Samitr/e /Samit/A yaj/adhyai / tur/Iyo yaj~N/o y/atra havy/am /eti t/ataH pAvak/A /a/S/iSo no juSantAm //
|p4 {k}  vim/Ana eS/a div/o m/adhya Asta Apapriv/An r/odasI ant/arikSam / s/a vi/Sv/AcIr abh/i //

|c6,3,4
|p1     caSTe gh.rt/AcIr antar/A p/Urvam /aparaM ca ket/um //
|p2 {l}  ukS/A samudr/o aruN/aH suparN/aH p/Urvasya y/onim pit/ur /A vive/Sa / m/adhye div/o n/ihitaH p/r/Snir /a/SmA v/i cakrame r/ajasaH pAty /antau //
|p3 {m}  /indraM v/i/SvA avIv.rdhant samudr/avyacasaM g/iraH / rath/Itama~M rathIn/AM v/AjAnA~M s/atpatim p/atim //
|p4 {n}  sumnah/Ur yaj~N/o dev/A~M /A ca vakSad y/akSad agn/ir dev/o dev/A~M /A ca vakSat /
|p5 {o}  v/Ajasya mA prasav/enodgrAbh/eN/od agrabhIt / /athA sap/atnA~M /indro me nigrAbh/eN/AdharA~M akaH //
|p6 {p}  udgrAbh/aM ca nigrAbh/aM ca br/ahma dev/A avIv.rdhan / /athA sap/atnAn indrAgn/I me viSUc/InAn vy \asyatAm //

|c6,4,1
|p1 {a}  A/S/uH /S/i/SAno v.rSabh/o n/a yudhm/o ghanAghan/aH kS/obhaNa/S carSaNIn/Am / saMkr/andano 'nimiS/a ekavIr/aH /Sat/a~M s/enA ajayat sAk/am /indraH //
|p2 {b}  saMkr/andanenAnimiS/eNa jiSN/unA yutkAr/eNa du/Scyavan/ena dh.rSN/unA / t/ad /indreNa jayata t/at sahadhvaM y/udho nara /iSuhastena v/rSNA //
|p3 {c}  s/a /iSuhastaiH s/a niSa.Ng/ibhir vA/S/I s/a~MsraSTA s/a y/udha /indro gaN/ena / sa~Ms.rSTaj/it somap/A bAhu/Sardhy \Urdhv/adhanvA pr/atihitAbhir /astA //
|p4 {d}  b/rhaspate p/ari dIya //

|c6,4,2
|p1     r/athena rakSoh/Am/itrA~M apab/AdhamAnaH / prabha~Nj/ant s/enAH pram.rNo yudh/A j/ayann asm/Akam edhy avit/A r/athAnAm //
|p2 {e}  gotrabh/idaM gov/idaM v/ajrabAhuM j/ayantam /ajma pram.rN/antam /ojasA / im/a~M sajAtA /anu vIrayadhvam /indra~M sakhAy/o 'nu s/a~M rabhadhvam //
|p3 {f}  balavij~NAy/a sth/aviraH pr/avIraH s/ahasvAn vAj/I s/ahamAna ugr/aH / abh/ivIro abh/isatvA sahoj/A j/aitram indra r/atham /A tiSTha gov/it //
|p4 {g}  abh/i gotr/ANi s/ahasA g/AhamAno 'dAy/aH //

|c6,4,3
|p1     vIr/aH /Sat/amanyur /indraH / du/Scyavan/aH p.rtanAS/AD ayudhy\o 'sm/Aka~M s/enA avatu pr/a yuts/u //
|p2 {h}  indr/a AsAM net/A b/rhasp/atir d/akSiNA yaj~N/aH pur/a etu s/omaH / devasen/AnAm abhibha~NjatIn/AM j/ayantInAm mar/uto yantv /agre //
|p3 {i}  /indrasya v/rSNo v/aruNasya r/Aj~Na Adity/AnAm mar/utA~M /S/ardha ugr/am / mah/AmanasAm bhuvanacyav/AnAM gh/oSo dev/AnAM j/ayatAm /ud asthAt //
|p4 {k}  asm/Akam /indraH s/am.rteSu dhvaj/eSv asm/AkaM y/A /iSavas t/A jayantu //

|c6,4,4
|p1     asm/AkaM vIr/A /uttare bhavantv asm/An u devA avatA h/aveSu //
|p2 {l}  /ud dharSaya maghavann /AyudhAny /ut s/atvanAm mAmak/AnAm m/ahA~Msi / /ud v.rtrahan vAj/inAM v/AjinAny /ud r/athAnAM j/ayatAm etu gh/oSaH //
|p3 {m}  /upa pr/eta j/ayatA nara sthir/A vaH santu bAh/avaH / /indro vaH /S/arma yachatv anAdh.rSy/A y/ath/Asatha //
|p4 {n}  /avas.rSTA p/arA pata /S/aravye br/ahmasa~M/SitA / g/achAm/itrAn pr/a //

|c6,4,5
|p1     vi/Sa m/aiSAM k/aM can/oc chiSaH //
|p2 {o}  m/armANi te v/armabhi/S chAdayAmi s/omas tvA r/AjAm/rtenAbh/i vastAm / ur/or v/arIyo v/arivas te astu j/ayantaM tv/Am /anu madantu dev/AH //
|p3 {p}  y/atra bAN/AH samp/atanti kumAr/A vi/Sikh/A iva / /indro nas t/atra v.rtrah/A vi/SvAh/A /S/arma yachatu //

|c6,5,1
|p1 {a}  pr/AcIm /anu prAd/i/Sam pr/ehi vidv/An agn/er agne pur/oagnir bhaveh/a / v/i/SvA /A/SA d/IdyAno v/i bhAhy /UrjaM no dhehi dvip/ade c/atuSpade //
|p2 {b}  kram/adhvam agn/inA n/Akam /ukhya~M h/asteSu b/ibhrataH / div/aH p.rSTh/a~M s/uvar gatv/A mi/Sr/A dev/ebhir Addhvam //
|p3 {c}  p.rthivy/A ah/am /ud ant/arikSam /Aruham ant/arikSAd d/ivam /Aruham / div/o n/Akasya p.rSTh/At s/uvar jy/otir agAm //

|c6,5,2
|p1     ah/am //
|p2 {d}  s/uvar y/anto n/ApekSanta /A dy/A~M rohanti r/odasI / yaj~N/aM y/e vi/Sv/atodhAra~M s/uvidvA~Mso vitenir/e //
|p3 {e}  /agne pr/ehi pratham/o devayat/AM c/akSur dev/AnAm ut/a m/artyAnAm / /iyakSamANA bh/rgubhiH saj/oSAH s/uvar yantu y/ajamAnAH svast/i //
|p4 {f}  n/aktoS/AsA s/amanasA v/irUpe dhAp/ayete /S/i/Sum /eka~M samIc/I / dy/AvA kS/AmA rukm/o ant/ar v/ibhAti dev/A agn/iM dhArayan draviNod/AH //
|p5 {g}  /agne sahasrAkSa //

|c6,5,3
|p1     /SatamUrdha~N chat/aM te prAN/AH sah/asram apAn/AH / tv/a~M sAhasr/asya rAy/a I/SiSe t/asmai te vidhema v/AjAya sv/AhA //
|p2 {h}  suparN\o 'si gar/utmAn p.rthivy/A~M sIda p.rSTh/e p.rthivy/AH sIda bhAs/Ant/arikSam /A p.rNa jy/otiSA d/ivam /ut tabhAna t/ejasA d/i/Sa /ud d.r~Mha //
|p3 {i}  Aj/uhvAnaH supr/atIkaH pur/astAd /agne sv/AM y/onim /A sIda sAdhy/A / asm/int sadh/asthe /adhy /uttarasmin v/i/Sve devAH //

|c6,5,4
|p1     y/ajamAna/S ca sIdata //
|p2 {k}  pr/eddho agne dIdihi pur/o n/o 'jasrayA sUrmy\A yaviSTha / tv/A~M /S/a/Svanta /upa yanti v/AjAH //
|p3 {l}  vidh/ema te param/e j/anmann agne vidh/ema st/omair /avare sadh/asthe / y/asmAd y/oner ud/ArithA y/aje t/am pr/a tv/e hav/I~MSi juhure s/amiddhe //
|p4 {m}  t/A~M savit/ur v/areNyasya citr/Am /Ah/aM v.rNe sumat/iM vi/Sv/ajanyAm / y/Am asya k/aNvo /aduhat pr/apInA~M sah/asradhArAm //

|c6,5,5
|p1     p/ayasA mah/IM g/Am //
|p2 {n}  sapt/a te agne sam/idhaH sapt/a jihv/AH sapt/arSayaH sapt/a dh/Ama priy/ANi / sapt/a h/otrAH saptadh/A tvA yajanti sapt/a y/onIr /A p.rNasvA gh.rt/ena //
|p3 {o}  Id/r.N cAnyAd/r.N caitAd/r.N ca pratid/r.N ca mit/a/S ca s/ammita/S ca s/abharAH /
|p4 {p}  /Sukr/ajyoti/S ca citr/ajyoti/S ca saty/ajyoti/S ca jy/otiSmA~M/S ca saty/a/S cartap/A/S cAtya~MhAH //

|c6,5,6
|p1 {q}  .rtaj/ic ca satyaj/ic ca senaj/ic ca suSeNa/S c/Antyamitra/S ca dUr/eamitra/S ca gaN/aH /
|p2 {r}  .rt/a/S ca satya/S ca dhruv/a/S ca dhar/uNa/S ca dhart/A ca vidhart/A ca vidhAray/aH /
|p3 {s}  Id/rkSAsa etAd/rkSAsa U S/u NaH sad/rkSAsaH pr/atisad.rkSAsa /etana /
|p4 {t}  mit/Asa/S ca s/ammitAsa/S ca na Ut/aye s/abharaso maruto yaj~N/e asm/in \
|p5 {u}  /indraM d/aivIr v/i/So mar/uto 'nuvartmAno y/ath/endraM d/aivIr v/i/So mar/ut/o 'nuvartmAna ev/am im/aM y/ajamAnaM d/aivI/S ca v/i/So m/AnuSI/S c/AnuvartmAno bhavantu //

|c6,6,1
|p1 {a}  jIm/Utasyeva bhavati pr/atIkaM y/ad varm/I y/Ati sam/adAm up/asthe / /anAviddhayA tan/uvA jaya tv/a~M s/a tvA v/armaNo mahim/A pipartu //
|p2 {b}  dh/anvanA g/A dh/anvanAj/iM jayema dh/anvanA tIvr/AH sam/ado jayema / dh/anuH /S/atror apakAm/aM k.rNoti dh/anvanA s/arvAH prad/i/So jayema //
|p3 {c}  vakSy/antIv/ed /A ganIganti k/arNam priy/a~M s/akhAyam pariSasvajAn/A / y/oSeva /Si.Nkte v/itat/Adhi dh/anvan //

|c6,6,2
|p1     jy/A iy/a~M s/amane pAr/ayantI //
|p2 {d}  t/e Ac/arantI s/amaneva y/oSA mAt/eva putr/am bibh.rtAm up/asthe / /apa /S/atrUn vidhyatA~M saMvidAn/e /ArtnI im/e viSphur/antI am/itrAn //
|p3 {e}  bahvIn/Am pit/A bah/ur asya putr/a/S ci/Sc/A k.rNoti s/amanAvag/atya / iSudh/iH s/a.NkAH p/rtanA/S ca s/arvAH p.rSTh/e n/inaddho jayati pr/asUtaH //
|p4 {f}  r/athe t/iSThan nayati vAj/inaH pur/o y/atrayatra kAm/ayate suSArath/iH / abh/I/SUnAm mahim/Anam //

|c6,6,3
|p1     panAyata m/anaH pa/Sc/Ad /anu yachanti ra/Sm/ayaH //
|p2 {g}  tIvr/An gh/oSAn k.rNvate v/rSapANay/o '/SvA r/athebhiH sah/a vAj/ayantaH / avakr/AmantaH pr/apadair am/itrAn kSiN/anti /S/atrU~Mr /anapavyayantaH //
|p3 {h}  rathav/Ahana~M hav/ir asya n/Ama y/atr/AyudhaM n/ihitam asya v/arma / t/atrA r/atham /upa /Sagm/a~M sadema vi/Sv/AhA vay/a~M sumanasy/amAnAH //
|p4 {i}  svAduSa~Ms/adaH pit/aro vayodh/AH k.rchre/Sr/itaH /S/aktIvanto gabhIr/AH / citr/asenA /iSubalA /am.rdhrAH sat/ovIrA ur/avo vrAtasAh/AH //
|p5 {k}  br/AhmaNAsaH //

|c6,6,4
|p1     p/itaraH s/omyAsaH /Siv/e no dy/AvAp.rthiv/I an/ehasA / pUS/A naH pAtu durit/Ad .rtAv.rdho r/akSA m/Akir no agh/a/Sa~Msa I/Sata //
|p2 {l}  suparN/aM vaste m.rg/o asyA d/anto g/obhiH s/aMnaddhA patati pr/asUtA / y/atrA n/araH s/aM ca v/i ca dr/avanti t/atrAsm/abhyam /iSavaH /S/arma ya~Msan //
|p3 {m}  /rjIte p/ari v.r.Ngdhi n/o '/SmA bhavatu nas tan/UH / s/omo /adhi bravItu n/o 'ditiH //

|c6,6,5
|p1     /S/arma yachatu //
|p2 {n}  /A ja.Nghanti s/Anv eSAM jagh/anA~M /upa jighnate / /a/SvAjani pr/acetas/o '/SvAnt sam/atsu codaya //
|p3 {o}  /ahir iva bhog/aiH p/ary eti bAh/uM jy/AyA het/im parib/AdhamAnaH / hastaghn/o v/i/SvA vay/unAn/i vidv/An p/umAn p/umA~Msam p/ari pAtu vi/Sv/ataH //
|p4 {p}  v/anaspate vIDv\a.Ngo h/i bhUy/A asm/atsakhA prat/araNaH suv/IraH / g/obhiH s/aMnaddho asi vID/ayasvAsthAt/A te jayatu j/etvAni //
|p5 {q}  div/aH p.rthivy/AH p/ari //

|c6,6,6
|p1     /oja /udbh.rtaM v/anasp/atibhyaH p/ary /Abh.rta~M s/ahaH / ap/Am ojm/Anam p/ari g/obhir /Av.rtam /indrasya v/ajra~M hav/iSA r/athaM yaja //
|p2 {r}  /indrasya v/ajro mar/utAm /anIkam mitr/asya g/arbho v/aruNasya n/AbhiH / s/em/AM no havy/adAtiM juSAN/o d/eva ratha pr/ati havy/A g.rbhAya //
|p3 {s}  /upa /SvAsaya p.rthiv/Im ut/a dy/Am purutr/A te manutAM v/iSThitaM j/agat / s/a dundubhe saj/Ur /indreNa dev/air dUr/At //

|c6,6,7
|p1     d/avIyo /apa sedha /S/atrUn //
|p2 {t}  /A krandaya b/alam /ojo na /A dhA n/i STanihi durit/A b/AdhamAnaH / /apa protha dundubhe duch/unA~M it/a /indrasya muST/ir asi vID/ayasva //
|p3 {u}  /Am/Ur aja praty/Avartaye 'm/AH ketum/ad dundubh/ir vAvadIti / s/am /a/SvaparNA/S c/aranti no n/aro 'sm/Akam indra rath/ino jayantu //

|c6,7,1
|p1 {a}  y/ad /akrandaH pratham/aM j/AyamAna udy/ant samudr/Ad ut/a vA p/urISAt / /Syen/asya pakS/A hariN/asya bAh/U upast/utyam m/ahi jAt/aM te arvan //
|p2 {b}  yam/ena datt/aM trit/a enam Ayunag /indra eNam pratham/o /adhy atiSThat / gandharv/o asya ra/San/Am ag.rbhNAt s/UrAd /a/SvaM vasavo n/ir ataSTa //
|p3 {c}  /asi yam/o /asy Adity/o arvann /asi trit/o g/uhyena vrat/ena / /asi s/omena sam/ayA v/ip.rktaH //

|c6,7,2
|p1     Ah/us te tr/INi div/i b/andhanAni //
|p2 {d}  tr/INi ta Ahur div/i b/andhanAni tr/INy aps/u tr/INy ant/aH samudr/e / ut/eva me v/aruNa/S chantsy arvan y/atrA ta Ah/uH param/aM jan/itram //
|p3 {e}  im/A te vAjinn avam/ArjanAnIm/A /Saph/AnA~M sanit/ur nidh/AnA / /atrA te bhadr/A ra/San/A apa/Syam .rt/asya y/A abhir/akSanti gop/AH //
|p4 {f}  Atm/AnaM te m/anasAr/Ad ajAnAm av/o div/A //

|c6,7,3
|p1     pat/ayantam pataMg/am / /S/iro apa/Syam path/ibhiH sug/ebhir areN/ubhir j/ehamAnam patatr/i //
|p2 {g}  /atrA te rUp/am uttam/am apa/SyaM j/igISamANam iS/a /A pad/e g/oH / yad/A te m/arto /anu bh/ogam /AnaD /Ad /id gr/asiSTha /oSadhIr ajIgaH //
|p3 {h}  /anu tvA r/atho /anu m/aryo arvann /anu g/Av/o 'nu bh/agaH kan/InAm / /anu vr/AtAsas t/ava sakhy/am Iyur /anu dev/A mamire vIry\am //

|c6,7,4
|p1     te //
|p2 {i}  hiraNya/S.r.Ng/o 'yo asya p/AdA m/anojavA /avara /indra AsIt / dev/A /id asya havir/adyam Ayan y/o /arvantam pratham/o adhy/atiSThat //
|p3 {k}  Irm/AntAsaH s/ilikamadhyamAsaH s/a~M /S/UraNAso divy/Aso /atyAH / ha~Ms/A iva /SreNi/S/o yatante y/ad /AkSiSur divy/am /ajmam /a/SvAH //
|p4 {l}  t/ava /S/arIram patayiSNv \arvan t/ava citt/aM v/Ata iva dhr/ajImAn / t/ava /S/r.NgANi v/iSThitA purutr/AraNyeSu j/arbhurANA caranti //
|p5 {m}  /upa //

|c6,7,5
|p1     pr/AgAc ch/asanaM vAjy /arvA devadr/IcA m/anasA d/IdhyAnaH / aj/aH pur/o nIyate n/Abhir asy/Anu pa/Sc/At kav/ayo yanti rebh/AH //
|p2 {n}  /upa pr/AgAt param/aM y/at sadh/astham /arvA~M /achA pit/aram mAt/araM ca / ady/A dev/A~N j/uSTatamo h/i gamy/A /ath/A /SAste dA/S/uSe v/AryANi //

|c6,8,1
|p1 {a}  m/A no mitr/o v/aruNo aryam/Ay/ur /indra .rbhukS/A mar/utaH p/ari khyan / y/ad vAj/ino dev/ajAtasya s/apteH pravakSy/Amo vid/athe vIry\ANi //
|p2 {b}  y/an nirN/ijA r/ekNasA pr/Av.rtasya rAt/iM g.rbhIt/Am mukhat/o n/ayanti / s/uprA.N aj/o m/emyad vi/Sv/arUpa indrApUSN/oH priy/am /apy eti p/AthaH //
|p3 {c}  eS/a ch/AgaH pur/o /a/Svena vAj/inA pUSN/o bhAg/o nIyate vi/Sv/adevyaH / abhipr/iyaM y/at puroD/A/Sam /arvatA tv/aST/et //

|c6,8,2
|p1     ena~M sau/Sravas/Aya jinvati

|p3 {e}  h/otAdhvary/ur /AvayA agnimindh/o grAvagrAbh/a ut/a /S/a~MstA s/uvipraH / t/ena yaj~N/ena sv\araMk.rtena sv\iSTena vakS/aNA /A p.rNadhvam //

|c6,8,3
|p1     t/eSAm abh/igUrtir na invatu //

|c6,9,1

|c7,13,1
|p1 {a}  agn/iM yunajmi /S/avasA gh.rt/ena divy/a~M suparN/aM v/ayasA b.rh/antam / t/ena vay/am patema bradhn/asya viST/apa~M s/uvo r/uhANA /adhi n/Aka uttam/e //

|c7,13,2

|c7,13,3
|p1     /Asat/endhAnA agn/i~M s/uvar Abh/arantaH / t/asminn ah/aM n/i dadhe n/Ake agn/im et/aM y/am Ah/ur m/anava stIrN/abarhiSam //
|p2 {g}  t/am p/atnIbhir /anu gachema devAH putr/air bhr/At.rbhir ut/a vA h/iraNyaiH / n/AkaM g.rhNAn/AH suk.rt/asya lok/e t.rt/Iye p.rSTh/e /adhi rocan/e div/aH //
|p3 {h}  /A vac/o m/adhyam aruhad bhuraNy/ur ay/am agn/iH s/atpati/S c/ekitAnaH / p.rSTh/e p.rthivy/A n/ihito d/avidyutad adhaspad/aM k.rNute //

|c7,13,4
|p1     y/e p.rtany/avaH //
|p2 {i}  ay/am agn/ir vIr/atamo vayodh/AH sahasr/iyo dIpyatAm /aprayuchan / vibhr/AjamAnaH sarir/asya m/adhya /upa pr/a yAta divy/Ani dh/Ama //
|p3 {k}  s/am pr/a cyavadhvam /anu s/am pr/a yAt/Agne path/o devay/AnAn k.rNudhvam / asm/int sadh/asthe /adhy /uttarasmin v/i/Sve devA y/ajamAna/S ca sIdata //
|p4 {l}  y/enA sah/asraM v/ahasi y/enAgne sarvavedas/am / t/enem/aM yaj~N/aM no vaha devay/Ano y/aH //

|c7,13,5
|p1     uttam/aH //
|p2 {m}  /ud budhyasvAgne pr/ati jAg.rhy enam iSTApUrt/e s/a~M s.rjethAm ay/aM ca / p/unaH k.rNv/a~Ms tvA pit/araM y/uvAnam anv/AtA~MsIt tv/ayi t/antum et/am //
|p3 {n}  ay/aM te y/onir .rtv/iyo y/ato jAt/o /arocathAH / t/aM jAn/ann agna /A roh/AthA no vardhayA ray/im //

|c7,14,1
|p1 {a}  m/amAgne v/arco vihav/eSv astu vay/aM tv/endhAnAs tan/uvam puSema / m/ahyaM namantAm prad/i/Sa/S c/atasras tv/ay/AdhyakSeNa p/rtanA jayema //
|p2 {b}  m/ama dev/A vihav/e santu s/arva /indrAvanto mar/uto v/iSNur agn/iH / m/amAnt/arikSam ur/u gop/am astu m/ahyaM v/AtaH pavatAM k/Ame asm/in //
|p3 {c}  m/ayi dev/A dr/aviNam /A yajantAm m/ayy A/S/Ir astu m/ayi dev/ahUtiH / d/aivyA h/otArA van/iSanta //

|c7,14,2
|p1     p/Urv/eriSTAH syAma tan/uvA suv/IrAH //
|p2 {d}  m/ahyaM yajantu m/ama y/Ani havy/AkUtiH saty/A m/anaso me astu / /eno m/A n/i gAM katam/ac can/Ah/aM v/i/Sve devAso /adhi vocatA me //
|p3 {e}  d/evIH SaDurvIr ur/u naH k.rnota v/i/Sve devAsa ih/a vIrayadhvam / m/A hAsmahi praj/ayA m/A tan/Ubhir m/A radhAma dviSat/e soma rAjan //
|p4 {f}  agn/ir many/um pratinud/an pur/astAt //

|c7,14,3
|p1     /adabdho gop/AH p/ari pAhi nas tv/am / praty/a~Nco yantu nig/utaH p/unas t\e 'm/aiSAM citt/am prab/udhA v/i ne/Sat //
|p2 {g}  dhAt/A dhAt.rN/Am bh/uvanasya y/as p/atir dev/a~M savit/Aram abhimAtiS/Aham / im/aM yaj~N/am a/Sv/inobh/A b/rhasp/atir dev/AH pAntu y/ajamAnaM nyarth/At //
|p3 {h}  uruvy/acA no mahiS/aH /S/arma ya~Msad asm/in h/ave puruhUt/aH purukS/u / s/a naH praj/Ayai harya/Sva m.rDay/endra m/A //

|c7,14,4
|p1     no rIriSo m/A p/arA dAH //
|p2 {i}  y/e naH sap/atnA /apa t/e bhavantv indrAgn/ibhyAm /ava bAdhAmahe t/An / v/asavo rudr/A Adity/A uparisp/r/Sam mogr/aM c/ettAram adhirAj/am akran //
|p3 {k}  arv/A~Ncam /indram am/uto havAmahe y/o goj/id dhanaj/id a/Svaj/id y/aH / im/aM no yaj~N/aM vihav/e juSasvAsy/a kurmo harivo med/inaM tvA //

|c7,15,1
|p1 {a}  agn/er manve pratham/asya pr/acetaso y/am p/A~Ncajanyam bah/avaH samindh/ate / v/i/SvasyAM vi/S/i pravivi/Siv/A~Msam Imahe s/a no mu~Ncatv /a~MhasaH //
|p2 {b}  y/asyed/am prAN/an nimiS/ad y/ad /ejati y/asya jAt/aM j/anamAnaM ca k/evalam / st/aumy agn/iM nAthit/o johavImi s/a no mu~Ncatv /a~MhasaH //
|p3 {c}  /indrasya manve pratham/asya pr/acetaso v.rtraghn/a st/omA /upa m/Am up/AguH / y/o dA/S/uSaH suk/rto h/avam /upa g/antA //

|c7,15,2
|p1     s/a no mu~Ncatv /a~MhasaH //

|p3 {e}  manv/e vAm mitrAvaruNA t/asya vitta~M s/atyaujasA d.r~MhaNA y/aM nud/ethe / y/A r/AjAna~M sar/athaM yAth/a ugrA t/A no mu~Ncatam /AgasaH //
|p4 {f}  y/o vA~M r/atha .rj/ura/SmiH saty/adharmA m/ithu/S c/arantam upay/Ati dUS/ayan / st/aumi //

|c7,15,3
|p1     mitr/Av/aruNA nAthit/o johavImi t/au no mu~Ncatam /AgasaH //

|p3 {h}  /upa /Sr/eSThA na A/S/iSo dev/ayor dh/arme asthiran / st/aumi vAy/u~M savit/AraM nAthit/o johavImi t/au no mu~Ncatam /AgasaH //

|c1,4,1
|p1     dev/asya tvA savit/uH prasav/a /iti khanati pr/asUtyA /atho dhUm/am ev/ait/ena janayati

|c1,4,2
|p1     haraty ap/AM v/A et/at p.rSTh/aM y/at puSkaraparN/a~M rUp/eNaiv/ainad /A harati

|p4     y/ad grAmy/ANAm pa/SUn/AM c/armaNA sambh/ared grAmy/An pa/S/U~N chuc/Arpayet k.rSNAjin/ena s/am bharaty AraNy/An ev/a pa/S/Un //

|c1,4,3
|p1     /Suc/Arpayati
|p2     t/asmAt sam/Avat pa/SUn/Am praj/AyamAnAnAm AraNy/AH pa/S/avaH k/anIyA~MsaH /Suc/A hy .rt/As \
|p3     lomat/aH s/am bharaty /ato hy \asya m/edhyam \
|p4     k.rSNAjin/aM ca puSkaraparN/aM ca s/a~M st.rNAtIy/aM v/ai k.rSNAjin/am as/au puSkaraparN/am Abhy/Am ev/ainam ubhay/ataH p/ari g.rhNAti \
|p5     agn/ir devebhyo n/ilAyata t/am /atharv/Anv apa/Syat \
|p6     /atharvA tvA pratham/o n/ir amanthad agna /iti //

|p3     ny\UnAd dh/i praj/ApatiH praj/A /as.rjata
|p4     praj/AnA~M s/rSTyai
|p5     y/ad arc/iSi prav.r~Njy/Ad bhUt/am /ava rundhIta
|p6     y/ad /a.NgAreSu bhaviSy/at \
|p7     /a.NgAreSu pr/a v.rNakti
|p8     bhaviSy/ad ev/Ava runddhe
|p9     bhaviSy/ad dh/i bh/Uyo bhUt/At \
|p10    dv/AbhyAm pr/a v.rNakti
|p11    dvip/Ad y/ajamAnaH
|p12    pr/atiSThityai
|p13    br/ahmaNA v/A eS/A y/ajuSA s/ambh.rtA y/ad ukh/A
|p14    s/A y/ad bh/idyet/Artim /Archet //

|c1,9,3
|p1     y/ajamAno hany/etAsya yaj~N/as \
|p2     m/itrait/Am ukh/AM tap/ety Aha
|p3     br/ahma v/ai mitr/as \
|p4     br/ahmann ev/ainAm pr/ati SThApayati
|p5     n/Artim /Archati y/ajamAno n/Asya yaj~N/o hanyate

|p8     y/o gat/a/SrIH sy/An mathitv/A t/asy/Ava dadhyAt \
|p9     bhUt/o v/A {eS/a < eS/as}
|p10    s/a sv/AM //

|c1,9,4

|p5     bh/avaty ev/a

|c1,11,1
|p1 {a}  s/amiddho a~Nj/an k/rdaram matIn/AM gh.rt/am agne m/adhumat p/invamAnaH / vAj/I v/ahan vAj/inaM jAtavedo dev/AnAM vakSi piry/am /A sadh/astham //
|p2 {b}  gh.rt/enA~Nj/ant s/am path/o devay/AnAn prajAn/an vAjy /apy etu dev/An / /anu tvA sapte prad/i/SaH sacantA~M svadh/Am asm/ai y/ajamAnAya dhehi //
|p3 {c}  /IDya/S c/Asi v/andya/S ca vAjinn A/S/u/S c/Asi m/edhya/S ca sapte / agn/iS TvA //

|c1,11,2
|p1     dev/air v/asubhiH saj/oSAH prIt/aM v/ahniM vahatu jAt/avedAH //
|p2 {d}  stIrN/am barh/iH suST/arImA juSAN/or/u p.rth/u pr/athamAnam p.rthivy/Am / dev/ebhir yukt/am /aditiH saj/oSAH syon/aM k.rNvAn/A suvit/e dadhAtu //
|p3 {e}  et/A u vaH subh/agA vi/Sv/arUpA v/i p/akSobhiH /Sr/ayamANA /ud /AtaiH / .rSv/AH sat/IH kav/aSaH /S/umbhamAnA dv/Aro dev/IH suprAyaN/A bhavantu //
|p4 {f}  antar/A mitr/Av/aruNA c/arantI m/ukhaM yaj~N/AnAm abh/i saMvidAn/e / uS/AsA vAm //

|c1,11,3
|p1     suhiraNy/e su/Silp/e .rt/asya y/onAv ih/a sAdayAmi //
|p2 {g}  pratham/A vA~M sarath/inA suv/arNA dev/au p/a/Syantau bh/uvanAni v/i/SvA / /apiprayaM c/odanA vAm m/imAnA h/otArA jy/otiH prad/i/SA di/S/antA //
|p3 {h}  Adity/air no bh/AratI vaSTu yaj~N/a~M s/arasvatI sah/a rudr/air na AvIt / /iD/opahUtA v/asubhiH saj/oSA yaj~N/aM no devIr am/rteSu dhatta //
|p4 {i}  tv/aSTA vIr/aM dev/akAmaM jajAna tv/aSTur /arvA jAyata A/S/ur /a/SvaH //

|c1,11,4
|p1     tv/aSTed/aM v/i/Svam bh/uvanaM jajAna bah/oH kart/Aram ih/a yakSi hotaH //

|p3 {l}  praj/Apates t/apasA vAv.rdhAn/aH sady/o jAt/o dadhiSe yaj~N/am agne / sv/AhAk.rtena hav/iSA purogA yAh/i sAdhy/A hav/ir adantu dev/AH //

|c2,3,3
|p1     pa/SUn/AM y/ad /USAs \
|p2     dy/AvAp.rthiv/I sah/AstAm \
|p3     t/e viyat/I abrUtAm
|p4     /astv ev/a nau sah/a yaj~N/iyam /iti
|p5     y/ad am/uSyA yaj~N/iyam /AsIt t/ad asy/Am adadhAt t/a /USA abhavan
|p6     y/ad asy/A yaj~N/iyam /AsIt t/ad am/uSyAm adadhAt t/ad ad/a/S candr/amasi k.rSN/am

|p8     ay/a~M s/o agn/ir /iti vi/Sv/Amitrasya //

|c2,3,4
|p1     sUkt/am bhavati \
|p2     et/ena v/ai vi/Sv/Amitro 'gn/eH priy/aM dh/Am/AvArunddha \
|p3     agn/er ev/ait/ena priy/aM dh/Am/Ava runddhe
|p4     ch/andobhir v/ai dev/AH suvarg/aM lok/am {Aya~N < Ayan}
|p5     c/atasraH pr/AcIr /upa dadhAti
|p6     catv/Ari ch/andA~Msi
|p7     ch/andobhir ev/a t/ad y/ajamAnaH suvarg/aM lok/am eti
|p8     t/eSA~M suvarg/aM lok/aM yat/AM d/i/SaH s/am avlIyanta
|p9     t/e dv/e pur/astAt sam/IcI /upAdadhata dv/e //

|c2,3,5
|p1     pa/Sc/At sam/IcI

|p10    jy/otr ev/a pur/astAd dhatte

|p13    t/An b.rhaty /ud ajayat
|p14    t/asmAd b/ArhatAH //

|p5     tr/INi juhoti
|p6     tr/aya im/e lok/As \
|p7     ebhy/a ev/a lok/ebhyo v/Atam /ava runddhe
|p8     samudr\o 'si n/abhasvAn /ity Aha \
|p9     et/ad v/ai v/Atasya rUp/am \
|p10    rUp/eNaiv/a v/Atam /ava runddhe \
|p11    a~Njal/inA juhoti
|p12    n/a hy \et/eSAm any/ath/Ahutir avak/alpate //

|c4,10,1
|p1     suvarg/Aya v/ai lok/Aya devarath/o yujyate yatrAkUt/Aya manuSyarath/a eS/a kh/alu v/ai devarath/o y/ad agn/ir agn/iM yunajmi /S/avasA gh.rt/en/ety Aha yun/akty ev/aina~M s/a enaM yukt/aH suvarg/aM lok/am abh/i vahati
|p2     y/at sv/arvAbhiH pa~Nc/abhir yu~Njy/Ad yukt\o 'syAgn/iH pr/acyutaH syAd /apratiSThitA /AhutayaH sy/ur /apratiSThitA st/omA /apratiSThitAny ukth/Ani tis/rbhiH prAtaHsavan\e 'bh/i m.r/Sati triv/rt //

|c4,10,2
|p1     v/A agn/ir y/AvAn ev/Agn/is t/aM yunakti y/ath/Anasi yukt/a AdhIy/ata ev/am ev/a t/at pr/aty /Ahutayas t/iSThanti pr/ati st/omAH pr/aty ukth/Ani
|p2     yaj~NAyaj~N/iyasya stotr/e dv/AbhyAm abh/i m.r/Saty et/AvAn v/ai yaj~N/o y/AvAn agniSTom/o bhUm/A tv/A asy/Ata Urdhv/aH kriyate y/AvAn ev/a yaj~N/as t/am antat\o 'nv/Arohati dv/AbhyAm pr/atiSThityA /ekay/Aprastutam bh/avaty /atha //

|c4,10,3
|p1     abh/i m.r/Saty /upainam /uttaro yaj~N/o namaty /atho s/aMtatyai
|p2     pr/a v/A eS\o 'sm/Al lok/Ac cyavate y\o 'gn/iM cinut/e n/a v/A et/asyAniSTak/a /Ahutir /ava kalpate y/AM v/A eS\o 'niSTak/a /AhutiM juh/oti
|p3     sr/avati v/ai s/A t/A~M sr/avantIM yaj~N/o 'nu p/arA bhavati yaj~N/aM y/ajamAno y/at puna/Scit/iM cinut/a /AhutInAm pr/atiSThityai pr/aty /Ahutayas t/iSThanti //

|c4,10,4
|p1     n/a yaj~N/aH parAbh/avati n/a y/ajamAnas \

|p3     napAtk/o v/ai n/AmaiS\o 'gn/ir y/at puna/Scit/ir y/a ev/aM vidv/An puna/Scit/iM cinut/a /A t.rt/IyAt p/uruSAd /annam atti
|p4     y/athA v/ai punarAdh/eya ev/am puna/Scit/ir y\o 'gnyAdh/eyena n/a //

|c4,10,5

|p2     /atho kh/alv Ahur n/a cetavy/eti rudr/o v/A eS/a y/ad agn/ir y/athA vyAghr/a~M supt/am bodh/ayati tAd/rg ev/a t/at \

|p11    jy/otir v/ai h/iraNyaM jy/otir vAm/am \
|p12    jy/otiSaiv/Asya jy/otir vAm/aM v.r.Nkte
|p13    dviyaj/ur bhavati pr/atiSThityai //

|c5,4,1
|p1     /Apo v/aruNasya p/atnaya Asan t/A agn/ir abhy \adhyAyat t/AH s/am abhavat t/asya r/etaH p/arApatat t/ad iy/am abhavad y/ad dvit/Iyam par/Apatat t/ad as/Av abhavad iy/aM v/ai vir/AD as/au {svarAD < svar/Aj}
|p2     y/ad vir/AjAv upad/adhAtIm/e ev/opa dhatte
|p3     y/ad v/A as/au r/etaH si~Nc/ati t/ad asy/Am pr/ati tiSThati t/at pr/a jAyate t/A /oSadhayaH //

|c5,4,2
|p1     vIr/udho bhavanti t/A agn/ir atti y/a ev/aM v/eda pr/aiv/a jAyate 'nnAd/o bhavati y/o retasv/I sy/At pratham/AyAM t/asya c/ityAm ubh/e /upa dadhyAd im/e ev/Asmai sam/IcI r/etaH si~Ncato y/aH sikt/aretAH sy/At pratham/AyAM t/asya c/ityAm any/Am /upa dadhyAd uttam/AyAm any/A~M r/eta ev/Asya sikt/am Abhy/Am ubhay/ataH p/ari g.rhNAti
|p2     saMvatsar/aM n/a k/am //

|c5,4,3
|p1     can/a praty/avarohen n/a h/Im/e k/aM can/a pratyavar/ohatas t/ad enayor vrat/am \
|p2     y/o v/A /apa/SIrSANam agn/iM cinut/e 'pa/SIrSAm/uSmi#M lok/e bhavati y/aH s/a/SIrSANaM cinut/e s/a/SIrSAm/uSmi#M lok/e bhavati
|p3     c/ittiM juhomi m/anasA gh.rt/ena y/athA dev/A ih/Ag/aman vIt/ihotrA .rtAv/rdhaH samudr/asya vay/unasya p/atma~N juhomi vi/Sv/akarmaNe v/i/Sv/Ah/Amartya~M hav/ir /iti svayamAt.rNN/Am upadh/Aya juhoti //

|c5,4,4
|p1     et/ad v/A agn/eH /S/iraH s/a/SIrSANam ev/Agn/iM cinute s/a/SIrSAm/uSmi#M lok/e bhavati y/a ev/aM v/eda
|p2     suvarg/Aya v/A eS/a lok/Aya cIyate y/ad agn/is t/asya y/ad /ayathApUrvaM kriy/at/e 'suvargyam asya t/at suvargy\o 'gn/is \

|p5     pr/A~Ncam enaM cinute suvargy\o 'sya bhavati //

|c5,9,1
|p1 {a}  /agna udadhe y/A ta /iSur yuv/A n/Ama t/ayA no m.rDa t/asyAs te n/amas t/asyAs ta /upa j/Ivanto bhUyAsama \

|p4 {d}  ki~M/Sila

|c5,9,4
|p1     any/e /Satarudr/Iya~M hutv/A gAvIdhuk/aM car/um et/ena y/ajuSA caram/AyAm /iSTakAyAM n/i dadhyAd bhAgadh/eyenaiv/aina~M /Samayati t/asya tv/ai /Satarudr/Iya~M hut/am

|c5,10,1

|c5,10,5
|p1     /annaM va /iSavo nimiS/o vAtanAm/am \
|p2     t/ebhyo vo n/amas
|p3     t/e no m.rDayata
|p4     t/e y/aM dviSm/o y/a/S ca no dv/eSTi t/aM vo j/ambhe dadhAmi

|p10    /iSTakA v/ai dev/A ahut/Ada /iti //

|c5,10,6
|p1     anuparikr/AmaM juhoti \
|p2     /aparivargam ev/ainAn prINAti \
|p3 {e}  im/a~M st/anam /UrjasvantaM dhayAp/Am pr/apyAtam agne sarir/asya m/adhye /
|p4 {e}  /utsaM juSasva m/adhumantam Urva samudr/iya~M s/adanam /A vi/Sasva //
|p5 {f}  y/o v/A agn/im pray/ujya n/a vimu~Nc/ati y/ath/A/Svo yukt/o 'vimucyamAnaH kS/udhyan parAbh/avaty ev/am asyAgn/iH p/arA bhavati
|p6     t/am parAbh/avantaM y/ajamAn/o 'nu p/arA bhavati
|p7     s\o 'gn/iM citv/A lUkS/aH //

|c5,10,7
|p1     bhavati \
|p2     im/a~M st/anam /UrjasvantaM dhayAp/Am /ity /Ajyasya pUrN/A~M sr/ucaM juhoti \
|p3     eS/a v/A agn/er vimok/as \
|p4     vim/ucyaiv/AsmA /annam /api dadhAti
|p5     t/asmAd Ahur y/a/S caiv/aM v/eda y/a/S ca n/a

|c6,5,1
|p1     saMvatsar/am /ukhyam bh.rtv/A dvit/Iye saMvatsar/a Agney/am aST/AkapAlaM n/ir vaped aindr/am /ekAda/SakapAlaM vai/Svadev/aM dv/Ada/SakapAlam bArhaspaty/aM car/uM vaiSNav/aM trikapAl/am \
|p2     trit/Iye saMvatsar\e 'bhij/itA yajeta
|p3     y/ad aST/AkapAlo bh/avaty aST/AkSarA gAyatry \Agney/aM gAyatr/am prAtaHsavan/am
|p4     prAtaHsavan/am ev/a t/ena dAdhAra gAyatr/IM ch/andas \
|p5     y/ad /ekAda/SakapAlo bh/avaty /ekAda/SAkSarA triST/ug aindr/aM tr/aiSTubham m/AdhyaMdina~M s/avanam
|p6     m/AdhyaMdinam ev/a s/avanaM t/ena dAdhAra triST/ubham //

|c6,5,2
|p1     ch/andas \
|p2     y/ad dv/Ada/SakapAlo bh/avati dv/Ada/SAkSarA j/agatI vai/Svadev/aM j/AgataM t.rtIyasavan/am \
|p3     t.rtIyasavan/am ev/a t/ena dAdhAra j/agatIM ch/andas \
|p4     y/ad bArhaspaty/a/S car/ur bh/avati br/ahma v/ai dev/AnAm b/rhasp/atis \
|p5     br/ahmaiv/a t/ena dAdhAra
|p6     y/ad vaiSNav/as trikapAl/o bh/avati yaj~N/o v/ai v/iSNus \
|p7     yaj~N/am ev/a t/ena dAdhAra
|p8     y/at t.rt/Iye saMvatsar\e 'bhij/itA y/ajate 'bh/ijityai
|p9     y/at saMvatsar/am /ukhyam bibh/artIm/am ev/a //

|c6,5,3
|p1     t/ena lok/a~M sp.rNoti
|p2     y/ad dvit/Iye saMvatsar\e 'gn/iM cinut\e 'nt/arikSam ev/a t/ena sp.rNoti

|p4     et/aM v/ai p/ara {F ATNAr/aH}{W AtNAr/aH}{GLOS ATNAr/aH} kakS/IvA~M au/Sij/o vIt/ahavyaH /SrAyas/as tr/asadasyuH paurukutsy/aH praj/AkAmA acinvata
|p5     t/ato v/ai t/e sah/asra~Msahasram putr/An avindanta
|p6     pr/athate praj/ayA pa/S/ubhis t/Am m/AtrAm Apnoti y/AM t/e 'gachan y/a ev/aM vidv/An agn/iM cinut/e //

|c6,6,1

|c7,6,5
|p1     juhuyAc ch/Antir ev/aiS/Agn/er g/uptir Atm/anas \
|p2 {f}  hav/iSk.rto v/A eS/a y\o 'gn/iM cinut/e
|p3     y/athA v/ai hav/i sk/andaty ev/aM v/A eS/a skandati y\o 'gn/iM citv/A striyam up/aiti maitrAvaruNy/Am/ikSayA yajeta maitrAvaruN/atAm ev/opaity Atm/an/o 'skandAya
|p4 {g}  y/o v/A agn/im .rtusth/AM v/edart/ur.rtur asmai k/alpamAna eti pr/aty ev/a tiSThati
|p5     saMvatsar/o v/A agn/iH //

|c7,6,6
|p1     .rtusth/As t/asya v/asantaH /S/iro grISm/o d/akSiNaH pakS/o varS/AH p/ucha~M /Sar/ad /uttaraH pakS/o hemant/o m/adhyam pUrvapakS/A/S c/itayo 'parapakS/AH p/urISam ahorAtr/AN/IStakA eS/a v/A agn/ir .rtusth/A y/a ev/aM v/edart/ur.rtur asmai k/alpamAna eti pr/aty ev/a tiSThai
|p2 {h}  praj/Apatir v/A et/aM jy/aiSThyakAmo ny \adhatta
|p3     t/ato v/ai s/a jy/aiSThyam agachat \
|p4     y/a ev/aM vidv/An agn/iM cinut/e jy/aiSThyam ev/a gachati //

|c7,7,1
|p1 {a}  y/ad /AkUtAt sam/asusrod dh.rd/o vA m/anaso vA s/ambh.rtaM c/akSuSo vA / t/am /anu pr/ehi suk.rt/asya lok/aM y/atr/arSayaH prathamaj/A y/e purAN/AH //
|p2 {b}  et/a~M sadhastha p/ari te dadAmi y/am Av/ahAc chevadh/iM jAt/avedAH / anvAgant/A yaj~N/apatir vo /atra t/a~M sama jAnIta param/e vy\oman //
|p3 {c}  jAnIt/Ad enam param/e vy\oman d/evAH sadhasthA vid/a rUp/am asya / y/ad Ag/achAt //

|c7,7,2
|p1     path/ibhir devay/Anair iSTApUrt/e k.rNutAd Av/ir asmai //
|p2 {d}  s/am pr/a cyavadhvam /anu s/am pr/a yAt/Agne path/o devay/AnAn k.rNudhvam / asm/int sadh/asthe /adhy /uttarasmin v/i/Sve devA y/ajamAna/S ca sIdata //
|p3 {e}  prastar/eNa paridh/inA sruc/A v/edyA ca barh/iSA / .rc/em/aM yaj~N/aM no vaha s/uvar dev/eSu g/antave //
|p4 {f}  y/ad iST/am y/at parAd/AnaM y/ad datt/aM y/A ca d/akSiNA / t/at //

|c7,7,3
|p1     agn/ir vai/SvakarmaN/aH s/uvar dev/eSu no dadhat //
|p2 {g}  y/enA sah/asraM v/ahasi y/enAgne sarvavedas/am / t/enem/aM yaj~N/aM no vaha s/uvar dev/eSu g/antave //
|p3 {h}  y/enAgne d/akSiNA yukt/A yaj~N/aM v/ahanty .rtv/ijaH / t/enem/aM yaj~N/aM no vaha s/uvar dev/eSu g/antave //
|p4 {i}  y/enAgne suk/rtaH path/A m/adhor dh/ArA vyAna/S/uH / t/enem/aM yaj~N/aM no vaha s/uvar dev/eSu g/antave //
|p5 {k}  y/atra dh/ArA /anapetA m/adhor gh.rt/asya ca y/AH / t/ad agn/ir vai/SvakarmaN/aH s/uvar dev/eSu no dadhat //

|c7,8,1
|p1 {a}  y/As te agne sam/idho y/Ani dh/Ama y/A jihv/A jAtavedo y/o arc/iH / y/e te agne meD/ayo y/a /indavas t/ebhir Atm/AnaM cinuhi prajAn/an //
|p2     utsannayaj~N/o v/A eS/a y/ad agn/iH k/iM v/Ahait/asya kriy/ate k/iM vA n/a y/ad v/A adhvary/ur agn/e/S cinv/ann antar/ety Atm/ano v/ai t/ad ant/ar eti y/As te agne sam/idho y/Ani //

|c7,8,2

|c7,8,3

|c1,1,5

|p10    t/asya kan/InikA p/arApatat

|c1,5,4
|p1     aprayAj/am udayan/Iyam /iti \
|p2     im/e v/ai prayAj/A am/I anUyAj/AH s/aiv/a s/A yaj~N/asya s/aMtatis
|p3     t/at t/athA n/a kAry\am Atm/A v/ai prayAj/AH praj/AnUyAj/A y/at prayAj/An antariy/Ad Atm/Anam ant/ar iyAd y/ad anUyAj/An antariy/At praj/Am ant/ar iyAd y/ataH kh/alu v/ai yaj~N/asya v/itatasya n/a kriy/ate t/ad /anu yaj~N/aH p/arA bhavati
|p4     yaj~N/am parAbh/avantaM y/ajamAn/o 'nu //

|c1,5,5
|p1     p/arA bhavati
|p2     prayAj/avad ev/AnUyAj/avat prAyaN/IyaM kAry\am prayAj/avad anUyAj/avad udayan/IyaM n/Atm/Anam antar/eti n/a praj/AM n/a yaj~N/aH parAbh/avati n/a y/ajamAnaH
|p3     prAyaN/Iyasya niSkAs/a udayan/Iyam abh/i n/ir vapati s/aiv/a s/A yaj~N/asya s/aMtatis \
|p4     y/AH prAyaN/Iyasya yAjy\A y/at t/A udayan/Iyasya yAjy\AH kury/At p/arA.N am/uM lok/am /A rohet pram/AyukaH syAt \
|p5     y/AH prAyaN/Iyasya puro'nuvAky\As t/A udayan/Iyasya yAjy\AH karoty asm/inn ev/a lok/e pr/ati tiSThati //

|c1,6,1

|p7     ah/aM durg/e h/ant/ety /atha k/as tv/am /iti \
|p8     ah/aM durg/Ad /Ahart/eti
|p9     s\o 'bravIt \
|p10    durg/e v/ai h/antAvocathA varAh\o 'y/aM vAmamoS/aH //

|c2,4,3
|p1     saptAn/AM girIN/Am par/astAd vitt/aM v/edyam /asurANAm bibharti t/aM jahi y/adi durg/e h/ant/As/Iti
|p2     s/a darbhapu~NjIl/am udv/rhya sapt/agir/In bhittv/A t/am ahan \
|p3     s\o 'bravIt \
|p4     durg/Ad v/A /AhartAvocathA et/am /A har/eti
|p5     t/am ebhyo yaj~N/a ev/a yaj~N/am /Aharat \
|p6     y/at t/ad vitt/aM v/edyam /asurANAm /avindanta t/ad /ekaM v/edyai veditv/am
|p7     /asurANAm //

|c2,4,4
|p1     v/A iy/am /agra AsIt \

|p4     /astv ev/a no 'syAm /ap/Iti
|p5     k/iyad vo dAsyAma /iti
|p6     y/Avad iy/a~M salAv.rk/I tr/iH parikr/Amati t/Avan no datt/eti

|p8     t/ad im/Am avindanta

|c2,4,5

|c2,5,2

|c2,10,1
|p1     dev/asya tvA savit/uH prasav/a /ity /abhrim /A datte pr/asUtyai \
|p2     a/Sv/inor bAh/ubhyAm /ity Aha \
|p3     a/Sv/inau h/i dev/AnAm adhvary/U /AstAm
|p4     pUSN/o h/astAbhyAm /ity Aha y/atyai
|p5     v/ajra iva v/A eS/A y/ad /abhrir /abhrir asi n/Arir as/Ity Aha /S/Antyai
|p6     k/ANDekANDe v/ai kriy/amANe yaj~N/a~M r/akSA~Msi jighA~Msanti

|c2,10,2
|p1     id/am ah/a~M r/akSaso grIv/A /api k.rntAmi y\o 'sm/An dv/eSTi y/aM ca vay/aM dviSm/a /ity Aha dv/au v/Av/a p/uruSau y/aM caiv/a dv/eSTi y/a/S cainaM dv/eSTi t/ayor ev/AnantarAyaM grIv/AH k.rntati
|p2     div/e tvAnt/arikSAya tvA p.rthivy/ai tv/ety Ahaibhy/a ev/ainaM lok/ebhyaH prokSati
|p3     par/astAd arv/AcIm pr/okSati t/asmAt //

|c2,10,3
|p1     par/astAd arv/AcIm manuSy\A /Urjam /upa jIvanti

|p6     vaiSNavy/arc/A //

|c3,4,4
|p1     kalpayati vaiSNav/o v/ai dev/atayA y/UpaH sv/ayaiv/ainaM dev/atayA kalpayati
|p2     dv/AbhyAM kalpayati dvip/Ad y/ajmAnaH pr/atiSThityai
|p3     y/aM kAm/ayeta t/ejasainaM dev/atAbhir indriy/eNa vy \ardhayeyam /ity agniSTh/AM t/asy/A/SriM Ahavan/IyAd itth/aM vetth/aM v/Ati nAvayet t/ejasaiv/ainaM dev/atAbhir indriy/eNa vy \ardhayati
|p4     y/aM kAm/ayeta t/ejasainaM dev/atAbhir indriy/eNa s/am ardhayeyam /iti //

|c3,4,5
|p1     agniSTh/AM t/asy/A/Srim Ahavan/Iyena s/am minuyAt t/ejasaiv/ainaM dev/atAbhir indriy/eNa s/am ardhayati
|p2     brahmav/aniM tvA kSatrav/anim /ity Aha yathAyaj/ur ev/ait/at
|p3     p/ari vyayaty /Urg v/ai ra/San/A y/ajamAnena y/UpaH s/ammito y/ajamAnam ev/orj/A s/am ardhayati
|p4     nAbhidaghn/e p/ari vyayati nAbhidaghn/a ev/AsmA /UrjaM dadhAti t/asmAn nAbhidaghn/a Urj/A bhu~Njate
|p5     y/aM kAm/ayetorj/ainam //

|c3,4,6
|p1     vy \ardhayeyam /ity Urdhv/AM vA t/asy/AvAcIM v/Avohed Urj/aiv/ainaM vy\ardhayati
|p2     y/adi kAm/ayeta v/arSukaH parj/anyaH syAd /ity /avAcIm /avohed v/rSTim ev/a n/i yachati y/adi kAm/ayet/AvarSukaH syAd /ity Urdhv/Am /ud Uhed v/rSTim ev/od yachati
|p3     pit.rN/AM n/ikhAtam manuSy\ANAm Urdhv/aM n/ikhAtAd /A ra/San/AyA /oSadhInA~M ra/San/A v/i/SveSAm //

|c3,4,7
|p1     dev/AnAM Urdhv/a~M ra/San/AyA /A caS/AlAd /indrasya caS/Ala~M sAdh/AnAm /atirikta~M s/a v/A eS/a sarva devaty\o y/ad y/Upo y/ad y/Upam min/oti s/arvA ev/a dev/atAH prINAti
|p2     yaj~N/ena v/ai dev/AH suvarg/aM lok/am Ayan t\e 'manyanta manuSy\A no 'nv/AbhaviSyant/Iti t/e y/Upena yopayitv/A suvarg/aM lok/am Ayan t/am /rSayo y/Upenaiv/Anu pr/AjAnan t/ad y/Upasya yUpa tv/am //

|c3,4,8
|p1     y/ad y/Upam min/oti suvarg/asya lok/asya pr/aj~NAtyai

|c3,4,9
|p1     y/Upasya y/ad Urdhv/aM caS/AlAt t/eSAM t/ad bhAgadh/eyaM t/An ev/a t/ena prINAti
|p2     dev/A v/ai s/a~Msthite s/ome pr/a sr/uc/oharan pr/a y/UpaM t\e 'manyanta yaj~Nave/Sas/aM v/A id/aM kurma /iti t/e prastar/a~M sruc/A~M niSkr/ayaNam apa/Syant sv/aruM y/Upasya s/a~Msthite s/ome pr/a prastar/a~M harati juh/oti svar/uM /ayaj~Nave/SasAya

|c3,10,3

|c3,10,4
|p1     dyati
|p2     h/rdayasy/Agr/e 'va dyaty /atha jihv/AyA /atha v/akSaso y/ad v/ai h/rdayenAbhig/achati t/aj jihv/ayA vadati y/aj jihv/ayA v/adati t/ad /uras/o 'dhi n/ir vadati \

|c3,10,5
|p1     uttam/o h/i prAN/o y/ad/ItaraM y/ad/Itaram ubh/ayam ev/AjAmi
|p2     j/AyamAno v/ai brAhmaN/as tribh/ir .rNav/A jAyate brahmac/aryeN/arSibhyo yaj~N/ena dev/ebhyaH praj/ayA pit/rbhya eS/a v/A an.rN/o y/aH putr/I y/ajvA brahmacArivAs/I t/ad avad/Anair ev/Ava dayate t/ad avad/AnAnAm avadAnatv/am \
|p3     devAsur/AH s/aMyattA Asan t/e dev/A agn/im abruvan
|p4     tv/ayA vIr/eN/AsurAn abh/i bhavAm/eti //

|c3,10,6
|p1     s\o 'bravId

|p10    m/anas tvA //

|c5,1,1
|p1     /indro v.rtr/Aya v/ajram /ud ayachat
|p2     s/a v.rtr/o v/ajrAd /udyatAd abibhet
|p3     s\o 'bravIt \
|p4     m/A me pr/a hAr /asti v/A id/am m/ayi vIry\aM t/at te pr/a dAsyAm/Iti
|p5     t/asmA ukthy\am pr/Ayachat
|p6     t/asmai dvit/Iyam /ud ayachat
|p7     s\o 'bravIt \
|p8     m/A me pr/a hAr /asti v/A id/aM m/ayi vIry\aM t/at te pr/a dAsyAm/Iti //

|c5,1,2
|p1     t/asmA ukthy\am ev/a pr/Ayachat
|p2     t/asmai t.rt/Iyam /ud ayachat

|p4     jah/Iti
|p5     s\o 'bravIt \

|p10    y/ad ukthy\o g.rhy/ata indriy/am ev/a //

|c5,1,3

|p14    t/asmAd /api //

|c5,8,5

|c6,4,3
|p1     y/ad /ekasmin y/Upe dv/e ra/San/e parivy/ayati t/asmAd /eko dv/e jAy/e vindate y/an n/aikA~M ra/San/AM dv/ayor y/UpayoH parivy/ayati t/asmAn n/aikA dv/au p/atI vindate
|p2     y/aM kAm/ayeta stry \asya jAyet/ety upAnt/e t/asya vy/atiSajet stry \ev/Asya jAyate
|p3     y/aM kAm/ayeta p/umAn asya jAyet/ety Ant/aM t/asya pr/a veSTayet p/umAn ev/Asya //

|c6,4,4
|p1     jAyate \
|p2     /asurA v/ai dev/An dakSiNat/a /upAnayan t/An dev/A upa/Say/enaiv/ApAnudanta t/ad upa/Say/asyopa/Sayatv/aM y/ad dakSiNat/a upa/Say/a upa/S/aye bhr/At.rvyApanuttyai
|p3     s/arve v/A any/e y/UpAH pa/Sum/ant/o 'thopa/Say/a ev/Apa/S/us t/asya y/ajamAnaH pa/S/ur y/an n/a nirdi/S/ed /Artim /Arched y/ajamAno 's/au te pa/S/ur /iti n/ir di/Sed y/aM dviSy/Ad y/am ev/a //

|c6,4,5
|p1     dv/eSTi t/am asmai pa/S/uM n/ir di/Sati

|p3     praj/ApatiH praj/A as.rjata s\o 'nn/Adyena vy \Ardhyata s/a et/Am ekAda/S/inIm apa/Syat t/ayA v/ai s\o 'nn/Adyam /avArunddha y/ad d/a/Sa y/UpA bh/avanti d/a/SAkSarA vir/AD /annaM vir/AD vir/Ajaiv/Ann/Adyam /ava runddhe //

|c6,4,6

|c6,5,1
|p1     praj/ApatiH praj/A as.rjata s/a riricAn\o 'manyata s/a et/Am ekAda/S/inIm apa/Syat t/ayA v/ai s/a /Ayur indriy/aM vIry\am Atm/ann adhatta praj/A iva kh/alu v/A eS/a s.rjate y/o y/ajate s/a et/arhi riricAn/a iva y/ad eS/aikAda/S/inI bh/avaty /Ayur ev/a t/ayendriy/aM vIry\aM y/ajamAna /atm/an dhatte

|c6,5,2

|c6,5,3

|c1,1,3
|p1     ny \amArD /iti
|p2     t/asmAd /oSadhay/o 'nabhyaktA rebhanti \
|p3     /atho AhuH
|p4     praj/Asu ny \amArD /iti
|p5     t/asmAd yam/au jAyete
|p6     t/asmAd a/Svatar/o n/a pr/a jAyata /AttaretA h/i
|p7     t/asmAd barh/iSy /anavak.lptaH
|p8     sarvavedas/e vA sah/asre v/Avak.lpt/as \
|p9     /ati hy /apravata

|p10    s/A prajAnat/I
|p11    suvarg/aM {F lok/am}{W lok/aM} eti
|p12    y/ajamAnam abhy /ut s.rjati
|p13    kSipr/e sah/asram pr/a jAyate \
|p14    uttam/A nIy/ate pratham/A dev/An gachati //

|c1,8,1
|p1     /atrir adadAd /aurvAya praj/Am putr/akAmAya
|p2     s/a riricAn\o 'manyata n/irvIryaH /Sithil/o yAt/ayAmA
|p3     s/a et/aM catUrAtr/am apa/Syat
|p4     t/am /Aharat
|p5     t/enAyajata
|p6     t/ato v/ai t/asya catv/Aro vIr/A /AjAyanta s/uhotA s/UdgAtA sv\adhvaryuH s/usabheyas \
|p7     y/a ev/aM vidv/A~M/S catUrAtr/eNa y/ajata /Asya catv/Aro vIr/A jAyante s/uhotA s/UdgAtA sv\adhvaryuH s/usabheyas \
|p8     y/e caturvi~M/S/AH p/avamAnA brahmavarcas/aM t/at //

|c1,8,2
|p1     y/a udy/anta st/omAH /Sr/IH s/A \
|p2     /atri~M /Sraddh/AdevaM y/ajamAnaM catv/Ari vIry\ANi n/opAnaman t/eja indriy/am brahmavarcas/am ann/Adyam \
|p3     s/a et/A~M/S cat/ura/S c/atuSTomAnt s/omAn apa/Syat
|p4     t/An /Aharat t/air ayajata
|p5     t/eja ev/a pratham/en/AvArunddhendriy/aM dvit/Iyena brahmavarcas/aM t.rt/IyenAnn/AdyaM caturth/ena
|p6     y/a ev/aM vidv/A~M/S cat/ura/S c/atuSTomAnt s/omAn Ah/arati t/air y/ajate t/eja ev/a pratham/en/Ava runddha indriy/aM dvit/Iyena brahmavarcas/aM t.rt/IyenAnn/AdyaM caturth/ena
|p7     y/Am ev/Atrir /rddhim /Ardhnot t/Am ev/a y/ajamAnA .rdhnoti //

|c1,9,1

|c1,10,2

|c2,2,2
|p1     ev/Ava runddhe
|p2     pa~Ncada/S/o bhavati \

|p10    t/asmAd id/am any\o'ny/asmai dadhAti //

|c2,9,1
|p1     praj/Apatir akAmayata
|p2     pr/a jAyey/eti
|p3     s/a et/aM dvAda/SarAtr/am apa/Syat
|p4     t/am /Aharat
|p5     t/enAyajata
|p6     t/ato v/ai s/a pr/AjAyata
|p7     y/aH kAm/ayeta
|p8     pr/a jAyey/eti
|p9     s/a dvAda/SarAtr/eNa yajeta
|p10    pr/aiv/a jAyate
|p11    brahmavAd/ino vadanti \
|p12    agniSTom/aprAyaNA yaj~N/A /atha k/asmAd atirAtr/aH p/UrvaH pr/a yujyata /iti
|p13    c/akSuSI v/A et/e yaj~N/asya y/ad atirAtr/au kan/Inike agniSTom/au
|p14    y/at //

|c2,9,2
|p1     agniSTom/aM p/Urvam prayu~NjIr/an bahirdh/A kan/Inike dadhyus
|p2     t/asmAd atirAtr/aH p/UrvaH pr/a yujyate
|p3     c/akSuSI ev/a yaj~N/e dhitv/A madhyat/aH kan/Inike pr/ati dadhati
|p4     y/o v/ai gAyatr/IM jy/otiHpakSAM v/eda jy/otiSA bhAs/A suvarg/aM lok/am eti
|p5     y/Av agniSTom/au t/au pakS/au
|p6     y/e 'ntare 'ST/Av ukthy\AH s/a Atm/A \
|p7     eS/A v/ai gAyatr/I jy/otiHpakSA
|p8     y/a ev/aM v/eda jy/otiSA bhAs/A suvarg/aM lok/am //

|c2,9,3
|p1     eti
|p2     praj/Apatir v/A eS/a dvAda/Sadh/A v/ihito y/ad dvAda/SarAtr/as \
|p3     y/Av atirAtr/au t/au pakS/au
|p4     y/e 'ntare 'ST/Av ukthy\AH s/a Atm/A
|p5     praj/Apatir v/Av/aiS/a s/ant s/ad dha v/ai sattr/eNa sp.rNoti
|p6     prAN/A v/ai s/at
|p7     prAN/An ev/a sp.rNoti
|p8     s/arvAsAM v/A et/e praj/AnAm prAN/air Asate y/e sattr/am /Asate
|p9     t/asmAt p.rchanti
|p10    k/im et/e sattr/iNa /iti
|p11    priy/aH praj/AnAm /utthito bhavati y/a ev/aM v/eda //

|c2,10,1
|p1     n/a v/A eS\o 'ny/atovai/SvAnaraH suvarg/Aya lok/Aya pr/Abhavat \
|p2     Urdhv/o ha v/A eS/a /Atata AsIt
|p3     t/e dev/A et/aM vai/SvAnar/am p/ary auhant suvarg/asya lok/asya pr/abhUtyai \
|p4     .rt/avo v/A et/ena praj/Apatim ayAjayan
|p5     t/eSv Ardhnod /adhi t/at \
|p6     .rdhn/oti ha v/A .rtv/ikSu y/a ev/aM vidv/An dvAda/SAh/ena y/ajate
|p7     t\e 'sminn aichanta
|p8     s/a r/asam /aha vasant/Aya pr/Ayachat //

|c2,10,2
|p1     y/avaM grISm/Ay/auSadhIr varS/Abhyo vrIh/I~N char/ade mASatil/au hemanta/Si/Sir/AbhyAm \
|p2     t/en/endram praj/Apatir ayAjayat
|p3     t/ato v/A /indra /indro 'bhavat
|p4     t/asmAd Ahus \
|p5     AnujAvar/asya yaj~N/a /iti
|p6     s/a hy \et/en/Agr/e 'yajata \

|p8     g/aur v/A /annam \
|p9     y/ena p/AtreN/Annam b/ibhrati y/at t/an n/a nirN/enijati t/at/o 'dhi //

|c2,10,3
|p1     m/alaM jAyate \
|p2     /eka ev/a yajeta \

|p5     dv/Ada/Sa m/AsAH saMvatsar/aH

|c2,10,4

|p9     t/asmAd dvAda/SAh/ena n/a y/Ajyam pApm/ano vy/Av.rttyai //

|c3,1,1
|p1     praj/avaM v/A et/ena yanti y/ad da/Sam/am /ahar \
|p2     pApAvah/IyaM v/A et/ena bhavanti y/ad da/Sam/am /ahar
|p3     y/o v/ai praj/avaM yat/Am /apathena pratip/adyate y/a sthAN/u~M h/anti y/o bhr/eSaM ny/eti s/a hIyate
|p4     s/a y/o v/ai da/Sam/e 'hann avivAky/a upahany/ate s/a hIyate
|p5     t/asmai y/a /upahatAya vy/Aha t/am ev/AnvAr/abhya s/am a/Snute \
|p6     /atha y/o vy/Aha s/aH //

|c3,1,2
|p1     hIyate
|p2     t/asmAd da/Sam/e 'hann avivAky/a /upahatAya n/a vy/ucyam
|p3     /atho kh/alv Ahur
|p4     yaj~N/asya v/ai s/am.rddhena dev/AH suvarg/aM lok/am Ayan yaj~N/asya vy\ddhen/AsurAn p/arAbhAvayann /iti
|p5     y/at kh/alu v/ai yaj~N/asya s/am.rddhaM t/ad y/ajamAnasya y/ad vy\ddhaM t/ad bhr/At.rvyasya
|p6     s/a y/o v/ai da/Sam/e 'hann avivAky/a upahany/ate s/a ev/Ati recayati
|p7     t/e y/e b/AhyA d.r/SIk/avaH //

|c3,1,3
|p1     sy/us t/e v/i brUyus \
|p2     y/adi t/atra n/a vind/eyur antaHsadas/Ad vy/ucyam \
|p3     t/ad vy/ucyam ev/a \
|p4     /atha v/A et/at sarparAj~N/iyA .rgbh/i stuvanti \
|p5     iy/aM v/ai s/arpato r/Aj~NI
|p6     y/ad v/A asy/AM k/iM c/Arcanti y/ad An.rc/us t/eney/a~M sarparAj~N/I
|p7     t/e y/ad ev/a k/iM ca vAc/An.rc/ur y/ad /at/o 'dhy arcit/AraH //

|c3,1,4
|p1     t/ad ubh/ayam Aptv/Avar/udhy/ot tiSThAm/eti
|p2     t/Abhir m/anasA stuvate
|p3     n/a v/A im/Am a/Svarath/o n/A/SvatarIrath/aH sady/aH p/aryAptum arhati
|p4     m/ano v/A im/A~M sady/aH p/aryAptum arhati m/anaH p/aribhavitum

|p7     t/at pratig.rNat/a /A cakSIta
|p8     s/a pratigar/aH //

|c3,3,1
|p1     eS/a v/A Apt/o dvAda/SAh/o y/at trayoda/SarAtr/aH

|c3,3,2

|c3,4,1
|p1     Adity/A akAmayanta \

|c3,5,1
|p1     praj/ApatiH suvarg/aM lok/am ait
|p2     t/aM dev/A /anv Ayan
|p3     t/An Adity/A/S ca pa/S/ava/S c/Anv Ayan
|p4     t/e dev/A abruvan
|p5     y/An pa/S/Un up/AjIviSma t/a im\e 'nv/Agmann /iti
|p6     t/ebhya et/aM caturda/SarAtr/am pr/aty auhan
|p7     t/a Adity/AH p.rSTh/aiH suvarg/aM lok/am /Arohan tryah/AbhyAm asm/i#M lok/e pa/S/Un pr/aty auhan
|p8     p.rSTh/air Adity/A am/uSmi#M lok/a /Ardhnuvan tryah/AbhyAm asm/in //

|c3,5,2
|p1     lok/e pa/S/avas \
|p2     y/a ev/aM vidv/A~Msa/S caturda/SarAtr/am /Asata ubh/ayor ev/a lok/ayor .rdhnuvanty asmi~M/S cAm/uSmi~M/S ca
|p3     p.rSTh/air ev/Am/uSmi#M lok/a .rdhnuv/anti tryah/AbhyAm asm/i#M lok/e
|p4     jy/otir g/aur /Ayur /iti tryah/o bhavati \
|p5     iy/aM v/Av/a jy/otir ant/arikSaM g/aur as/Av /Ayus \
|p6     im/An ev/a lok/An abhy/Arohanti
|p7     y/ad any/ataH p.rSTh/Ani sy/ur v/ivivadha~M syAt \
|p8     m/adhye p.rSTh/Ani bhavanti savivadhatv/Aya //

|c3,5,3
|p1     /ojo v/ai vIry\am p.rSTh/Ani \
|p2     /oja ev/a vIry\am madhyat/o dadhate
|p3     b.rhadrathaMtar/AbhyAM yanti \
|p4     iy/aM v/Av/a rathaMtar/am as/au b.rh/at \
|p5     Abhy/Am ev/a yanti \
|p6     /atho an/ayor ev/a pr/ati tiSThani \
|p7     et/e v/ai yaj~N/asyA~Njas/AyanI srut/I
|p8     t/AbhyAm ev/a suvarg/aM lok/aM yanti
|p9     p/arA~Nco v/A et/e suvarg/aM lok/am abhy/Arohanti y/e parAc/InAni p.rSTh/Any upay/anti
|p10    praty/a~N tryah/o bhavati praty/avarUDhyA /atho pr/atiSThiyai \
|p11    ubh/ayor lok/ayor .rddhv/ot tiSThanti
|p12    c/aturda/Sait/As \
|p13    t/AsAM y/A d/a/Sa d/a/SAkSarA vir/AD /annaM vir/AD vir/Ajaiv/Ann/Adyam /ava rundhate
|p14    y/A/S c/atasra/S c/atasro d/i/So dikSv \ev/a pr/ati tiSThanti \
|p15    atirAtr/Av abh/ito bhavataH p/arig.rhItyai //

|c3,6,1

|c4,5,4
|p1     v/ai da/SarAtr/eNa praj/ApatiH praj/A as.rjata
|p2     y/ad da/SarAtr/o bh/avati praj/A ev/a t/ad y/ajamAnAH s.rjante \
|p3     et/A~M ha v/A uda.Nk/aH /SaulbAyan/aH sattr/asy/arddhim uvAca y/ad da/SarAtr/as \
|p4     y/ad da/SarAtr/o bh/avati sattr/asy/arddhyai \
|p5     /atho y/ad ev/a p/UrveSv /ahaHsu v/iloma kriy/ate t/asyaiv/aiS/A /S/Antis \
|p6     dvyanIk/A v/A et/A r/Atrayo y/ajamAnA vi/Svaj/it
|p7     sah/AtirAtr/eNa p/UrvAH S/oDa/Sa sah/AtirAtr/eN/ottarAH S/oDa/Sa
|p8     y/a ev/aM vidv/A~Msas trayastri~M/Sadah/am /Asata /aiSAM dvyanIk/A praj/A jAyate \
|p9     atirAtr/Av abh/ito bhavataH
|p10    p/arig.rhItyai //

|c4,6,1
|p1     Adity/A akAmayanta
|p2     suvarg/aM lok/am iyAm/eti
|p3     t/e suvarg/aM lok/aM n/a pr/AjAnan n/a suvarg/aM lok/am Ayan

|p9     jy/otir atirAtr/aH //

|c4,6,2

|c4,19,2
|p1     biladh/AvanaH / priy/a strIN/Am apIcy\aH / y/a AsAM k.rSN/e l/akSmaNi s/ardig.rdim par/AvadhIt //
|p2 {h}  /ambe /ambAly /ambike n/a mA yabhati k/a/S can/a / sas/asty a/Svak/aH //

|c4,19,3
|p1     puST/am pa/S/u manyate / /SUdr/A y/ad /aryajArA n/a p/oSAya dhanAyati //
|p2 {m}  /ambe /ambAly /ambike n/a mA yabhati k/a/S can/a / sas/asty a/Svak/aH //
|p3 {n}  iy/aM yak/A /Sakuntik/Ah/alam /iti s/arpati / /AhataM gabh/e p/aso n/i jalgulIti dh/ANikA //
|p4 {o}  /ambe /ambAly /ambike n/a mA yabhati k/a/S can/a / sas/asty a/Svak/aH //
|p5 {p}  mAt/A ca te pit/A ca t/e 'graM v.rkS/asya rohataH //

|c4,19,4
|p1     pr/a sulAm/Iti te pit/A gabh/e muST/im ata~Msayat //
|p2 {q}  dadhikr/AvNo akAriSaM jiSN/or /a/Svasya vAj/inaH / surabh/i no m/ukhA karat pr/a Na /AyU~MSi tAriSat /
|p3 {r}  /Apo h/i STh/A mayobh/uvas t/A na Urj/e dadhAtana / mah/e r/aNAya c/akSase //
|p4 {s}  y/o vaH /Siv/atamo r/asas t/asya bhAjayateh/a naH / u/Sat/Ir iva mAt/araH //
|p5 {t}  t/asmA /araM gamAma vo y/asya kS/ayAya j/invatha / /Apo jan/ayathA ca naH //

|c4,20,1
|p1 {a}  bh/Ur bh/uvaH s/uvar

|p3 {c}  y/ad v/Ato ap/o /agamad /indrasya tan/uvam priy/Am / et/a~M stotar et/ena path/A p/unar /a/Svam /A vartayAsi naH //
|p4 {d}  l/Aj/I3~N ch/Ac/I3n y/a/So mam/A3m \

|c5,8,2
